Comentário positivo: la posizione, la gentilezza dello staff, la colazione spettacolare
Comentário negativo: il wc, water separato dal resto e raggiungibile con tre gradini ripidi

Comentário positivo: Clean, kind staff and fantastic breakfast.

Título do comentário: Highly recommended for a city getaway
Comentário positivo: Great location, beautiful decoration, charming room, tasty breakfast, friendly staff - all in all a relaxing stay in proximity to everything we wanted.

Título do comentário: Perfekt läge, fantastisk frukost och trevlig personal.
Comentário positivo: Bra läge, fantastisk frukost trevlig hjälpsam personal.
Comentário negativo: Liten dusch och för få klädhängare, det fanns fön men sladden räckte inte till spegeln.
Man sollte ein Zimmer nach hinten heraus wählen oder Ohropax dabei haben. Die Straßenseite ist 24Std laut.

Título do comentário: razoável
Comentário positivo: decoração
Comentário negativo: não me parceria bem limpo. como fiquei 11 noites percebia que quando elas entravam para limiar não levava mais do qie 10 min. não trufavam as toalhas de banho todos os dias e o problema não é a troca mas o fato delas ficarem molhadas por até 3 dias sem trocar. é ruim não ter uma forma de seca las pelo menos. muito barulho da rua à noite e se fechar totalmente a janela fica abafado.

Título do comentário: Une très bonne adresse au centre de Lisbonne
Comentário positivo: un très bon accueil, chambre impeccable.

O hotel é bem localizado, próximo de duas estações de metrô, paradas de ônibus, bonde e tram. O deslocamento para quaisquer pontos turísticos é fácil. Na área, há vários restaurantes, bares, lojas... não haverá problema nesse quesito. Achei a área calma, não me incomodei com barulho. Cheguei de carro, e tem estacionamentos próximos. Gostei do café da manhã.
Comentário negativo: O hotel fica numa ladeira. Então, se chegar de metrô ou qualquer outro meio de transporte que não te deixe na porta, você terá que subir com suas malas por uma ladeira. Tive problema com o Wi-Fi no meu quarto - ao que parece, o repetidor de sinal que ficava na porta do meu quarto não estava replicando o sinal. Na véspera da minha volta, resolvi desplugar e plugar na tomada, e funcionou normal o Wi-Fi. Pedi auxílio ao pessoal da recepção, disseram que averiguariam, mas, ao ver que a solução que eu mesmo obtive foi simples, me pergunto se alguém se deu ao trabalho de ir lá verificar. O café da manhã, caso você não solicite diariamente troca de alguns produtos, virá repetido todos os dias.

Título do comentário: belle découverte de la ville
Comentário positivo:
la gentillesse du personnel 
propreté 
Petit déj
localisation
Comentário negativo:
que la réception ferme de bonne heure qui a fait que nous n’avons pas pu les joindre lors de notre arrivée pour prévenir de notre retard 
nous avons dû prendre une chambre d’hôtel au dernier moment

Título do comentário: perfeita!
Comentário positivo: acomodação limpa, próximo de pontos turísticos, café da manhã sensacional (um dos melhores que já tive), funcionários atenciosos e sempre dispostos a te ajudar; quando voltar em Lisboa ficarei no hotel novamente!
Comentário negativo: hotel sensacional!

Comentário positivo: Fantastic location, wonderful staff and excellent breakfasts.
Comentário negativo: Television in room 10 didn't work but it didn't really bother us.

Título do comentário: merci à Claudia et son équipe pour leur accueil bienveillant ! nous avons passé un excellent séjour et nous avons été su
Comentário positivo:
l'accueil du personnel 
l'emplacement

Comentário negativo: l'insonorisation

Título do comentário: Don’t hesitate… Just book it!
Comentário positivo: Omg, just book it! What a find! Beautiful independent operation. Style, flair and integrity in all the design & furnishings. Somebody with a great eye has a hand in what goes on here. Huge, and I mean huge, bedroom… total comfort! Seriously magnificent cooked to order breakfasts, fresh fruit & juices. Just down the street from the food markets & a short stroll to all the sights. While it doesn’t have a bar, a total treasure just on the adjoining street is By the Wine wine/tapas bar. What are you waiting for?… just book it ;-)
Comentário negativo: Not a huge gripe, but we were in Room 1, right bedside the front desk. Sadly, conversations (not that there were many) at the desk feel like they’re literally taking place in your room. (mgt: Easily sorted by building an in-room lobby?… there’s plenty of space).

Comentário positivo: It was a small cozy boutique hotel and the staff were extremely helpful. There was an amazing breakfast spread and the hotel was centrally located with easy access to restaurants and public transportation.

Título do comentário: Would def stay again. Loved it
Comentário positivo: Loved the breakfast. Staff was amazing and accommodating even with last minute requests.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Location, accommodation and most importantly people were beyond exceptional.
Comentário positivo: Breakfast was prepared as per your requested food and drink. Excellent food and exceptional service. Everyone went out of their way to accommodate and make our stay very enjoyable.
There were very nice people in the staff, always prepared to help you with any necessary answers or solutions! Good job :) Thank you for a nice vacation!

Título do comentário: Recommend
Comentário positivo: Nice location, friendly staff, quiet room

Comentário negativo: there was nothing we did not like

Comentário positivo: propre, bien situé, service de qualité, très bon petit déjeuner.

Título do comentário: מושלם!!!!
Comentário positivo:
מיקום מרכזי, מלון בוטיק מדהים!!!! שילוב של ישן וחדש, שרות של הצוות מעל ומעבר למצופה, קלאודיה בעלת המלון מדהימה ועושה הכל כדי שהשרות יהיה מושלם. ארוחת בוקר מושקעת מאד, שרות בחדר האוכל מעולה, המלון נקי מאד גם בחדרים, בלובי, בחדר האוכל. פשוט מושלם.
המלון ממוקם באזור מרכזי, קרוב מאד לתחנת המטרו, ממול למלון סופר מרקט קטן. 
אין ספק שנחזור.
Comentário negativo: לא היה משהו כזה

Comentário positivo: L'accueil la propreté de la chambre le petit déjeuner ainsi que la proximité du centre.hotel très bien situé
Comentário negativo: Peut être améliorer le WiFi. Le problème du ménage. Si vous quittez la chambre après 13h30 la chambre n'est pas faite. En principe à ce niveau il faut un service de chambre sans contrainte.

Título do comentário: Great place
Comentário positivo: The staff was amazing - I forgot some really important documents after leaving and they held on to it for me for almost a week. Breakfast is very nice, rooms are big and comfortable, really good location

Superbe accueil ! Chambre tres belle et lit super confortable !  Le petit dej est juste au top ! 
L emplacement est parfait , proche des commerces , restaurant , bar et metro , 

Les personnes a l accueil ont su nous conseiller d excellent restaurant et surtout comment eviter les "attrape touristes "

Wi fi funciona bem e o café da manhã delicioso. Tudo feito com cuidado.
O hotel é lindo.

Título do comentário: Got unlucky with the room but hotel has a great location.
Comentário positivo: Great location and breakfast.
Comentário negativo: Our only window(door) (with acsces to sunlight) was directly on the street. You could not even open a window to get some fresh air in the room because you wold be right on a sidewalk with the people passing by. At any moment people walking by could see you, no privacy at all. Very noisy, no privacy, right on the street. We tried to talk to the hotel staff and there was no interest from their side to fix the problem or compensation for the room. The staff was not the most friendly and did not try to help.

Título do comentário: meraviglioso e rilassante!

Título do comentário: Brilliantly located boutique hotel with very friendly staff and pet friendly.
Comentário positivo: They are pet friendly and were very welcoming to our dog Zeus. The location is great - very central for seeing the sights of Lisbon. Our room was very spacious and clean. Breakfast was excellent.
Comentário negativo: Nothing!

Título do comentário: Au cœur du Chiado mais dans le bruit de la foule
Comentário positivo: Hôtel bien situé au cœur du Chiado, mais à l’écart du bruit de la zone piétonne. On aimé la surface généreuse de la chambre, la double douche dans la chambre et le petit déjeuner soigné et bien choisi. L’amabilité et la gentillesse du personnel était un plus.
Comentário negativo: La seule fenêtre de la chambre 11 était directement au niveau de la chaussée, ce qui nous a obligé à garder les rideaux fermés de jour comme de nuit.

Comentário positivo: Everything

Título do comentário: Absolutely a great mini vacation in Lisbon - beware the hills:)
Comentário positivo: The location was very central and close to many amenities. The staff were very friendly, welcoming and helpful. The room was spacious, tastefully decorated and well equipped. The breakfast was terrific. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely return - we've already recommended the hotel to a number of friends of ours! Be sure to try the restaurant "By the Wine" located right behind the hotel - excellent.
Comentário negativo: Nothing really, just be aware that because the hotel is in a beautiful historic building, the washroom was lovely but rather small.

Título do comentário: Amazing hotel & staff in a great location
Comentário positivo: Perfect location. 2 minutes from the metro. Amazing fresh fruit salad freshly squeezed juice every morning. Coffee machine in the room, balcony & super hot shower. The concierge Congalo was so helpful & kind with organising restaurant bookings, suggesting places to eat & drink & making us feel special. He was amazing.
Comentário negativo: Milk had to be requested each time for your coffee /tea in the room (no UHT or fridge) and you had to request an iron /board, which we needed daily. So would have preferred this minor improvement. The bed was very firm!!!!

Título do comentário: Bel établissement

Título do comentário: Excelente experiencia
Comentário positivo: La ubicación es inmejorable y el personal es muy amable y atento. Sin duda una experiencia 10. Las habitaciones están muy bien insonorizadas, a pesar de estar en una calle muy céntrica apenas se percibe ruido.

Título do comentário: satisfeita. funcionários incríveis

Título do comentário: Immer wieder gerne
Comentário positivo: Diese Unterkunft kann man auf jeden Fall empfehlen, tolles Zimmer, sehr reichhaltiges FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck, sehr freundliches Personal, Hotel ist sehr gut gelegen. Einziger Punkt: den angebotenen Transfair wÃ¼rden wir nicht noch Mals buchen, da zu teuer

Título do comentário: An opportunity to stay in a great location in a city that invites you to walk and explore.
Comentário positivo:
Everything about this hotel is totally delightful. It genuinely feels like a home and makes you feel like a house guest. 
Everyone is incredibly helpful, engaging and enthusiastic and the breakfast is outstanding.
Comentário negativo: There is almost nothing to dislike.  We stayed for a long weekend and perhaps a longer stay might show some negatives but from our stay we have none.  If one wanted a bar or gym this is not the place but if you seek a luxury laidback boutique this is perfect.

Comentário positivo:
The staff here were wonderful. Our flight arrived at 10:30 at night so we didn't get to the apartment until after 11. They stayed just to make sure we got in and were so helpful. Loved the breakfasts - fresh fruit, eggs, toast and bread, pastel de natas, coffee, juices, cheese and ham. 

The rooms are very clean and comfortable. I was unfortunately not feeling well during my stay here so had breakfast in my room and layed in bed all day while my husband and daughter explored, but it was a cozy and comfortable place to stay while not feeling well. 

Also in a great location!

Título do comentário: un super séjour à Lisbonne
Comentário positivo: la localisation, la taille des chambres, la gentillesse du personnel et un petit déjeuner incroyable !

Título do comentário: Le prix est élevé par rapport aux prestations

Comentário positivo: la situation de l’emplacement.
Comentário negativo:
chambre trop près de la réception, beaucoup trop de bruit.
Petit déjeuner pas correcte au vu du prix, nous étions avec notre enfant et tous les jours, il fallait ajouter un couver à table. il n’y  avait que 3 coupes de fruits alors que nous étions 3. L’enfant est une pièce rapportée. Le lit pour l’enfant est vraiment un lit d’appoint, ok dans un camping ou pour une nuit mais pas pour un hôtel à ce prix.

Comentário positivo: Amazing location, friendly and helpful staff and awesome breakfast
The breakfast is almost the same every day but the quality is excellent. The room was spacious and comfortable.
Comentário negativo: It is not that we didn't like it but it was strange as our room was on the street level and if you opened the windows for some air the people walking by are looking straight at you. The only thing that we didn't like was that there was no good ventilation except from opening the windows, which was not an option, and you could feel the moisture in the air.

Título do comentário: What a great find and warm and welcoming staff!
Comentário positivo: Very friendly staff, nice sized room, and great breakfast!
Comentário negativo: The only complaint is noise from the street but not sure how this is resolved by the hotel per se.

Título do comentário: parfait
Comentário positivo:
hôtel magnifique et personnel au top ! 
décoration poussé dans le détail, petit déjeuner au top ! je recommande

Título do comentário: If we ever come back to visit Lisbon, this is the place we will stay!
Comentário positivo:
The staff was excellent in providing us with info regarding the train strike and making plan options. The hotel made us feel very comfortable in every way.
EXCELLENT breakfast!
We had 2 days of very early departures and they provided 
juice, bananas and crackers & jam for breakfast since we needed to leave super early.

Título do comentário: vi havde et skønt ophold. til trods for værelsets placering lige ud til gaden i gadehøjde, oplevede vi ingen larm og det
Comentário positivo: personalet var enormt søde og meget hjælpsomme. hotellet ligger i gåafstand til det meste.

Der beste und sympathischste Rezeptionist aller Zeiten. Ich arbeite selbst in der Branche und bin schon viel gereist. Ich kann also mit Erfahrung sagen, dass das Hotel sowie die Mitarbeiter wirklich außergewöhnlich freundlich sind.

Título do comentário: Au delà de nos espérances
Comentário positivo: L’accueil était incroyable, le personnel aux petits soins, la chambre spacieuse et la literie confortable, les petits déjeuners excellents et la localisation parfaite  ! Merci pour ce beau séjour au delà de nos espérances
Comentário negativo: Le seul point d’amélioration que je donnerais : il n’est pas conseillé de rajouter un matelas dans un lit parapluie qui ne soit pas fourni avec le lit parapluie pour le risque d’étouffement du bébé. Mon fils a 2 ans donc j’étais sereine mais ça aurait été très bien sans (même si les matelas vendus avec les lits parapluies sont très fins, cela reste de l’appoint). Le reste était parfait !

Comentário positivo: Sijainti ja idyllinen

Título do comentário: Delightful base for a Lisbon break
Comentário positivo: Beautifully renovated building in a central location. delightful staff and delicious breakfast.

Título do comentário: We had a fabulous stay in Lisbon. Gonçalo and team made us feel very welcome. We would definitely recommend.
Comentário positivo: A lovely, well appointed small hotel in a great location. The staff were excellent and really looked after us.

Comentário positivo: Everything from start to finish was excellent. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Beautiful room, breakfast was delicious.

Título do comentário: Very nice, would stay again.
Comentário positivo: The hotel was small, intimate, and beautiful. The room was pretty big, and had beautiful natural light. The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Comentário negativo: The breakfast was a little monotonous. They have you select things at the beginning but they also have a buffet. I don’t think you need the a la cart portion, just incorporate it into the buffet.

Título do comentário: idéalement situé, je recommande

Título do comentário: Très bel hôtel, bien situé dans le centre ayant gardé le magnifique décor ancien (escaliers, voûtes…). Cependant fuyez à
Comentário positivo: La situation, la grandeur de la suite de luxe, la beauté du lieu
Comentário negativo:
Le bruit de la réception juste à côté de notre chambre
Le vacarme de la rue
La super mauvaise insonorisation

Título do comentário: great location, walking distance to anywhere you need in Lisbon
Comentário positivo: the location is excellent and I like that it is a smaller hotel that really had reasonable amenities, the breakfast was good for the size of facility and they strived to help in many ways, with suggestions for places to eat and see, help with setting up appointments and reservations, etc.
Comentário negativo: they indicated that they had a bar and this really isn't true, there was a tiny honor bar cart that was frankly 99% empty which is not a bar per se, nor any in room refrigeration, which prevented even having a few beers or bottle of wine ready for when you want it,  not a big deal but need to remove mention of having a bar as they don't.  Lots of places very near to have a beverage. Beds hard a a rock, so if you like a firm bed this is your place

Título do comentário: Inoubliable
Comentário positivo: Emplacement idéal, Accueil très sympathique, Personnel très agréable, Chambre très confortable et propre, Petit déjeuner excellent. Je recommanderai les yeux fermés cet établissement
Comentário negativo: Fléxibilité des horaires du petit déjeuner

Comentário positivo: Incredible location, near amazing bars, restaurants, coffee shops as well as public transport. We walked to most places and then decided to get the day pass for public transport to visit some locations that were a bit further away. The staff were lovely, the hotel itself is very clean and we were able to get some gluten free bread for dietary requirements. We asked for a quiet room and so our windows were facing a little backstreet which was lovely and indeed very quiet. The room looked out to an amazing wine bar called By The Wine which is another little gem and perfect for some food and delicious wine. Overall we had an amazing 3 night stay and would definitely come back to this hotel!
Comentário negativo: Although we had a quiet room, and there was no street noise, there was lots of moving around and some noise coming from upstairs everyday around 7.30am. It didn't bother us too much as we were up at that time but if you're looking for a longer sleep you might need some ear plugs!

Título do comentário: Fab hotel, great location… would stay again
Comentário positivo: Loved the location of this hotel, was close enough to everything that we walked everywhere, despite the hills! Coming into the hotel is like entering a little oasis of calm in the city, just lovely
Comentário negativo: Nothing!

Título do comentário: Personnel adorable, situation très centrale, excellent petit déjeuner.
Comentário positivo: L’accueil, la localisation, la gentillesse de tout le personnel, la déco des chambres, le petit-déjeuner et la possibilité d’avoir la chambre plus tôt.
Comentário negativo: Sur le site, j’ai choisi entre autres cet hôtel pour la « vue » et il était indiqué chambre avec balcon et vue…pas de balcon et pas de vue mais finalement peu ont une vraie vue, par ailleurs, il est mentionné « suite » avec coin salon mais c’est un peu exagéré, il y a une table et deux chaises mais pas vraiment de salle de bains séparée par un vrai mur, seulement un pan de mur. Je le signale pour que d’autres ne soient pas déçus car tous les autres points positifs de l’hôtel compensent largement ces imprécisions.

Título do comentário: Super Unterbringung zur Besichtigung der Stadt.

Comentário negativo: Die Parkmöglichkeiten sehr eingeschränkt und teuer. Dafür kann das Hotel aber nichts.

Comentário positivo: O Gonçalo foi muito atencioso com a gente, nos recebeu a noite, explicou o funcionamento do hotel e nos indicou um ótimo restaurante. A pousada é muito bem localizada, o café da manhã é muito bom e o quarto confortável.

location
great breakfast

Comentário positivo: Great location, brilliant staff, perfect!
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: An amazing stay at this beautiful, quaint hotel. The location and staff were wonderful!
Comentário positivo: The location is amazing, walkable to all Lisbon has to offer. The hotel is comfortable, clean and beautifully decorated. It has all the charm of an historic building, but modern amenities and comfort. I can’t say enough about the staff, they were all so welcoming and friendly.
Comentário negativo: non

Comentário positivo: Everything was perfect!!! Thank you so much. We had a lovely stay

Título do comentário: Great little hotel!
Comentário positivo: Great breakfast!
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Comentário positivo: Perfekte Lage, total freundliche MitarbeiterInnnen, hilfreiche Tipps, schönes Zimmer und leckeres Frühstück

Título do comentário: todo genial pero habitación ruidosa
Comentário positivo: Me encantó la ubicación, cerca de todo. El desayuno increíble también y a destacar el trato tan cercano de Gonçalo, nos hizo sentir como en casa, dándonos recomendaciones y buscando siempre solución a nuestras dudas, un 10 para él!
Comentário negativo: Nos pusieron en la habitación de la planta baja y se escuchaba todo lo que se hablaba en la recepción.

Título do comentário: Świetny hotel w centrum Lizbony
Comentário positivo: Świetna lokalizacja. Hotel w samym centrum umiejscowiony w starej kamienicy, piękne wnętrza i wspaniała atmosfera. Blisko dwie stacje metra, przystanki autobusowy i tramwajowy oraz przystań promowa. Personel we wszystkim pomocny i uśmiechnięty. Musieliśmy przedłużyć pobyt w związku z odwołaniem lotu i nie było z tym żadnego problemu, dostaliśmy też cenę z rezerwacji sprzed pół roku. Śniadania smaczne i do syta.. jedyny malutki minus to brak świeżych warzyw.😉 polecam osobom szukającym spokojnego miejsca z klimatem starej Lizbony.🙂
Comentário negativo: Przydałyby się świeże warzywa do śniadania..

Título do comentário: Super séjour à Lisbonne dans un hôtel de charme
Comentário positivo: Hôtel idéalement situé en centre ville, proche de tout. Personnel aimable et serviable. Chambre spacieuse, très confortable et décorée avec goût. Très bon petit déjeuner.
Comentário negativo: Seul bémol : douche manquant de débit et mitigeur ne permettant pas de régler facilement la température de l'eau.

Comentário positivo: location was good, the staff was nice, the room was big
Comentário negativo: no elevator, small shower

Comentário positivo: Location was just perfect for walking to almost all the hot spots in Lisbon. Breakfast was great.
Comentário negativo: We were in the room close to reception and we could hear all the noise from the hallway and you can imagine how noisy reception can be. For the price we paid we expected newer rooms with nicer furniture, but instead the room looked like a 3 star hotel that should be 3 times cheaper so I guess you are paying for the location.

Título do comentário: für Menschen den der Nächtliche Lörm am Wochenende nicht stört, sehr empfehlenswert
Comentário positivo: sehr freundliches Personal, gute Auswahl beim Frühstück, zentrale Lage, großes Zimmer
Comentário negativo: am Wochenende extremer Straßenlärm durch betrunkene junge Leute. kein seperates Bad im Zimmer. wir hatten room nr 9

Título do comentário: perfect location for exploring, staff and breakfast were all fantastic, but the facilities could have been upgraded in t
Comentário positivo: Amazing location, very well decorated, nice bathroom. breakfast and staff were great.
Comentário negativo: there was only one iron and ironing board for all the bedrooms - the iron was faulty and dirty too. the floor in our bedroom could have been cleaner, and as we were on the ground floor, there was a strong musty smell.

Título do comentário: Wonderful little boutique hotel located in the perfect spot of Lisbon would definitely stay there again, thank you to al
Comentário positivo: Very cozy location was great. Breakfast was amazing.  Room was very clean and large, which was unusual compared to all the hotels we used on this trip. Would definitely stay there again.

Título do comentário: Ótima escolha, quarto ótimo, bem decorado e espaçoso. Café da manhã muito bom. Anfitriãos muito gentis.

Comentário negativo: sem defeito

Título do comentário: Great place to stay in Lisbon
Comentário positivo:
Great staff, awesome breakfast, nice location.
Everything was awesome.

Título do comentário: Disappointing.
Comentário negativo: I couldn't sleep from the loud noise. I requested a room in December when i booked that wasn't facing the street, yet they still gave me one that was facing the street. I had read bad reviews about Room 5 and 6. So i specifically requested not to put me in those rooms. Yet they still did. They should be managing client expectations with those two rooms, especially on weekends. At the very least, they should provide sleeping ear buds.

Título do comentário: Un accueil très bienveillant dans un vieux palais parfaitement restauré…
Comentário positivo:
L’emplacement est parfait : dans le quartier du Chiado et voisin du Bairo Alto pour les restaurants le soir…
Une équipe très sympathique et attentionnée 
Un petit déjeuner formidable : varié et copieux.
Comentário negativo: Même en ayant une chambre donnant sur l’arrière de l’établissement, un bar à vin étant juste sous la fenêtre, il est clair que l’on ne peut laisser celle-ci ouverte la nuit…cela dit les vitres sont très bien insonorisées…et il vaut toujours mieux être de ce côté par rapport à la circulation….

Título do comentário: En el centro cerca Del Mar

Comentário positivo: Emplacement central dans un quartier très animé. Merci au réceptionniste pour son accueil de notre arrivée juste avant minuit à cause du retard de plus de 3h30 de l'avion. Très bel endroit rénové avec goût. La chambre est très grande avec un minuscule balcon à la portugaise.. Très bon petit déjeuner servi dans une très belle cave voutée.
Comentário negativo: Le bruit des passants dans la rue, la musique jouée très fort quelque rues plus loin. Un triple vitrage serait peut être adéquat pour atténuer le bruit. Ras d'autre.

Comentário positivo: The location was right in the middle of everything, the rooms were spacious and looked exactly like the pictures, the staff were super friendly and extremely helpful. Also, the included breakfast was great! Overall, a fantastic hotel that I would recommend to everyone!
Prachtig verblijf op een zeer centrale plek om Lissabon te verkennen. Ook ontvingen wij goede tips voor restaurants en bezienswaardigheden.

Título do comentário: I loved my stay at the Alecrim and want to thank the staff for the excellent service

Comentário negativo: It is a minor thing, during the weekend there is noise from the street due to proximity to restaurants and bars

Título do comentário: It’s a lovely place to stay, great room great breakfast. No way to be disappointed here!

Comentário positivo: L'hôtel est charmant et bien situé (le quartier est assez bruyant). Le personnel est extrêmement gentil et prêt à aider. Les chambres sont bien aménagées et décorées avec  soin. Un vrai plaisir!

Comentário positivo: Posizione fantastica... Camera stupenda... ottima colazione... personale davvero super accogliente.

Rooms are big and really comfortable. Lovely breakfast!!
We wished we could’ve stayed longer.

Comentário positivo: O quarto é excepcional! O hotel é super aconchegante e calmo! O café da manhã e imperdível, assim como o atendimento da Sra. Cândida!

Título do comentário: Encantador hotel boutique

Comentário negativo: Por poner algo, diría que la habitación al estar un tiempo cerrada olía un poco a humedad,pero en general la habitación estuvo a la altura de un hotel boutique.

Título do comentário: Wonderful place in Lisbon easy location to everything
Comentário positivo: Excellent location

Título do comentário: Great location, pretty historic building, lovely breakfast, but needs shelves or dresser for clothing and hooks in bathr
Comentário positivo:
Great location
Pretty historic building
Lovely breakfast
Comentário negativo: No chest of drawers or shelves in room for clothing. Large closet, but few hangers and no shelves or drawers to put clothing. It was a big room- they need to add a dresser or shelves in closet. We lived out of our suitcase for 4 days.

Título do comentário: Excellent staff who made the stay special
Comentário positivo: The staff is extremely friendly, warm and kind. They made our stay special in many instances. Amazing customer service. The breakfast is wonderful and the massage therapist was excellent.
Comentário negativo: The noise from the street and bars right outside made it impossible to sleep at night. The room was clean but the area rug in the main room was very dirty and should be replaced.

Título do comentário: Lovely
Comentário positivo: Location, size of room and cleanliness
Comentário negativo: Breakfast was very sweet based

Comentário positivo: Posizione fantastica per visitare la città. Palazzo molto bello e camere curate. Colazione varia e gustosa.

The inside of the hotel is gorgeous. The workers are very helpful and friendly.  We had to leave very early for a flight and would miss breakfast. Claudia arranged for a breakfast tray to be outside our room so we could have a bite to eat before we left.

Título do comentário: A hotel with character and quality
Comentário positivo: A great 13 room hotel in the perfect location.  The staff will make sure you have a great experience in Lisbon.

Título do comentário: Great boutique hotel for a weekend break.
Comentário positivo: Lovely old building in the heart of Lisbon
Comentário negativo: Not much, but road was quite busy.

Título do comentário: Exceptional staff, room, and service.
Comentário positivo: This hotel is an amazing price for the level of luxury the experience, the room, and the staff provide. Everything is sparking clean, the staff are very attentive, and they go above and beyond to ensure that your exceeds your expectations. Breakfast was also very delicious, personalized, and attentive. I would stay here again and again just to take a shower in the lovely bathroom or sleep in the perfect sheets!

Título do comentário: Bien, no excelente pero una buena opciÃ³n

Comentário negativo: I personally like having a washcloth but throughout my travels non of my accommodations offered one in Italy or Portugal

Título do comentário: Excelente y gran atencion
Comentário positivo: Impecable el cuarto, todo de primera y excelente desayuno
Comentário negativo: Nada

Título do comentário: Lovely hotel in good location.
Comentário positivo: A nice boutique hotel in a handy location to many attractions. Great breakfast.
Comentário negativo: Nothing.

Título do comentário: Absolutely gorgeous boutique hotel, excellent central location, wonderful staff!
Comentário positivo: Gorgeous little hotel in an excellent location! We were just in Lisbon for an overnight so it was a quick visit but would recommend the hotel to anyone visiting and wanting to stay in a central location. The hotel is really stylish, it has a real boutique feel. It was also incredibly clean! Our room was great - very large and all the amenities you need for a night (or a few). Quirky bathroom! The staff could not have done more for us and made us feel so welcome from start to finish! Exceptional service.
Comentário negativo: Hotel is really central which does mean there may be a little street noise - we had a wine bar in the street behind us but it was quiet by midnight/1am and hubby fell asleep instantly so it didn't bother him in the slightest. If we were staying longer, we'd have probably stayed out later as well so don't think this would've mattered so much.

Comentário positivo:
Продуманный интерьер!  Быстрое расслабление после дороги ..
Оценка высокая!!

Título do comentário: Completely charming and wonderful stay!
Comentário positivo: Staff were so helpful and welcoming. The building was beautiful and breakfast was fantastic. We had such a great stay here and Lisbon was just a dream to explore!
Comentário negativo: Nothing!

Título do comentário: A estadia foi muito agradável e confortável
Comentário positivo:
O café da manhã estava delicioso. Tudo muito bem servido. 
O quarto bem decorado e confortável.
Banheiro limpo e novo.
Comentário negativo:
Poderia ter sido oferecido roupão e chinelo para uso do hóspede.
Poderia ter frigobar no quarto.

Título do comentário: Would stay again!
Comentário positivo: Our flight was delayed until 1 am and staff did excellent job with transfer from airport and information to make sure we could check in comfortably. Everyday staff was attentive and helpful!

Título do comentário: Geweldig klein hotel topkwaliteit
Comentário positivo: Receptionist gaf ons direct een warm welkom. Met een enthousiasme alsof we de eerste gasten ooit waren. Superfijn!

Sehr gut hat uns die Größe und zentrale Lage des Hotels gefallen. Besonders hervorheben möchten wir die Sauberkeit, die Freundlichkeit und Hilfsbereitschaft der Mitarbeiter/innen in allen Bereichen. Das Haus hat einen ganz besonderen Charme und das Frühstück lässt keine Wünsche offen. Alles hat dazu beigetragen, dass wir uns im Alecrim ao Chiado sehr wohl gefühlt und den Aufenthalt mehr als perfekt gemacht hat.
Comentário negativo: Die Betten waren für unseren Geschmack zu hart.

Comentário positivo: Localização e Decor
Comentário negativo:
Quarto em cave com janelas com barras de ferro de época.  
Encontra se a 3 metros da sala de pequeno almoço que não tem igualmente janela alguma.
Televisão não funcionou.
O número interno do hotel é  atendido a cerca de 50 kilometros , num outro hotel do Grupo.
A pessoa que atende liga a Lisboa para que um colaborador possa vir até ao quarto.
Número de " urgência " só é atendido a partir das 00h30. Até lá encontra se desligado. 
Não  existe elevador.
Os colaboradores, tentaram sempre ser agradáveis.

Título do comentário: Very friendly staff, perfect location, great for a couple of nights
Comentário positivo: The location and staff were great.
Comentário negativo: Our room was on the ground floor, looking directly into the street so it wasn’t very convenient to open windows.

Título do comentário: Great Central Hotel

Comentário negativo: Nothing really!

Título do comentário: Perfection! A great place to come home to
Comentário positivo: Incredibly welcoming and wonderful staff!! Could not believe how nice and caring they were. Location great and breakfast delicious

Comentário negativo: It would be great if the rooms included a small fridge to keep water cold. Also, it didn't seem to be possible to use the electric power points next to the beds without the lights also being on.

Título do comentário: Fantastic, looking forward to going back!
Comentário positivo: The property was fantastic, we loved our stay here and would recommend to others. The staff were so helpful. We will be back!
Comentário negativo: Nothing, everything was excellent.

Título do comentário: A perfect and comfortable base to explore a fascinating city.
Comentário positivo: A pleasant, small hotel fitted into an historic house which means interesting and quirky, odd shaped spaces and a few historic features retained. There is no lift but we luckily had a ground floor room. Our room was large and perfectly comfortable and clean. A good buffet-breakfast. The staff were helpful and friendly. It is perfectly situated to explore all of Lisbon’s delights being on a short stroll to tram routes (including the famous 28) and a metro station but much that was walkable.
Comentário negativo: Nothing really - the constraints of the building were also its character. Not a complaint; Lisbon is a pretty noisy place so we couldn’t open the window at night but the air-con was fine.

Comentário positivo: Le charme de l'hôtel, la taille de la chambre, la disponibilité, Amabilité et serviabilité du personnel de l'hôtel.
Localização excelente, funcionários educados e prestativos.
Excellent location for visiting Lisbon, all the staff exceptionally friendly and very helpful. Nothing was too much trouble for them. Room and food were both wonderful

Título do comentário: Outstanding Lisbon Accommodation

Comentário positivo: The hotel itself is absolutely beautiful but the people that work there are what made the experience so enjoyable. Everyone was so friendly and helpful.  The room was massive and so beautiful we didn’t want to leave.  Location was unbeatable and the breakfast was top notch.

Comentário positivo: The coziness and location as well as all staff
Comentário negativo: The fact that when booking I asked for a bed for a child as we were 3 and it was forgotten

Comentário positivo: The staff are warm and welcoming, they go out of their way to ensure you get the most out of your Lisbon visit.

Título do comentário: Definitely highly recommended as your home away from home when discovering the awesome city of Lisbon!
Comentário positivo: Everything, we loved it! Super friendly and helpful staff, genuinely interested, very tasteful decor, top location, local knowledge, delicious breakfast, nothing is too much. We had a very spacious room which was perfect for our family of 3.
Comentário negativo: All was perfect. They told us there might be some noise, but even on the Saturday night you could hardly hear anything from the street.

Título do comentário: Dommage pour les chambres standard pas bonne du tout
Comentário positivo:
Personnel très agréable et sympathique 
Petit déjeuner excellent 
Emplacement idéal 
Propreté
Comentário negativo:
Chambre en sous sol très moyenne , sombre et humide 
Fenêtre donne sur le trottoir de la rue bruyante et bar en face très bruyant
Problème alimentation d’eau dans la salle de bain, pas de débit. 
Chambre à éviter, préférer les chambres supérieures à l’étage.

Comentário positivo:
Zeer vriendelijk personeel
Grote kamer met smaakvolle inrichting
Comentário negativo: Niets

Título do comentário: Perfect little hotel in the middle of everything!
Comentário positivo: Very sweet, very clean boutique hotel in a perfect location to walk to everything central. Perfect room on the second floor overlooking street. The rain shower head and handheld was excellent and the bathroom was private with no see-through doors/windows etc!! Victor and Gonçalo were truly wonderful and made us feel so very welcome and appreciated!!
Comentário negativo: The beds were a little too hard for my comfort, but I liked the hotel so much that I would stay again.

Comentário positivo: Staff and interiors of hotel were excellent.

Título do comentário: Sensationell
Comentário positivo:
Das Frühstück war gut. Super Zentral gelegen.
Eine familiäre Atmosphäre. Sehr aufmerksames Personal und immer freundlich. 
Sehr hilfsbereit und noch viel mehr.
Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten sind zu Fuss zu erreichen. 
Mega tollen Städtetrip erlebt. 
Kann ich jedem nur empfehlen.
Comentário negativo: Parkplatzmöglichkeiten sind verbunden mit hohen Kosten, da das Hotel keinen eigenen Parkplatz hat.

Título do comentário: Ein rundum tolles Hotel in bester Lage!
Great hotel in Lisbon
Comentário positivo: Beautiful hotel in a great location. Room was very spacious. Staff very helpful.
Comentário negativo: Nothing not to like

Título do comentário: Fantastic stay amazing location such a friendly welcome will be back for sure
Comentário positivo: Style and location

Título do comentário: Nice stay but pricey for what they offer in reality .
Comentário positivo: Beautiful and vast room.
Comentário negativo: Strange design of space . I also think that it is a little bit too expensive for the provided amenities .

Título do comentário: Sehr schönes Boutique-Hotel
Comentário positivo:
Tolles, altes Gebäude in Lissabon.
Sehr zentrale Lage und nur wenig Zimmer.
Hatten ein großes Zimmer (8) in dem nichts gefehlt hat.
Personal super freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Hervorzuheben ist das großartige Frühstück, alles frisch.
Und ganz wichtig: guter Kaffee!

Título do comentário: Beautiful hotel with unique details in wonderful location to explore Lisbon
Comentário positivo: It was such a treat to stay at this hotel. The hotel itself is beautiful and has so many wonderful details. We arrived earlier than our check-in and they took the best care of us by treating us to a wonderful breakfast and even upgrading our room so that we could check-in earlier and rest from our travels. The daily breakfast is also great and made it very convenient for us to eat before leaving and exploring the city for the day. The location is within perfect walking distance of a lot of places to visit in Lisbon.  I would definitely stay here again on our next visit!
Ontbijt is fantastisch! Kamer is ruim, hotel ligt zeer centraal gelegen. Vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel.
Comentário negativo: De bedden waren wat aan de harde kant.

Título do comentário: Alecrim ao Chiado was a beautiful hotel in a great location in Lisbon. We would definitely stay here again if we’re ever
Comentário positivo: Everything
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Fabulous stay
Comentário positivo: The place was lovely. We arrived very early in the morning and were able to drop bags, get changed and head out to make the most of the day. The team were friendly and the hotel was clean, stylish and I couldn't fault anything. The breakfast was lovely and locally produced. We checked out for our flight at 4am, so the staff left us breakfast for us to take with us. Location was perfect. The hotel felt like a sanctuary in the busy city centre.
Comentário negativo: Nothing.

Comentário positivo: The staff was excellent. The breakfast was good.  The location was great.
Comentário negativo: Could not think of anything.

Título do comentário: Top sem defeitos
Comentário positivo: Tudo
Comentário negativo: Tudo.Um agradecimento especial a Claudia ,que disponibilizou  o quarto bem antes horário do chef in.Adorei a estados.

Comentário positivo:
Sehr geschmackvoll ausgestattetes Hotel, tolles Frühstück, ließ nichts an Wünschen übrig in stilvollem Ambiente.
Service und Empfang sehr nett, hilfsbereit beim Tragen der Koffer (kein Aufzug), oder beim Reservieren und Finden von guten Adressen fürs Abendessen.
Wasserkaraffe täglich immer frisch nachgefüllt auf dem Zimmer. Nespressomaschine, täglich aufgefülltes Cache mit 4 Kaffekapseln.
Comentário negativo: Trotz der zusätzlichen Klapp-Holzläden im Innenraum vor den bodentiefen Fenstern konnten wir wegen des Lärms der Straße nur sehr schlecht einschlafen. Gegenüber ein Weinlokal,  das bis weit nach Mitternacht Gäste auch im Freien hatte. Der Autoverkehr hallte wegen des Kopfsteinpflasters sehr, Viele Jugendliche zogen bis weit nach 3 Uhr morgens "singend" durch die Straße zur nächsten Bar...schuld war die offene Abdichtung zum Oberlicht, wo sich die Außenanlage der Klimaanlage befand. Ob sich das anders lösen ließe, weiß ich nicht...dadurch kamen die Straßengeräusche ungedämpft in den Raum. Sehr schade, wenn man nachts dringend Erholung braucht.

Título do comentário: Exceptional beyond all of my high expectations!
Comentário positivo:
Was an exceptional stay in every aspect from Claudia’s especially warm and helpful introduction and check-in process through a beautifully presented breakfast and send-off.  I have traveled the globe, and was beyond impressed with the property and how it has been so beautifully curated, manicured and managed. It was the final night’s stay in Lisbon for our party of 8 women celebrating friendship and an annual girl’s trip - indeed it was a highlight and lovely finish to an amazing stay. 

I live part-time in Portugal and Alecrim au Chiado will be my new go-to when in Lisboa. Thanks and Kudos!

Título do comentário: Excellent stay right in the centre of Lisbon
Comentário positivo: It’s such a cute little boutique hotel with very nice details. Loved how comfortable the bed is. Also the location is amazing! Right in Chiado. I was worried the noise from the street will be heard but they had double glazed windows as well as shutters which made the house completely silent.

Título do comentário: Genieten in Lissabon
Comentário positivo: Mooie grote kamer super goed ontbijt en geweldige ligging! Personeel heel attent en goede tips!
Comentário negativo: Niets!

Título do comentário: exceptionnel
Comentário positivo: lieu magnifique, emplacement parfait, une literie excellente, et un personnel au petits soins, adresse à visiter sans hésitation.
Comentário negativo: seul bémol, le petit déjeuner devrait être servi plus tôt car 8h pour arriver c'est un peu tard

Título do comentário: You could not ask for anything more
Comentário positivo: The room was lovely, location perfect, the breakfast wonderful, the staff delightful- what more could you want
Comentário negativo: The street at the back of the hotel was a little noisy in the early hours but not enough to make us not want to stay there
ריח נורא של עובש ורטיבות !!!

Título do comentário: This little jewel was perfect!
Comentário positivo: Everything!

Beautifully renewed building, with great decor and comfort. Breakfast was delicious and restful with Claudia and the team taking great care with the guests, nothing was too much trouble.

We walked everywhere in this historic part of town. Great shopping and plentiful cafes, restaurants and bars nð¥
Comentário negativo: Doesn't have a lift, however staff carried out bags. Thankfully only one flight of stairs to our room (with a view!)

Título do comentário: Perfect
Comentário positivo:
It couldn't have been better.  The staff were wonderful and very helpful.

Breakfast was marvelous and loved the honor bar in the common area.

They stowed our luggage before checkin and after checkout and carried it all for us. There were 6 in our group in 3 rooms.

Our 3 rooms were all different and beautifully decorated.
Comentário negativo: Nothing.  It's on a pretty steep hill but not too bad.  The rowdy revelers were young and loud but that was only for a few minutes.

Comentário positivo: Raffinata struttura in posizione ottimale per visitare Lisbona muovendosi a  piedi. Staff molto cortese e disponibile, in particolare Goncalo che conoscendo la ns lingua   ci ha  intrattenuti fornendoci utili consigli e suggerito un buon ristorante. Camera spaziosa ed accogliente.
Comentário negativo: La colazione non estremamente varia ma sopratutto con alcune cose che devi prenotare entro la sera prima tipo yogurt, frutta o latte freddo che potrebbero benissimo essere messi a disposizione insieme a tutto il resto.  Frutta anche questa servita solo se ordinata e un po' limitata: una coppa per due persone. Visto la tipologia di albergo.......

Título do comentário: Great property, great location
Comentário positivo: Great location, great room. Loved the finish and the decor. Bathroom was lovely
Comentário negativo: Very noisy, our room was next to the reception and there was no sound proofing on the door, including a gap under the door which meant we could hear alot of noise from reception during all hours.

Título do comentário: Hotel great and location wonderful.
Comentário positivo: Lovely clean spacious bedroom. The staff were very nice and bent over backwards to help with our needs.  The breakfast was very good and great choice.  Staff were attentive.
Comentário negativo: We booked one week and it would have been nice to have drawers to put clothes in.   Also small fridge. Although the staff were extremely attentive and we were able to put drinks in their fridge

Título do comentário: We very much appreciated the stafff but feel our room was overpriced.
Comentário positivo: Staff is excellent. The lobby is nicely appointed. The breakfast was good. Our room was a pleasant size and well appointed.
Comentário negativo: Our room smelled of mildew. The power shut off in the middle of the night and turned of my husband’s CPAP machine and interrupted recharging of devices. Our room window was unexpectedly very close to the street and I was awakened most of the night by traffic and revelers.

Título do comentário: A place to save and return whenever in Lisbon
Comentário positivo: All, breakfast is amazing, design  is wonderful

The room was spacious and comfortable with everything one might need for a perfect stay. Great location, close to the sea and the city.

Außerordentlich hilfsbereiter und freundlicher Service. Mitten in der Altstadt gelegen, damit super Lage und alles gut zu Fuß erreichbar. Zimmer geschmackvoll eingerichtet.  Sauberes Wohfühlhotel mit persönlicher Atmosphäre. Gerne wieder.

Comentário positivo: Love the design. Also, the team working both in the evening and morning were fantastic. Their recommendations were great and helped us get on our way! Thank you so much! Would definitely stay again!

Título do comentário: Great accommodation with fantastic staff!
Comentário positivo: The friendliness of everyone was fantastic! Room was big, comfortable and very clean. Breakfast was great.
Comentário negativo: The only thing I can think of is that there was no conditioner in the room.

Título do comentário: Don’t hesitate book this hotel
Comentário positivo: The staff are very polite and welcoming. The hotel is extremely clean and in the central location for exploring the city.
Comentário negativo: Be nice to be able to dim the lights a little

Título do comentário: Charming boutique hotel in an amazing location.
Comentário positivo: The location and Gonçalo was very welcoming.
Comentário negativo: Nothing, I was very happy with my stay.

Comentário positivo: Was clean although the room we were in needed some painting. Nice breakfast.
Comentário negativo: The noise inside the hotel was horrendous. Led to believe there was a bar, its just a little table with a few bottles on known as an honesty bar. No view whatsoever..just the building across the street.

Comentário positivo: Magnificent breakfast: perfectly curated and had everything we loved! Probably the best one we've had to date. The location of the hotel was superb, and the staff was really nice and helpful. Rooms were ample and each had an own AC unit, nicely decorated as well! We also liked the use of codes instead of having to carry keys with us.
Comentário negativo: Our rooms were in the basement, and after heavy rains it really smelled a bit funky. Additionally, it must've been some strong cleaning soaps that were used, giving the rooms a strong scent as well. The beds were hard, although some people might appreciate that. Our room's huge window was street level where people tended to e.g. lean on and have a smoke in front of it, so we felt like we were in a fishing bowl and needed to keep everything shut during our entire stay. The staff was great, but many times hard to locate (rarely at front desk).

Título do comentário: Verzorgd, kleinschalig hotel waar het personeel weet wat gastvrijheid is!
Comentário positivo: Een sfeervol, verzorgd en schoon hotel met supervriendelijk personeel, een mooi verzorgd ontbijt en mooie kamers. Kortom een aanrader om hier te verblijven! Super goede locatie om Lissabon te verkennen. Op mijn verjaardag werden we getrakteerd op wat lekkers, super attent!
Comentário negativo: Aan de straatkant hoor je natuurlijk wat stadse geluiden, echter de ramen en luiken zijn goed af te sluiten. Dit scheelt natuurlijk.

Título do comentário: Je recommande a 200% cet hôtel, tb place, confort exceptionnel, bcp de charme dans la décoration et le petit déjeuner es

Comentário negativo: Rien!

Comentário positivo: Lovely room, great location and friendly staff
Comentário negativo: Nothing!

Título do comentário: Super cozy hotel, perfect location - I'd stay here again
Comentário positivo: Absolutely perfect location and the room was so cozy. I LOVED returning to my room at the end of the day and chilling on the bed. It felt very homely - more like you were staying in someone's luxurious guest room than a hotel. Super nice staff also.
Comentário negativo: As a vegan, the breakfast wasn't really up to par with what I would like to eat in the morning. I ended up eating out most days. However, I completely understand this is a boutique hotel and they can't accommodate everyone. It's just that having vegan options at breakfast is a big plus for me and can sometimes control which hotel I choose. Sometimes there was also noise from the street outside, although it didn't bother me too much since I always sleep with earplugs.

Comentário positivo:
Friendly and caring personal services from staff.
Delicious and well organized breakfast. 
Great location, would love to return in future

Título do comentário: Fantastic hotel, lovely friendly staff
Comentário positivo: Had a lovely stay with the most helpful, friendly staff. Nothing was too much trouble for them. The room was perfect, breakfast was lovely. It was my wife's 50th birthday and they made her a cake and all sang happy birthday to her. They then put a bottle of wine in the room. Fantastic touches that made the stay extra special. Thank you to everyone there

Título do comentário: Perfect hotel in the heart of Lisbon

We spent 3 nights at this beautiful small hotel in the heart of Chiado district - all POIs in central Lisbon were at walking distance. The rooms are spacious and chic, and you have a nice and intimate feeling. The breakfast is also very good.
What makes the real difference at this hotel is the people: extremely nice staff who helped us with everything we needed during our stay.
Comentário negativo: The only small improvement that we identified is that the room could use more storage space (e.g.: closet, shelves).

Título do comentário: Fabulous hotel. Would stay there again. Highly recommend.
Comentário positivo: Charming. Hospitable staff. Wonderful breakfast. Very comfortable and quiet. Great location.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Perfect stay in Lisbon!
Comentário positivo:
The service was excellent!  Great suggestions of what to do and how to get there.  As trite as it might sound - we had been in Spain for 3 weeks prior (21 lodgings) and this was the first place that had a washcloth :)  It's the little things!!!
Darling place - great breakfast - whatever you want.  Close walk to most places we wanted to see.  Highly recommend!
Comentário negativo: All was great!

Título do comentário: We had a great time!
Comentário positivo: Very clean and staff was very helpful. Good location.

Título do comentário: It’s not 4 stars
Comentário negativo: The walls were like paper ! People next room to me was having sex , and I could hear everything!

Título do comentário: Needs a revamp !
Comentário positivo: The location is great! The building is very pretty and has some kind of charm.
Comentário negativo:
The hotel needs a revamp! It’s the second time I stay and basically the boutique hotel details are no longer there. Tired bedsheets, towels and also the pillows. Everything in the room needs to be updated and this that we took a suite ! 
Breakfast is uninteresting for a country with a rich cuisine in a boutique hotel ! Frankly disappointing!

Título do comentário: O quarto é super confortável. O café da manhã foi maravilhoso. A casa é lindíssima.
Comentário positivo: O quarto é super confortável. O café da manhã foi maravilhoso. A casa é lindíssima.

Título do comentário: Nous avons reçu un accueil chaleureux, des prestations impeccables , le  tout dans un superbe décors
Comentário positivo: Le petit-déjeuner était parfait, les produits , la quantité et le service étaient parfaits
Comentário negativo: Le climatiseur réversible, en mode chauffage en cette période, fait trop de bruit.

Título do comentário: Our stay was very pleasant,would stay there again.
Comentário positivo: staff were excellent,very courteous and attentive.champagne and raisins were a great touch for new year.
Comentário negativo: Back street was a little noisy.

Título do comentário: I would stay here again
Comentário positivo: Claudia was excellent Location was right in the heart of many things and the breakfast was delicious
Comentário negativo: The bathroom was strange setup Toilet was in small room up 3 or 4 steps

Título do comentário: A wonderful stay in Lisbon very much made by a special hotel.
Comentário positivo: To begin with a perfect location with most of central Lisbon very walkable. Then a lovely boutique hotel with great charm and style. Claudia and Gonçalo in reception looked after us so warmly. They helped greatly to make it a memorable stay and one to be repeated.
Comentário negativo: One slight drawback for us was the addition of chlorine to the tap water. Something to be aware if you have an allergy.

Título do comentário: Great as last time.
Comentário positivo: Very nice hospitality, tasty breakfast, friendly staffs.

Título do comentário: A beautiful place in the heart of Lisbon.  The room was comfortable and beautifully decorated.  The hotel staff was extr
Comentário positivo: Everything!  Beautiful with an extremely friendly and helpful staff.
Comentário negativo: No complaints

Título do comentário: Tolles Boutique Hotel mit sehr netten Personal in einem spannenden Bezirk mit vielen Lokalen
Comentário positivo: Tolles Ambiente und besonders hilfsbereites Personal. FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck ist sehr gut und umfangreich mit frisch gekochten Eiern und frisch gepresstem Orangensaft. Zu Silvester bekamen wir eine Flasche Espumante, schÃ¶n gekÃ¼hlt aus Zimmer!

Título do comentário: Beautiful Hotel, Incredible Staff, Amazing breakfast,Fantastic attention to detail.
Comentário positivo:
The hotel was beautiful, the rooms were well equipped and spacious. The hotel is really well situated. The breakfast was one of the best we have ever had, everything you could want and constantly replenished. The staff were incredibly friendly, informative, nothing was a problem. Claudia was especially kind to us. 
We are already working out when we can come back and have recommended it to our friends, anyone who is thinking of going to Lisbon - book this hotel, you will not regret it. 
Small hotel, perfectly formed in every way !
Comentário negativo:
I didn’t like having to leave - it was so good !!
There is nothing negative to say.

Comentário positivo: Ottima struttura in posizione centrale e strategica per visitare Lisbona. Ottima colazione e staff disponibile. Camere ampie e dotate di ogni comfort.
Comentário negativo: Poco insonorizzate le stanze

Título do comentário: Très agréable séjour à Lisbonne.
Comentário positivo: Tout nous a plu. L’emplacement dans ce quartier branché chic. Le personnel adorable. La suite agréable. Et même les soins du kinésithérapeute. Notre vol ayant été retardé d’une journée, on nous a décalé sans supplément notre séjour. Nous y retournerons avec beaucoup de plaisir.
The property was clean and in excellent condition. The staff were super friendly and helpful.

Título do comentário: Terrific people, impeccable property--I'll be back!
Comentário positivo: I loved the helpful staff, the location and the exquisite property.  Ao Chiado is very close to the streetcar line, and you can catch the very famous and scenic streetcar # 28 for an inexpensive tour over the ols streets to see the sights of the historic section of town.
Comentário negativo: The property was a bit difficult to contact.  My plans changed an needed to be adjusted but I had trouble reaching them.  This was complicated by my lack of a local sim card and phone line.

Título do comentário: Lugn liten oas.
Comentário positivo: Centralt, lugnt och väldigt välskött. Trevlig personal och jättegod frukost.

Título do comentário: A great stay in Lisbon
Comentário positivo: Fabulous location - could walk to main tourist spots , comfy , clean and bright rooms. Breakfast had great selection , eggs of choice made to order all delicious. Claudia and her staff were all very helpful and friendly.

Título do comentário: OjalÃ¡ volver
Comentário positivo:
El desayuno top.
La ubicaciÃ³n perfecta.
Las habitaciones sÃºper bonitas y cÃ³modas

Título do comentário: Estar no Alecrim ao Chiado é como estar em casa.
Comentário positivo: Hotel extremamente aconchegante e atendimento excepcional.
Comentário negativo: Gostamos de tudo.

Título do comentário: An amazing stay in a beautiful city. The hotels charm adding to the experience. Than you.
Comentário positivo:
All the staff could not have been more friendly or helpful, going the extra mile, celebrating my wife’s birthday.
The hotel  is in an ideal location- everything is easily accessible.
Whole hotel was very clean and tidy
Comentário negativo: Some noise due to room being at front of hotel, looking onto road. Nothing that was too distracting.

Título do comentário: Perfect hotel in a perfect location.
Comentário positivo:
The staff were really friendly and attentive offering suggestions on places to visit with travel instructions.
The hotel is beautiful, modern with some original features. The location is perfect for getting around Lisbon, breakfast was excellent. We couldn’t have chosen better and are planning to go back very soon.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Ótima!!
Comentário positivo: Ótima localização, camas muito confortáveis, funcionários simpáticos e super solícitos! Um agradecimento especial ao Gonçalo que fez nos ajudou com excelentes recomendações sobre onde comer no bairro do chiado! Amamos!
Comentário negativo: Nada

Título do comentário: pleasany enough
Comentário positivo: location, the decor
Comentário negativo: no one on reception at 6pm for me to check in. was standing on street until guests let me in. once in we couldn’t find staff for some time. At check out, I had the same situation. No staff at reception and I had to wander corridors calling hello to try find someone to check out

Comentário positivo:
Le personnel accueillant et serviable.
Excellent petit déjeuner très complet !
Nous avons été sûre classé en suite et le pdj du premier jour nous a été offert. 
La deco est super, et l’emplacement parfait ! À 5 min à pied du métro.
Comentário negativo: Rien

Título do comentário: Amazing boutique hotel!
Comentário positivo: Amazing facilities.  Staff outstanding.  Breakfast was amazing.  Great location.  Would highly recommend.
Comentário negativo: No negatives

Título do comentário: Perfect boutique hotel in smashing location.
Comentário positivo: Helpfulness of staff and location.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Excelente
The staff understands what customer service is and delivers on it.
Comentário positivo: Great location and friendly service
Comentário negativo: That we had to leave

Título do comentário: Nous reviendrons sans hésitations retrouver ce bel hôtel et ce personnel parfait.
Comentário positivo:
L’hôtel est très bien placé, décoré de manière très chic à l’image des photos. Il ne manque rien, eau, café, thé, shampoing, gel douche.. Tous est réunit pour vous faire passer de belles nuits. 
Le personnel est aux petits soins, accueillant, de bons conseils, prévenant. Un personnel que tous le monde rêverais d’avoir en allant à l’hôtel.
Comentário negativo: Il y’a un seul petit point, la porte de notre chambre était pas très bien isolé nous entendions les autres voyageurs le matin. Il faut bien trouver un point négatif… ;)

Título do comentário: Memorable experience
Comentário positivo: I would like to comment how pleased I was with the service provided by the staff.

Título do comentário: Staff was fantastic and welcoming. Clean beautiful charming place in a great location.
Comentário positivo: Clean and charming little boutique hotel. We had a problem with the air conditioner in our room so they upgraded us to a suite and brought us a complementary bottle of wine. Wonderful staff
Comentário negativo: Navigating the hallways with luggage was tricky but the staff helped so that made up for it.

Comentário positivo: Schoon,  heerlijk bed,  goed verzorgd ontbijt, ruime kamer
Comentário negativo: Eigenlijk niks

Título do comentário: Fantastisch
Comentário positivo: Alles dik in orde

Título do comentário: Great value for money in center, lovely building & solid staff.
Comentário positivo: Lovely historic building with outstanding staff.  Rooms are clean and comfy, and spaced enough for sound sleep.  10 minute walk to center of Oldtown and near Pink Street.  Breakfast was delish!
Comentário negativo: Nothing.  Parking at a lot nearby, 3 minute walk, will set you back 20E

Comentário positivo: Todo
Comentário negativo: Nada

Comentário positivo: Café da manhã, conforto do quarto (chuveiro excelente) e cordialidade dos funcionários.
Comentário negativo: Recepção não funciona 24h

Título do comentário: Wonderful stay - I'll come back ð
Comentário positivo: Very nice hotel, the room was always very clean, excellent and tasty breakfast, very helpful and kind staff, outstanding hospitality, it felt like staying with friends - for my next trip to Lisboa, I already know where to stay :-)
Comentário negativo: nothing really - maybe that I took the wrong exit from Baixa/Chiado metro station two times and then I had to walk quite a bit :-)

Título do comentário: חוויה נהדרת ומומלצת, מלבד ריח הטחב בחדר.
Comentário positivo:
השהות במלון הינה חויה כשלעצמה - המלון נקי ומטופח בבנין היסטורי מהמאה ה-18.
החדר מעוצב למשעי ומכיל את כל המתקנים הנדרשים.
ארוחת הבוקר עשירה בהשוואה לנהוג באירופה.
צוות המלון אדיב מאוד.
המיקום מושלם.
העלות בראייתנו היתה אטרקטיבית ביותר ביחס לתמורה.
Comentário negativo:
ארוחת הבוקר אינה כוללת ירקות.
החדר בו שהינו לא כלל חלון, אלא דלת לרחוב (בנין לשימור), ששמרנו סגורה כל הזמן. 
בשל חוסר היכולת לאוורר את החדר, הוא היה טחוב. זו הסיבה המרכזית לציון כולל 8, ולא מעבר לכך.

Título do comentário: Sofort buchen und genießen
Comentário positivo: Buchen! Buchen! Buchen! Wir sind mehr als begeistert. Ein wunderschöner Urlaub, mega freundliches Personal, schöne Zimmer, top Lage, super ausgestattet. Einfach nur top. Wer das Hotel nicht bucht, der verpasst was. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder.

Título do comentário: Klasse Städtetrip mit toller Unterkunft
Comentário positivo:
Hotel in zentraler Lage mit wunderschönem Zimmer und hervorragendem Frühstück.
Zimmer haben schöne Größe, das Bad ebenso, geschmackvolle Einrichtung.
Handtuch u Bettqualität sehr gut
Comentário negativo:
Kleines Manko… Schlafen bei offenem Fenster zur Straße geht nicht. 
Bodylotion im Bad wäre schön….wie gesagt, sehr kleines Manko.

Comentário positivo:
Los chicos del hotel son geniales, el hotel precioso, súper buena ubicación, desayuno súper también. 
Volvería a repetir sin duda.

Título do comentário: Super fijn hotel!!
Comentário positivo: Het personeel en de locatie. Lekker vers ontbijt, super vriendelijke behulpzame mensen.
Comentário negativo: Niets, top verblijf gehad!!

Título do comentário: En pleno centro
Comentário positivo: Lugar con encanto y desayuno estupendo.

Título do comentário: Staff, location, breakfast, room.... all excellent.  We could not have chosen a better hotel.
Comentário positivo:
Everything about the hotel was excellent.  A beautiful hotel in a central location.  
We wanted a small boutique hotel and this delivered that in bucket loads.  It's a charming place where the staff go over and beyond to be helpful with advice/service to make the stay a little bit more special.  It was my partners' birthday whilst we were there so they gave him a cake to mark the special day - very thoughtful.
Comentário negativo: There was nothing I didn't like so these are only minor observations I offer to follow travellers .  The bathroom (to Room 10) could have been a little bigger ( that would be difficult to achieve now without building work) but it was sufficient for our needs.  Note that all the rooms do not have a safe so if this is important guests are asked to let the hotel know in advance.  Our room was towards the back of the hotel overlooking the excellent ('By the Wine' wine bar)  which meant there was some noise late at night  but nothing too distracting. That said I would highly recommend the hotel and we will go back when next in Lisbon.

Comentário positivo: Molt tranquil i relaxat. Bon ambient

Título do comentário: Lovely small hotel and breakfast was really good but would have preferred if the shower wasn’t in the bedroom.  Staff we
Comentário positivo: Breakfast was ace.
Comentário negativo: Shower in bedroom, would have preferred an en-suite bathroom.

Comentário positivo: Comfortable. Staff was amazing

Título do comentário: Un cocon douillet pour un séjour plein de charme au coeur de Lisbonne
Comentário positivo:
L'extrême gentillesse du personnel qui a tout mis en œuvre pour nous permettre de vivre un séjour dans des conditions optimales (nous avons notamment été surclassés), la situation géographique idéale pour découvrir Lisbonne, la décoration pleine de charme et d'authenticité, la qualité du petit-déjeuner, les conseils touristiques avisés.
Encore merci de votre disponibilité et de vos attentions.
Comentário negativo:
Tout était parfait. 
A signaler : des marches pas toujours faciles d'accès pour une personne à mobilité réduite

Título do comentário: So good we are coming back.
Comentário positivo: Staff and location are wonderful. Large room  that was very clean and comfortable. Excellent breakfast with made to order eggs among other delights was included.

Título do comentário: Great hotel
Comentário positivo: Great hotel in great location. All staff friendly and helpful. Great breakfast and spacious clean room. Highly recommended.

Título do comentário: Beautiful hotel, perfect location, wonderful staff
Comentário positivo: Location is amazing. The breakfast is very very nice. The service was great, they gave us a nice breakfast about 11am when we arrived which was delicious. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable about the area. Rooms are comfortable.
Comentário negativo: The toilet is up some steep stairs with a low ceiling. Which for someone tall is difficult. Our bedroom window was opposite a bar, which was really loud but the window does help.

Título do comentário: Simple et classe
Comentário positivo: Le style sobre et classe, la gentillesse du personnel, merci

Título do comentário: A perfect place to stay and see Lisbon!!!
Comentário positivo: A wonderful welcome and large size room. The breakfast was amazing and the staff very helpful. The location was perfect to tour the city and take the train to Sinatra and Belem.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Comentário positivo:
Tutto perfetto ! 
La ragazza alla reception è stata molto gentile e disponibile 
I letti comodissimi 
La stanza grande e silenziosa 
Il bagno super pulito e la colazione varia e abbondante !!! Super consigliato anche per la posizione comoda alla metro e al centro

Título do comentário: Amazing short stay
Comentário positivo: The location of the hotel was perfect! We were walk distance to shops, restaurants & landmarks. The staff were so lovely and helpful - Really recommend this hotel

Título do comentário: The hotel experience was one we will remember for a long, long time.
Comentário positivo: The breakfast was outstanding. Home made eggs could be enjoyed every morning along with freshly squeezed orange juice. We arrived very early after an overnight flight and our room had been upgraded and we were given our room immediately after breakfast.
Comentário negativo: The entire experience was wonderful. I can't think of anything thye could have donne to improve a thing.

Título do comentário: Fabulous, enjoyed every minute
Comentário positivo: The staff were amazing, they were so helpful and friendly. Recommended various places to go. Room was gorgeous. Dressing gowns a great touch. Breakfast delicious, great selection of high quality ingredients- nothing to fault. Location is perfect for everything. Definitely recommend.
Comentário negativo: The only disappointment was the bathroom of room 10. Shower was tiny and not easy to navigate if you didn’t want your wash your hair and when I did I kept banging my elbows. For larger people I think they’d have trouble to get in and out. It was a shame because the bedroom was huge, maybe something to consider for the future.

Título do comentário: GEWELDIG!
Comentário positivo: Geweldige locatie, super aardig en behulpzaam personeel, heerlijke kamer en geweldig ontbijt!
Comentário negativo: Alles was top!

Comentário positivo:
Ganz schöne, gepflegte Unterkunft mit aussergewöhnlich freundlichem Personal und hervoragendem Frühstück! 
Perfekte Lage für ein paar schöne Tage in Lissabon.

Título do comentário: Séjour très agréable
Comentário positivo: Hôtel très bien situé, charmant, accueil très chaleureux, super service, petit-déjeuner fabuleux.
Comentário negativo: insonorisation insuffisante: on entend trop le bruit externe la nuit (bars à proximité, les personnes qui parlent ou chantent dehors, en fin de soirée)

Título do comentário: Very comfortable, delightful Hotel.

Comentário positivo:
Breakfast was delicious
Staff very friendly and helpful
Comentário negativo: We were little disappointed with our room because it was located in the basement, it was wet and noisy during the night.

Título do comentário: Perfect for a short stay in Lisbon
Comentário positivo: Everything was excellent, staff so helpful and friendly and a lovely breakfast

Título do comentário: guter Standort für einen Städtetripp
Comentário positivo: nettes kleines Hotel mitten in der Stadt… zwar laut aber super zentral…alles fussläufig erreichbar… Mitarbeiter geben mega Tipps für Restaurants…das Essen im : O Português Chiado war ein TRAUM !!!
