Título do comentário: Exzellente Unterkunft
Comentário positivo: Sehr freundliches und zuvorkommend es Personal, excellentes FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck mit Brot- und Kuchenbuffet, hausgemachtem frischem Obstsalat, frischen Omelettes nach Wunsch. Das Personal half mir bei allen Fragen sehr ausfÃ¼hrlich, ich konnte auch mein GepÃ¤ck noch nach dem Auschecken aufbewahren lassen. Noch dazu top Lage, viele Restaurants!

Título do comentário: We are planning to return on our next trip to Lisbon.
Comentário positivo: Great location, amazing breakfast and very lovely and helpful staff!
Comentário negativo: We enjoyed everything.

Comentário positivo: Mi è piaciuto tutto.

Título do comentário: Charmant hôtel, mais beaucoup trop bruyant
Comentário positivo: La chambre est jolie et d’une belle grandeur.  Les petits déjeuners sont bons et l’accueil est attentionnée.
Comentário negativo: Ma chambre était très bruyante, en fait, j’ai très mal dormi pendant les trois nuits de mon séjour.  Bien que ma chambre était localisée au deuxième niveau face à la rue et au dessus de la réception, on m’a informé que toutes les chambres de l’établissement avaient le même problème d’insonorisation.

Comentário positivo: Lage vom Hotel ganz prima,  sehr gutes und umfangreiches Frühstück
Comentário negativo: Die Lage des Zimmers war ungewöhnlich, direkt an der Straße auf Fußwegebene und ein Öffnen des Fenster war damit nicht möglich. Zudem roch es etwas muffig und feucht. Es ist eben ein Hotel in einem alten Gebäude.

Título do comentário: Super emplacement
Comentário positivo: Son emplacement idéal pour parcourir Lisbonne
Comentário negativo: Le rez de chaussée légèrement bruyant

Comentário positivo: Accoglienza ottima, posizione centrale, colazione buona e abbondante

Título do comentário: Horrível
Comentário positivo: Nada
Comentário negativo: Barulho excessivo, muitas escadas, quarto com muita umidade, sem elevador, sem frigobar, a noite não têm funcionário no hotel. Precisava fazer o checkout às 6 AM, estava com três malas e não ia ter como levar as malas do quarto até a saída. Tive que pedir para deixar minhas malas na recepção na véspera. Por conta da umidade do quarto, tive muita alergia e não consegui dormir

Título do comentário: Beautiful hotel in a great location
Comentário positivo: Beautiful hotel in a great location.  Staff were amazing , very helpful, professional and friendly. Breakfast was very good.
Comentário negativo: Would of liked a small fridge in room to keep drinks cold.

Comentário positivo: Absolutely perfect place to stay during a visit of Lisbon! Very nicely furnished and spacious room, excellent breakfast, exceptionally nice and helpful staff :-) If we come back to Lisbon, we will stay here again for sure!

Título do comentário: Super hotel, met heerlijk ontbijt en top personeel!
Comentário positivo: Top locatie! Super vriendelijk personeel, ruime kamer en een heerlijk uitgebreid ontbijt! We waren met vrienden een weekend in Lissabon. Deze plek is een aanrader.
Comentário negativo: Alles was prima!

Título do comentário: l'acceuil est parfait, le petit déjeuner superbe!!
Boutique hôtel confortable et bien tenu
Comentário positivo:
Amabilité du personnel
Emplacement 
Cadre cosy - restauration du bâtiment
Petit déjeuner
Comentário negativo:
Bar - self service un peu limité 
Ne convient pas aux personnes à mobilité réduite

Comentário positivo:
The property is in a great location. The hotel had a very warm boutique atmosphere.  
The staff were amazing and made great recommendations and went out of their way to ensure we had a wonderful stay.  I highly recommend the Alecrim  ao Chiado.

Título do comentário: Rundum perfekt für einen Städtetrip in einer wunderbaren Stadt
Comentário positivo: Das Frühstück war außergewöhnlich gut, die zentrale Lage mitten in der Stadt, das große und saubere Zimmer.
Comentário negativo: Aufgrund der Lage war es nachts sehr laut. Allerdings konnte man durch Schließen der Zimmer Ruhe bekommen.

Título do comentário: Bien mais surtout très agréable d’être logés dans cet hôtel
Comentário positivo:
La gentillesse et le professionnalisme de tout le personnel … aux petits soins pour nous.
Grande chambre spacieuse, confortable avec des produits d’hygiène d’excellente qualité.
Nous avons beaucoup aimé la vaisselle du petit déjeuner qui rappelle les azuléjo 🤩 et quelle joie de pouvoir prendre son thé dans un beau et confortable contenant (marre des minis tasses partout)
Comentário negativo: Histoire vraiment d’écrire quelque chose 😉😉 un mug dans la chambre aurait été un plus mais c’est tout à fait anecdotique

Título do comentário: Home Away from Home
Comentário positivo: The staff are like a family.There is nothing they wouldn't do to help make their guests feel welcome. They treat the boutique hotel like their home and guests to the same.
Comentário negativo: This is a very unique and special place.To me, it was a beautiful calm oasis in the middle of the city.EVERYTHING WAS PERFECTð

Título do comentário: Super séjour
Comentário positivo:
L accueil et la gentillesse de Claudia , l emplacement de la chambre dans la ville , les petits déjeuners copieux , le dévouement et la gentillesse des 3 cuisinières au petit déjeuner 
Les locaux ( chambre petite mais très agréable , super salle de bain , entrée et salle de petit déjeuner très jolies ) Le sourire et la délicatesse de l ensemble du personnel
Comentário negativo: La seule remarque serait sur le bruit le soir , notre chambre avait un fenêtre qui donnait sur la rue et il y avait un bar à vin dans la rue donc bruyant mais cela ne nous a peu perturbé

Comentário positivo: We stayed in the  number#1 suite which was stunning. The location is perfected and central to everything.
Comentário negativo: Leaving!

Título do comentário: Schöne Unterkunft im Herzen Lissabons
Comentário positivo: Top freundliches Personal, grosses Zimmer in toller Lage. Frühstück prima und umfangreich, Eispeisen auf Wunsch frisch zubereitet.
Comentário negativo:
Die Toilette im Appartement war nur durch eine dünne Glastür vom Zimmer getrennt.
Fernseher ohne Programme?? 2 Fernbedienungen??

Título do comentário: Comfortable and well located hotel in central Lisbon with exceptionally helpful staff.
Comentário positivo: I had a fantastic two night stay in the deluxe room. The hotel is very well located within walking distance of many attractions and restaurants. My room was large, comfortable and very well put together. The breakfast buffet was much better than average with exceptionally good fresh fruit and gluten-free bread (I have celiac disease) along with all the other things you would expect. However, what really made this stay memorable for me was the exceptionally friendly  staff at the front desk.  They booked a restaurant for me, gave me lots of great tips on sites to see and walking routes, they helped me book a bus to Porto Covo where I am walking the Rota Vicintina, and they set me up on Uber for a ride to the bus terminal.  Highly recommended and would definitely stay here again.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Absolutely lovely.
Comentário positivo: Such friendly staff. Great breakfast.
Comentário negativo: Dealing with stairs and luggage.

Título do comentário: Excellent, would def recommend
Comentário positivo:
Breakfast was continental and plentiful. Location was perfect for where we wanted to stay and explore. Staff were very friendly, extremely helpful and accommodating at all times. 

Great location, would definitely recommend and will stay there next time we're in Lisbon.
Comentário negativo: Possibly a mini fridge in the room for summer months when it gets very hot to keep water /drinks cold.... but it's a very minor thing.

Título do comentário: Beautiful stunning hotel with an amazing breakfast
Comentário positivo: Stunning hotel in a great location perfect for the train station and close to the centre, staff gave us an excellent restaurant choice called o Portuguese a 5 minute walk. Our room 8 was beautiful at the back of the hotel on a quieter road. There is a fantastic wine bar opposite By the Wine!  The breakfast was amazing! Really really good start to the day.
Comentário negativo: There was hardly any hanging space for clothes, no wardrobe or drawers

Título do comentário: Really nice boutique hotel and we would stay again
Comentário positivo: Great location and easy access to all historical spots.  There are plenty of restaurants nearby.  Loved the big breakfast options and the front desk was very helpful
Comentário negativo: Noise level from the street below was high.  You could hear loud drunk people late in to the night

Comentário positivo:
Location was great for exploring Lisbon. 
Room was amazing and great value.
Comentário negativo: Struggling to think of anything!

Título do comentário: Boutique Hotel Great Location and very helpful staff. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
Comentário positivo: Outstanding in every way. Wonderful personal staff. Perfect location and wonderful breakfast A+ in every respect

Título do comentário: A wonderful hotel to start our trip to beautiful Portugal.
Comentário positivo: Staff were very helpful with suggestions about sites and restaurants.  Breakfast was outstanding.  Room was very clean.  Overall beautiful property.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Excellent property in great location
Comentário positivo: The staff at this property is excellent. The location was perfect. I did several tours while I was there & it was a short walk to the meeting point of each of them & the train is nearby. There are many restaurants close by. Breakfast includes made to order eggs, fresh fruit, yogurt, breads, meat & cheese, cereals & sweets. It far exceeded my expectations. My room (4) overlooked the street but with the shutters closed I had absolutely no trouble sleeping. (Air conditioning is available in case you get warm.) There is a robe in the room & the bedding was very comfortable. I would not hesitate to recommend this property.
Comentário negativo: Breakfast starts at 8, but most tours also start at 8 (or 830 but a short walk is required.) An earlier breakfast or some grab & go options would be great! (I did tell them I was leaving early one morning & they left saltines, a banana & juice outside my door, so they’re definitely trying!)

Título do comentário: Sehr aufmerksames Personal
Comentário positivo: Die Lage des Hotels ist optimal. Das Frühstück war lecker, umfangreich und wurde nachhaltig angeboten. Alle Wünsche wurden erfüllt. Unsere Suite war geräumig und ansprechend. Das Bad ist geräumig und es fehlt an nichts. Das Personal ist überaus freundlich, zuvorkommend und stets hilfsbereit.
Comentário negativo:
Um in allen Kategorien ein hervorragend zu vergeben bedarf es unserer Meinung nach nur ein wenig Upgrades. So haben wir auf dem Zimmer einen Kühlschrank vermisst. Dadurch war es uns nicht möglich Getränke zu kühlen. Alternativ hätten wir uns einen Eiswürfelautomaten gewünscht oder den Verkauf von gekühlten Getränken. 
Durch die zentrale Lage war es nachts nicht immer so ruhig wie wir es uns gewünscht hätten. Aber das ist der Preis den man bei dieser zentralen Lage zu zahlen hat. 
Ansonsten war alles bestens.

Título do comentário: Fantastic city break
Comentário positivo: Great hosts.  Wonderful breakfast.  Excellent location

Super stijlvol en vriendelijk, behulpzaam en attent personeel. Leuk dat de oude elementen net zoals in de hele stad te zien ook hier binnen in het gebouw te zien zijn. Erg mooie kamer en lekker vers verzorgd ontbijt. Je kan voorkeuren voor het ontbijt opgeven en wordt dat s morgens aan je tafel bezorgd zoals verse jus, yoghurt en eieren worden s morgens vers voor je bereid. Ligging ook erg mooi en alles makkelijk te bereiken.

Título do comentário: Top hotel op een fantastische locatie.
Comentário positivo: De locatie is top in de oude stad. Tevens 300 meter af van de rivier. Metro en tram om de hoek. Kamers zijn ruim en van alle gemakken voorzien. Ruime douche. Ontbijt is uitstekend. Personeel spreekt Rngels en is zeer behulpzaam. Kortom: een echte aanrader.
Comentário negativo: Wij en onze vrienden hadden zowel voor als achter een kamer aan de straatkant. Voorste kamer last gehad van het verkeer dat 24 uur lang voorbij raast. Achterste kamer ligt in de uitgaanswijk. Tot diep in de nacht lawaai van dronken jonge mensen die zijn uit gegaan.

Comentário positivo: Great location in the historic district, tastefully remodeled and decorated, walkable area. Lovely breakfasts, helpful, friendly staff.
Comentário negativo: Awkward steps up to the toilet room.

Título do comentário: Großartige, stylische Unterkunft mit super nettem Personal
Comentário positivo: Ein sehr gepflegtes und außergewöhnliches kleines Hotel! Sehr zentral gelegen mit vielen Restaurants in der unmittelbaren Nähe. Zentral zum Bahnhof und zum Anleger. Ganz außergewöhnlich nettes Personal und ein fantastisches Ambiente! Das Frühstücksbuffet lies auch keine Wünsche offen! 5 Sterne!!!

Vi fick ett mycket trevligt bemötande och hjälp av tjejen i receptionen, ett stort tack till henne!
God och riklig frukost serverades på vackert dukade bord.
Comentário negativo: En viss renovering i badrummet behövs, men det var rent och fint.

Comentário positivo: Amazing location and staff were superb

Gorgeous boutique hotel. It was close to everything we wanted to do, especially the time out markets, the train station and Praça do Comércio. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Room was clean and the bed was so comfy. Breakfast was delicious and the ladies made some delicious scrambled eggs!!

Título do comentário: Staff were so kind, gave us loads of recommendations and were always up for a chat!
Better than expected!
Comentário positivo: Loved the location and cleanliness. The bed was so comfortable and firm. The staff was very friendly and helpful and spoke English.  They had many helpful suggestions for us to find restaurants and things to do in the neighborhood. The suite was spacious and had nice air conditioning and windows with a view. Located in a good area. Felt safe and secure in this property. Breakfast was delivered to our room early since we had an early flight. They arranged a taxi to pick us up and take us to the airport ahead of time, very helpful and reasonable price. Decor was charming.

Título do comentário: SUPERBE SEJOUR !
Comentário positivo:
Nous sommes rentrés hier de lisbonne, nous avons passés 2 nuits dans cet établissement, Que ce soit l'accueil, le lieu, la localisation  tout est parfait ! 

Mais une note particulière à l'ensemble de l'équipe de réceptionniste, souriant, agréable, nous conseils ...
Ils sont aux petits soins pour nous. Milles merci
Comentário negativo: Rien tout était parfait

Comentário positivo: the staff were very friendly and helpful, the breakfast was delicious, the beds were comfortable and the rooms spacious. great location also. highly recommend.

Título do comentário: PESIMO APESTA A OLOR DE HUMEDAD
Comentário positivo: El desayuno justo
Comentário negativo:
La habitacion olia a humedad terriblemente y no se podia ventilar ya que daba a la calle directamente y la ventana no abria. Igualmente el olor estaba en las paredes, suelo, cabecero de cama.
El personal dio largas a la solicitud de cambio de habitacion y decia que tenian que hablar con el jefe, al que nunca vimos porque no aparecio y no nos cambiaron de habitacion. 
Nos fuimos una noche antes, de tres noches pagadas usamos dos, solicitamos el reembolso del dinero de la noche no usada si no nos cambiaban de habitacion, no nos dieron ninguna solucion ni nos devolvieron ni un euro por la noche que nos fuimos porque el olor era horrible.
Una pena de vacaciones en un sitio asi!! no lo recomiendo.
La habitacion que nos dieron fue la numero 12, a la calle, el resto no sé como seran, pero desde luego deberian hacerse cargo si te venden una habitacion con esa peste por 190€ la noche. 
Otra cosa son los pequeños mantenimientos, la ducha no se mantenia, el boton de wc se quedaba pillado, se cortaba toda la luz de la habitacion de repente...
Muy mal! No vale lo que piden por la habitación.

Título do comentário: Fantastic location with a great breakfast and helpful friendly staff.
Comentário positivo: Fantastic location for visiting all areas of Lisbon. The staff were all very helpful and the breakfasts were delicious.
Comentário negativo: Only complaint is that the bed was a little hard ( for me) husband said it was fine, so it’s a personal choice I suppose!!

Título do comentário: Perfetta sistemazione
Comentário positivo: Abbiamo soggiornato 2 notti e abbiamo trovato la sistemazione molto comoda e centrale per poter visitare la città. A piedi si raggiunge la piazza principale nel quartiere Chiado con tutti i locali e servizi. Lo staff all'hotel è stato davvero molto gentile, professionale e disponibile, non ricordo i nomi ma sia le ragazze che i ragazzi alla reception sono stati TOP. Consigli turistici e pratici per visitare al meglio la città e il Portogallo (visto che per noi Lisbona era la I tappa). La camera da noi scelta andava bene come dimensioni, spazio, pulizia, letto comodissimo, possibilità di farsi un caffè o un tea al rientro, una bottiglia d'acqua sempre a disposizione. Pulizia sia della stanza che degli altri ambienti. Colazione sia dolce che salata, buona qualità e varietà. Alcuni prodotti freschi (tipo frutta/yoghurt) vanno scelti al momento del check-in, ma per noi non è stato un problema. Abbiamo anche richiesto se era possibile anticipare di mezz'ora un giorno la colazione in quanto eravamo diretti a Sintra e tutti molto disponibili e cortesi. All'arrivo e alla partenza consegnano e ritirano loro le valigie in camera. Veramente consigliato. In caso dovessi tornare a Lisbona sceglierò sicuramente questa struttura però forse una camera più grande e non al piano terra.
Comentário negativo: Unica nota negativa che la camera si trova a piano terra e si sente un po' di odore di umido entrando, ma bastava lasciare un po' aperto la finestra. Inoltre nelle vicinanze si trova un locale e la sera si sente un po' di rumore e schiamazzi (siamo capiti nella sera in cui il giorno dopo era festa in Portogallo)

Título do comentário: Lovely, charming and fabulous!
Comentário positivo: Great location in the Chiado area coupled with a beautifully decorated hotel.  Our room was spacious and very comfortable.  Breakfast was very good.  The charm of the converted 17th Century palace showed through.  Magic.
Comentário negativo: Nothing to note.

Título do comentário: Breakfast was to die for and the location was out the best. Bed was very comfortable as well.
Comentário positivo: Location and it’s history

Título do comentário: A unique property definitely worth a stay.
Comentário positivo: Excellent location, 10 min walk to town. Lovely gardens. Rooms nicely decorated. Older part of house has lots of character. Nice pool areas (2).
Comentário negativo: WiFi signal weak in rooms always dropping. Coffee machines at breakfast cause queues and restrict access to buffet. The balcony for our room was very small just enough room for table and chairs also always in shade and beside an air conditioning unit. Only used once.

Título do comentário: Great boutique hotel in Chiado
Comentário positivo: Great location in Chiado neighborhood with easy walk to nearby restaurants and bars.  Room was very large and comfortable with lots of storage. Bathroom was large and well appointed. Breakfast room downstairs was lovely with several hot and cold choices and was plenty to start our day. Staff was friendly and helpful, would highly recommend.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Wunderbarer Aufenthalt
Comentário positivo: Das kleine Boutiquehotel ist zentral und gleichzeitig in der Nähe des Wassers gelegen - ein perfekter Startpunkt für die Erkundung von Lissabon. Die Ausstattung des schönen Zimmers mit modernem Bad hat uns gut gefallen, die Fenster haben keinen Lärm von draußen hereingelassen. Das Frühstück war außergewöhnlich lecker und vielseitig, das Personal absolut freundlich und hilfsbereit. Jederzeit wieder!
Comentário negativo: Alles war bestens!

Comentário positivo: Lovely boutique in great location

Título do comentário: Amazing location and staff
Comentário positivo:
The location is perfect 
Lovely staff! Vitor, Claudia and Goncalo are very nice and very helpful. 
Claudia is amazing she had us checked out late.
Everything was really good, I recommend Alecrim ao Chiado.

Título do comentário: Tolles Hotel für einen Städtetrip.
Comentário positivo: Das Hotel hat eine super Lage. Rundherum sind viele tolle Restaurants und Bars und Geschäfte. Das Frühstück war hervorragend und der Frühstücksraum sehr liebevoll und gemütlich eingerichtet. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich.

Sehr schöne Unterkunft im Herzen Lissabons. Die Angestellten im Hotel waren ausnahmslos außerordentlich freundlich und hilfsbereit. Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und einiges wurde nach Wunsch zubereitet.
The staff were great! We also enjoyed the location. Would definitely recommend and come back if ever visiting Lisbon again.
Comentário negativo: The beds were a bit uncomfortable, pretty stiff. But no other complaints.

Título do comentário: Excellent hotel, fantastic location!
Comentário positivo: The location was perfect for a city break, close to local bars and restaurants, plus a short walk to the famous tram 28 stops!
Comentário negativo: The toilet although quirky in the room we stayed in wasn’t ideal as it was up a few steep steps so people with mobility issues may find it difficult. We stayed in room number 4.

Título do comentário: Friendly stay at a great location
Comentário positivo: The location was 5 minutes walk to restaurants that were on our list, great cocktails and sights inc tile shops. The staff were so friendly and helpful, especially Claudia! I felt truly happy and welcome. The room was big and comfortable.
Comentário negativo:
The room was a bit damp (there were damp traps under the bed), which I think was responsible for a slightly wierd smell whenever initially entering the room which seemed to disappear. I did wonder if it affected my throat. It was on a down level but also street level.

The wardrobe was a bit wierd and if you hung two tops they would overlap and could hang dresses; but there was also another bar in the room things could kind of be hung on. Would be good to have somewhere to put long floaty summer dresses!

Light wasn't great in the room (or air) as you were on a back street level opposite a wine bar so don't want to invite or let others see in.

Título do comentário: Great small comfortable hotel with breakfast, facilities and staff to match
Comentário positivo: Good location, comfortable well appointed room, exceptional staff.
Comentário negativo: A little noisy late at night but perfectly acceptable due to location.

Título do comentário: Exceptional Stay- loved it!
Comentário positivo: We were blown away at the service, location, cleanliness, and breakfast- all exceptional!! Would highly recommend and would absolutely stay again!
Comentário negativo: Nothing!

Título do comentário: Great
Comentário negativo: Rather noisy as our room onto a busy road

Título do comentário: Great location for a short stay, breakfast and service were excellent
Comentário positivo: Breakfast was excellent.
Comentário negativo: The room was “tight” and due for a makeover

Título do comentário: Très bon hôtel.
Comentário positivo: Bel emplacement, proche des commerces et des restaurants. Les chambres sont très spacieuses et confortables. L'accueil est très chaleureux et le personnel très aidant. Le petit déjeuner en buffet est bon et contient l'essentiel.
Comentário negativo: Rien

Comentário positivo:
This is a lovely little gem of a hotel.  It has a wonderful location and easily walkable to most of the major shopping and eating areas.  It's a few blocks from the Metro station so it's easy to get anywhere.  The rooms were very clean and comfortable with great A/C.  The only drawback is that the street behind the hotel can be loud with the sound of cars on cobblestones.
The entire staff.was wonderfully helpful and very available during our stay.

Best breakfast I have had anywhere. Had fresh bread cheese ham . Followed by made to order omelette. Fresh fruit salad and yoghurt.  Had to leave room for the amazing almond Portuguese tart. Plenty of coffee from catering size Nespresso machine Needless to say didn’t need any lunch .

Room was large airy and immaculate. Very comfortable mattress, very good shower. 

Staff were so friendly , helpful and pleasant. They made our stay. Nothing was too much bother. 

Can’t wait to return to Lisbon and would not book anywhere else. It really is first class . Thank you to all staff for the warmest of welcomes.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Exciting location and very nice, friendly and comfortable hotel.
Comentário positivo: The front staff were helpful and the lovely big bedroom. I liked the outlook onto the little street.
Comentário negativo: Nothing but some more space to hang clothes would have been good.

Comentário positivo:
Freundliches Personal 
Gutes Bett, hochwertiges Bettzeug, Bett könnte aber breiter sein
Zimmer schön eingerichtet
Comentário negativo:
Bett „nur“ 160x200cm
Zimmer war im Erdgeschoss sehr nah an der viel befahrenen Straße. Fenster sind gut, aber am Wochenende auch nachts laut.
Beim Frühstück fehlen ein paar gesunde Alternativen.

Comentário positivo: The breakfast was SO good. Our stay here exceeded our expectations by far. When we come back to Lisbon, I will definitely be staying here again.
Bellissima sistemazione, bella la stanza e tutta la struttura. Ottima Colazione. servizio impeccabile. Ottima posizione

Título do comentário: A really welcoming base from which to explore Lisbon
Comentário positivo:
Nice big rooms and well equipped 
Very good breakfast 
Very handy location 
The staff were very helpful
Comentário negativo: Would have been good to have a fridge in the room

Comentário positivo: Staff, amenities, convenient to restaurants. The room was spacious and comfortable.
Comentário negativo: No elevator. It was difficult to carry heavy luggage.

Comentário positivo: Room was good, staffs were friendly and helpful, amazing breakfast, good location

Título do comentário: Perfect location, big rooms and the staff were friendly and helpful.

Muito bem localizado, funcionários simpáticos e prestáveis, quarto lindo mobilado e decorado com muito gosto
Comentário negativo: Acesso à casa de banho dentro do do quarto por escada acentuada

Comentário positivo: Do excelente acolhimento e simpatia do staff. Localização muito boa, perto do Chiado e do Mercado Ribeira. Quarto muito amplo, muito bem decorado e confortável.

Título do comentário: Our stay was amazing and absolutely fabulous!
Comentário positivo: The quaint but quintessential country cottage feel with a modern twist. The decor was great and the environment intimate. I would like to convey special thanks to Iara, Claudia, Ruben and Gonzales for their exceptional customer service. They made us feel so welcomed and accommodated our every need. We will definitely be back for another visit.
Comentário negativo: One small factor was the iron. The iron constantly leaked water. This was replaced with another but it still did the same just a little less.

Great tips from the girls at the desk.
Comentário negativo: Nothing at all - although a minifridge in the room would have been handy.

Título do comentário: Great hotel, with perfect location.
Comentário positivo: The location is perfect, just a few blocks from everything. The place is super cozy and comfortable. We were leaving the Hotel before breakfast time and they gave us something to eat and drink on the go.
Comentário negativo: Nothing really.

Comentário positivo: They even had a dog bed and water bowl for my dog.
Great location. Friendly and helpful staff. Excellent breakfast. Large room , beautifully furnished

Título do comentário: Belle étape pour visiter Lisbonne à proximité quartier Chiado
Comentário positivo: Belle et grande chambre avec dressing et petite salle de bain. Très bien située près d'une zone touristique. Accueil très sympa, plein de bons conseils. Bon petit déjeuner simple

Título do comentário: Very pleased, we will definately recommend it to friends
Comentário positivo: Our room was very large, spotless clean, nicely decorated and bright, the bed very comfortable. The personel was super kind, friendly and accomodating to all our requests, we enjoyed breakfast and the location was perfect.
Comentário negativo: There was a small leakage from the shower tab and despite fact that we informed them upon arrival, it was not fixed by the time we checked out.

Título do comentário: Genial
Comentário positivo: La amabilidad del personal. Claudia, Lara y Gonzalo fueron súper amables con nosotros y conocimos más la realidad de Lisboa gracias a ellos.

Título do comentário: Beautiful hotel, central location, great breakfast
Comentário positivo: Really lovely staff and breakfast, rooms on the upper floors are really beautiful
Comentário negativo: We stayed in a smaller room in the basement on the first night of our stay, it opened directly onto a road which didn’t feel relaxing and it was extremely noisy, the staff moved us without hesitation for the remainder of our stay and we really appreciated it

Título do comentário: A haven in busy Lisbon
Comentário positivo: The room was very spacious. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. The included breakfast was a great addition, and the location was super convenient to all the energy of Lisbon!

Die Lage ist klasse für einen Städtetrip. Fußläufig kommt man fix in die wichtigsten Viertel. Metro, Tram und Bahnhof sind Max 5 min entfernt. Das Hotel ist sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet, in unserem Zimmer war es ruhig. Der Service war super und außergewöhnlich freundlich.
Comentário negativo: Geschmackvolles kleines Hotel in super Lage mit sehr freundlichem Personal - immer wieder gerne!

Título do comentário: Alecrim ao Chiaodo-Perfekter Ort für Lissabontrip
Comentário positivo: Perfekter Ort für einen Lissabontrip. Chiado ist ein tolles Viertel. Aufmerksamer Service und liebevolle Gestaltung des Hotels und der Zimmer. Wir würden auf alle Fälle wieder buchen bei einem nächsten Aufenthalt in Lissabon.

Colazione eccellente, ottima posizione, camera ampia e pulita, personale gentilissimo e sempre a disposizione.
Assolutamente da consigliare.
Comentário negativo: Il bagno un po' scomodo: per accedere al wc c'erano degli scalini e non era previsto un aereatore. Il lavandino in camera e la doccia senza una porta da chiudere generano un po' di umidità in camera.

Título do comentário: Great mini-moon in Lisbon.
Comentário positivo: Amazing location, right next to some recommended restaurants and bars. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Great choice at breakfast and eggs freshly cooked every morning.
Comentário negativo: Slightly noisy at night as our room faced the road but other than that, everything was great.

Comentário positivo: Great breakfast, lovely staff, and excellent location. The room was spacious and the building was very nice with a historic feel but modern decoration. The staff was excited to tell us about the city, where to go, where and what to eat.  Definitely recommend!
Comentário negativo: There was a mould smell in the room when we came in. It's an older building like everything around it, so I'm not sure if that it could get better - especially in the room we were at that had a big door to the street but no windows. It was very clean and beautiful though.

Título do comentário: Gorgeous room and excellent staff &  location
Comentário positivo: The employees were fabulous! We shared a lot of laughs with them. Gonzalo was so helpful recommended excellent restaurants we went to not found in my own research. Iada was helpful. Claudia was amazing and recommended where to visit. Breakfast awesome. Our room was gorgeous and clean and very big.

Comentário positivo:
The room was beautiful - very large, bright, comfortable. The location was great - near many great restaurants and many of the key sights are within walking distance. 

Gonçales was very friendly, welcoming and warm, and the breakfast was amazing. The place was faultless.

Es un hotel par repetir.

Título do comentário: Fantastic hotel. Staff awesome & location perfect.

Comentário negativo: Nothing - faultless - we do a lot of travelling this Hotel is up there.

Comentário positivo: Magnifique hôtel,  très bien placé pour visiter Lisbonne.  La chambre était très belle et propre.  Grand lit et vraiment confortable. Grande douche également. Bien équipé, ainsi que pour se faire un café et un thé. Le personnel de réception est très agréable et serviable.
Comentário negativo:
Nous étions dans une chambre côté rue, et à côté de la salle du petit déjeuner,  donc beaucoup de bruits. 
Pas grand choix au petit déjeuner. La cuisine est dans la même salle que le petit déjeuner alors quand le personnel est entrain de ranger et de parler,  ceci provoque un certain bruit gênant si on veut être tranquille le matin.

Título do comentário: Absolutely loved our stay from the beautiful room down to the delicious breakfast. Great location.

Título do comentário: Brilliant.  Could not have asked for better.  What a gem of a place and ideal for seeing Old Lisbon
Comentário positivo: The welcome at the hotel was great and the staff could not have been more helpful.  The location of the hotel was ideal, as it was very central for public transport and old Lisbon.  Breakfast was delicious.  If we go to Lisbon again, and hopefully we will, because we loved it, we will certainly stay at the Alecrim ao Chiado.  A little gem of a place.

Título do comentário: Tout est très bien dans cet établissement

My stay at Alecrim ao Chiado was an excellent experience. The room was spacious, clean, and charming, with excellent design and decoration that added to a perfect Lisbon experience.

very warm treatments for us and very detailed illustrattion of everything in this hotel.

Comentário positivo:
Le personnel a fait preuve d'un support hors du commun pour nous faciliter l'arrivée, alors que nous avions des ennuis de santé. Leur engagement s'est confirmé une fois de plus au départ très tôt à l'aube en nous préparant un petit déjeuner à emporter en route vers l'aéroport. Impressionnant. 
La qualité des chambres et leur confort sont irréprochables, la propreté toujours au rendez-vous.

Título do comentário: Ottima struttura, consigliata

Hotel in un palazzo del XVI sec., molto bello e curato.
Staff molto disponibile e competente,sia in fase di prenotazione,dando tutte le informazioni richieste in modo dettagliato, sia durante il soggiorno. 
Colazione ricca e di ottima qualità. 
Ottima posizione

Consigliato

Título do comentário: Extraordinary Service and Comfort
Comentário positivo: Location was very good, room was spacious, comfortable and quiet.  Breakfast was really excellent with personalized service and made-to-order eggs as well as delicious fruit and yogurt among other things.  Hotel entrance is quite secure.  All that is great but most of all it is the incredible staff that makes this hotel what it is.  You could pay $1000 per night for a luxury hotel and not have a more gracious and caring staff provide such personal attention.  Our flight to Lisbon arrived early in the morning.  We went to the hotel with the hope that we could just drop off our luggage and go out for 6 or 7 hours until check-in.  Instead Claudia invited us to the Hotel's breakfast and found us a comfortable space to rest until our room was ready.  Ultimately we were able to check in hours early.  Then Lara at the front desk asked us what we wanted to do in Lisbon and gave us many excellent suggestions.  All the staff were just so caring and friendly.  A great experience!
Comentário negativo: That we couldn't stay longer

Título do comentário: Flott, lite og sjarmerende hotell med nydelig frokost midt i hjertet av Lisboa!

Comentário negativo: Nothing.

Comentário positivo:
Das Personal war sehr freundlich, es rettet dieses Hotel.

Comentário negativo:
Das Hotel ist sehr schlecht isoliert, man hört was die Leute an der Rezeption sagen. Es ist unmöglich zu schlafen, bei offenen Fenster. Die ganze Nacht kommt so viel Lärm von den Bars und der oft befahrenen Straße draußen . Mit dem geschlossenen Fenster stinkt es aber muffig und sehr unangenehm. Die Klimaanlage hat uns auch nicht geholfen, da sie anscheinend nie geputzt wurde. Auch die Luft aus der Klimaanlage riecht muffig und staubig.
Das Badezimmer war voll mit Schimmel, es hat im Zimmer sehr nach Schimmel und Chlor gerochen.
Die Schränke sind mit alter Tapete beklebt, die teilweise  abblättert. 
Sie tun so als wären sie ein Boutique  Hotel aber eigentlich ist alles alt und billig. Siehe die Fotos im Anhang. Die Foto bei Google und Booking entsprechen nicht der Wahrheit. Man fühlt sich betrogen.

Comentário positivo:
Stanza grande, accogliente, pulita e dotata di tutti i comfort.

Título do comentário: Perfect stay in Lisbon
Comentário positivo:
Alecrim ao Chiado is a true gem—a beautifully designed boutique hotel in the heart of Lisbon. The location couldn’t be better, with all the main attractions just a short walk away. The rooms are elegantly decorated, blending modern comfort with classic touches, and everything was impeccably clean. 
The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. 
Breakfast was delicious, and the overall atmosphere made me feel right at home. 
I highly recommend this place and will definitely stay here again on my next visit to Lisbon!

Título do comentário: The staff is the very best!!!

Título do comentário: Tolle Lage, gutes Service, bei Zimmer muss man Glück haben.
Comentário positivo: Sehr aufmerksames Personal, tolle Tipps fürs Restaurants und Sightseeing, Tischreservierung für Restaurants, tolle Location, alles sehr gut erreichbar, Metro und Tram kurz vor der Haustür, tolles Frühstück.
Comentário negativo: Das Zimmer war zwar sehr nett und modern eingerichtet, jedoch im Erdgeschoss mit dem stark frequentierten Gehweg unmittelbar vor dem vergitterten Fenster ohne Gardine. Daher musste man ganztägig entweder das Rollo oder die Vorhänge vor das Fenster ziehen, und so ohne Tageslicht auskommen. Wir waren zuerst sehr enttäuscht und fanden es sehr Schade, dass man nicht bei der Buchung darauf hingewiesen wird, z.B. über eine getrennte Zimmmerkategorie für das Erdgeschoss. Die pauschale Beschreibung „dieses charmante, gut beleuchtete Zimmer verfügt über große Fenster mit Blick nach Westen…“ auf Booking.com trifft sicherlich nur auf die Zimmer in den oberen Etagen zu. Am Ende haben die oben aufgeführten Aspekte aber überwogen, sodass uns der Aufenthalt sehr gut gefallen hat.

Título do comentário: Einfach fabelhaft!
Comentário positivo: Die Unterkunft ist einfach TOP!!!! Ich empfehle es jedem der Lissabon besucht.

Título do comentário: So pleased we booked into this lovely hotel
Comentário positivo: We really loved this hotel because of its proximity to areas of the city, friendly and helpful reception for recommended restaurants in the area.  breakfast was Devine and the ladies so lovely.
Comentário negativo: One little thing, our room had 4 steps up to the toilet and my husband found quite difficult with a sore knee.

Comentário positivo: Amazing location, spacious rooms and friendly staff
Schönes, grosses Zimmer, sehr nettes und herzliches Personal. Super Lage! Wunderbares Frühstück.
Helpful and friendly staff. Great location
Comentário negativo: Understandably, because it is so central, our room overlooking the street was a little noisy at night.

Título do comentário: Boutique Guesthouse in the heart of Lisbon!
Comentário positivo: Excellent location in Chiado within 2 minutes walk to Bario Alto and lots of shops, restaurants and bars. Sameer at the reception was extremely friendly, courteous and helpful with our check-in. Small touches like the water kettle and espresso machine filled with water and ready to use were quite nice. The room was airy and clean with lots of natural light. The bed and pillows were extremely comfortable, and the windows to the street were adequately sound-proofed to allow for a good night's sleep. They also offered a very nice breakfast selection with vegan and gluten free options to select and inform them the night before.
Nice location close to the waterfront.  Staff very helpful.

Título do comentário: We enjoyed Lisbon and our stay at Alecrim oa Chiado. Would definitely recommend it.

Comentário positivo: Sehr freundliches, hilfsbereites Personal und top Lage. Alles ist von dort aus fußläufig erreichbar. Kann ich weiter empfehlen.

Título do comentário: Absolutely brilliant, would stay here again!

Título do comentário: Lovely stay, fantastic friendly, helpful staff.
Comentário positivo: Beautiful building and architecture. Unusual layout which added to the charm.

Well situated in old Lisbon. Parking garage on walking distance and a warm welcome by the friendly staff. The hotel's very tastefully decorated well equipped. Breakfast was served on beautiful plates and was more than complete.

Título do comentário: Lovely hotel
Comentário positivo: Lovely small hotel in the centre of Lisboa. The staff was very welcoming and helpful. Definitely will stay here again!!

Título do comentário: Perfect place to stay in Lisbon
Comentário positivo: Gorgeous boutique hotel that has been beautifully appointed. Location was perfect and walking distance to trams, buses, main train station and the Chiado area full of bars, restaurants and shops. Breakfast was delicious - beautiful array of pastries, breads, fruit, cheeses, meats and freshly cooked eggs. Claudia was delightful. We accidentally messed up our booking and Claudia could not have been more accommodating and thoughtful. I cannot recommend this place highly enough.
Comentário negativo: Lack of mini fridge in room.

Comentário positivo: Замечательный, аутентичный отель в шаговой доступности от всех достопримечательностей Лиссабона! Но особое и неизгладимое впечатление оставил персонал. Особенно великолепная Клаудия! Она душа этого отеля! Настоятельно рекомендую для проживания при посещении Лиссабона.❤️

Título do comentário: Will stay here again!
Comentário positivo: The staff were lovely and helpful with many different things that came up, such as our delayed luggage. The room was spacious. Location was very central and lively. We really enjoyed breakfast.
The staff were fantastic. Beautiful building & comfortable room,
Comentário negativo: My room was facing the street so it was noisy even at 4 in the morning. I loved everything about this place but did not sleep well because of the noise.

Comentário positivo: Nice big room, lots of light.  Loved the downtown location.  The breakfast was good and there was lots to choose from.  Loved that they had face cloths! Only hotel so far in Portugal that we have stayed at.
Comentário negativo: The water on the taps didn't get cold enough.  Tepid at best

Título do comentário: Goed hotel, fijn personeel, centrale ligging maar wel geluidsoverlast
Comentário positivo: De ligging is fantastisch, midden in het centrum. Het personeel is ontzettend vriendelijk, niks is te gek. Goed ontbijt.
Comentário negativo: We hebben best wat overlast gehad van uitgaand publiek (2 nachten slecht geslapen door veel lawaai van buiten) en het hotel is best gehorig dus je hoort anderen op de gang.

Título do comentário: Upscale and chic hotel, very comfortable stay!
Comentário positivo: Amazing property, very thoughtfully decorated. The room was large with all modern amenities. We liked the breakfast served every morning. Incredibly helpful staff, right from the check-in to making sure all our needs are met. Vitor from the front desk was exceptionally kind and helpful. We checked-in late in the night and he made sure he kept in touch prior to check-in. Overall, we had a great time at this hotel. It was very close to all major sites. We wished we had stayed longer.
Comentário negativo: Nothing much

Comentário positivo:
Heel mooi boetiekhotel. Kleinschalig, heel mooie ruime kamers en heel vriendelijk personeel.
Bij terugkeer naar luchthaven was er een staking van openbaar vervoer en heeft het personeel alles gedaan om een taxi te vinden voor ons.
Beautiful room. Wonderful breakfast. Very nice and helpful staff. Great location for walking.
Comentário negativo: If you have difficulty with stairs or hills, this may not be the place for you.

Título do comentário: Beautiful boutique hotel.
Comentário positivo: Very beautiful boutique hotel. You can tell the staff are very happy and they were so accommodating. The place was so beautiful and we adored all the amazing touches and amazing toiletries. The breakfast was absolutely amazing! We missed out on our first full day there as we had a tour booked.
Comentário negativo: If they could open the breakfast from 7am that would have been great. We didn't get to experience the first day as we had a tour booked at 8.15am and their breakfast opens at 8am. So we had to miss out. For future reference only. But the day we did experience breakfast it was INCREDIBLE!

Título do comentário: We loved our stay!
Comentário positivo: The property had the perfect location, walking distance to food, shops, and activities. It was clean, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and the breakfast was delicious.

Título do comentário: Excellent stay. We couldn’t have made a better choice!

Título do comentário: Fantastic Staff and Amazing Breakfast – Perfect Location!
Comentário positivo: The staff here were absolutely wonderful—so friendly, approachable, and genuinely kind. They were always happy to chat and offer fantastic local recommendations, which really added to the experience. The location couldn’t have been better, and the breakfast was a true standout—delicious and a perfect way to start the day!

Auf Nachhaltigkeit wird Wert gelegt. Viele Restaurants und Bars im Umkreis - Empfehlung Taberna da Rua das Flores (jedoch nur Barzahlung).

Título do comentário: Wonderful stay at this gorgeous hotel.

Struttura stupenda, ordinata, pulita. Posizione perfetta per il centro e facile da raggiungere sia in macchina che in metro. A un centinaio di metri è presente un parcheggio sotterraneo dove poter lasciare la macchina ( a pagamento ovviamente ) e sempre in quella piazza sono presenti fermate autubus, tram e metro. L’hotel si trova nella parte in cui inizia il centro e il Barrio Alto, nota zona di locali e ristoranti. La camera era stupenda e molto intima. Bagno bello ( manca il bidet come in ogni struttura ) . Colazione ottima con prodotti freschi e personale cordiale e disponibile. Super consigliato.
Comentário negativo: La mancanza del bidet. Null’altro da segnalare.

Título do comentário: Tolles Hotel in zentraler Lage
Comentário positivo: Konnten bei Ankunft waehlen, was wir zum Frühstück wollten. Sehr bequemes Bett. Großes Bad. Sehr freundliche Mitarbeitende.  Tolle Ausstattung und wunderschönes Geschirr zum Fruehstueck. Super heisses Wasser zum Duschen.
Comentário negativo: Zimmer war zur Strasse ebenerdig. Daher konnten wir das Fenster nicht offen lassen ueber Nacht. Aber es gibt auch andere Zimmer.

Título do comentário: Great place to stay
Comentário positivo:
The staff were fanatic, they helped with everything, restaurant suggestions to carrying your luggage
Great location
Breakfast was excellent

Once Upon A House is perfection.

Somewhat like going back in time to an exquisitely decorated house with many tastefully decorated rooms.

From the moment we checked in we felt really comfortable and at home.

Our room was spacious, which for hotel rooms now is unusual.  We had a very comfortable large bed, a table and comfortable chairs.

There was all manner of lighting options, a coffee machine and tea making facilities.

The bathroom was large with his and his sinks.  Beautiful products at the sinks and in the shower.

Breakfast for us was again perfect.  When you check in they go through fresh options which are delivered to your breakfast table every morning by the sweetest girls who run the breakfast show.

In the centre of the breakfast room are meats, cheeses, beautiful breads, cakes, cereals and a wealth of options.  Eggs can be ordered to your specification and the cheese, ham, tomatoes scrambled eggs were cooked to perfection.

There is very comfortable seating in the lobby and by the breakfast room and an honesty bar should you desire an aperitivo.

The position of the hotel is also perfect for the lovely areas of Chiado and Biaxa with the metro station a 5 minute walk.

Book this hotel and you will not be disappointed as for us as our first impression of Lisbon could not have been better.

We only spent 3 nights there but could have spent more and at some point will return.

Thank you Alecrim ao Chiado.
Comentário negativo: Nothing.

Título do comentário: A fabulous hotel
Comentário positivo: It was a really chill and gorgeous hotel. Excellent location, lovely breakfast. Clean and beautiful decor. Hosts were very friendly and informative.
Comentário negativo: The only thing I could say were the beds were a little hard for our liking but overall a fantastic hotel. Would definitely recommend

Título do comentário: Lissabon ist unbedingt eine Reise wert - im Alecrim ao Chiado noch mehr!
Comentário positivo: Das Hotel ist traumhaft schön, perfekt gelegen und sehr zentral. Das Personal, von der Rezeption, über das Housekeeping bis zu den Frühstücksfeen ist super freundlich, super aufmerksam und super hilfsbereit - allesamt eine absolute 10/10. Das Frühstück war sehr gut und man wird vorab gefragt, was man besonders gerne mag - das wird einem dann direkt an den Tisch gebracht. Die Eier werden in vielerlei Varianten auf Wunsch zubereitet und waren sehr lecker. Ich hatte für meine Frau zum Geburtstag vor der Anreise eine Torte und eine Flasche Sekt bestellt und es wurde morgens mit einem kleinen Ständchen an den Frühstückstisch gebracht. Perfekt - absolut perfekt. Wenn Lissabon, dann definitiv wieder ins Alecrim ao Chiado, denn das macht den Aufenthalt in Lissabon noch schöner.
Comentário negativo: Das einzige kleine Manko - das Zimmer Nummer 10 - eigentlich eine Suite - hat ein sehr überschaubares Bad. Wir stellten uns beispielsweise die Frage, wie man in die Dusche kommt, wenn man ein wenig "beleibter" ist. Die Matratzen sind sehr fest - das muss man mögen. Ansonsten war das Zimmer wirklich sehr schön und geräumig. Alles in allem aber ist das jammern auf sehr hohem Niveau und hat uns die Freude am Hotel nicht genommen.

- Fantastic, central location
- Quiet despite being right in the heart of the city
- Super friendly staff always greeted us with a smile and gave us some great tips on the best sights
- Beautifully appointed room with a big, comfortable bed, TV, storage, huge ensuite bathroom and drinks facilities 
- Great quality continental breakfast with made to order eggs plus pastries, fruit, breads, yoghurt and cheeses 
- Fast, free WiFi
Comentário negativo: - Room could smell a bit musty if you didn't keep the window open or fan running. Other than this it was truly flawless!

Título do comentário: Claudia, Claudia, Claudia….we’d come back just to see her
Comentário positivo: Claudia was the best host that we’ve ever met….the hotel was beautiful, it was close to shopping area, the cruise port, great restaurants….best value ever for us bar none…great breakfast, great service
Comentário negativo: If you go to Lisbon, you have to stay there…..upper end hotel at great value

Título do comentário: Hübsches Stadthotel
Comentário positivo: Die Unterkunft ist super zentral gelegen, mit viel Liebe zum Details gestaltet, das Personal super freundlich mit ganz vielen Tipps für den Aufenthalt in Lissabon.  Frühstück ist sehr persönlich und herzlich zubereitet.
Comentário negativo:
Wir hatten ein Zimmer  auf Straßenniveau, super hübsch, aber leider doof zum Lüften, weil es nur eine Tür auf den Bürgersteig gab. 
Weil es so zentral liegt, ist es leider am Wochenende etwas laut, wenn das Partyvolk unterwegs ist.

Título do comentário: Der Aufenthalt in diesem Hotel hat uns sehr gut gefallen.
Comentário positivo: Sehr aufmerksamer Empfang, riesige Auswahl am Frühstücksbüffet, sehr nette Bedienung beim Frühstück, ideale Lage, um mit der Metro anzureisen, Zimmer grosszügig eingerichtet. Wir würden bei einem nächsten Besuch in Lissabon wieder hierher kommen.

Título do comentário: An absolute gem
Comentário positivo: Fantastic hotel. Beautiful room, great location, wonderfully friendly staff and a breakfast to die for. An absolute gem and worth every penny

Título do comentário: Superlage , exklusives kleines Hotel wo der Gast keine Nummer ist.
Comentário positivo: wirklich toller Boutique Stil, exklusiv. Top abgedichtete Fenster , auf der anderen Strassenseite war eine Weinbar , aber bei geschlossenem Fenster trotzdem sehr ruhig im Zimmer. Wunderbar das alte Gemäuer im Frühstückskellerraum. Wunschfrühstück , ganz liebe Angestellte ..
Comentário negativo: das leider grottenschlechte W - Lan , da gibts heutzutage keine Ausrede mehr .. im Haus klemmten lauter unterschiedliche Repeater in den Steckdosen, was das Netz nicht besser macht . 1000 Euro im ganzen Haus investiert und es wäre alles perfekt.

Título do comentário: Great Lisbon Experience
Comentário positivo: Excellent Location! Staff was super friendly. Room had character. Bed was very comfortable. Only stayed 1 night but you made the most of Lisbon for our short stay.

Título do comentário: Fabulous place with great staff. Would definitely stay there again.
Comentário positivo: Fantastic location, staff couldn’t be nicer. Breakfast very good
Comentário negativo: Room facing street, a bit noisy early morning. Next time would book back room

Título do comentário: Immer wieder gerne. Sehr zu empfehlen.
Comentário positivo:
Wir hatten ein paar sehr schöne Tage in diesem familiären Hotel. 
Freundliche Begrüßung, alle sehr nett,super Lage und sehr sauber.

Título do comentário: Eine fantastische Woche in einem wunderschönen Hotel!
Comentário positivo: Einfach alles. Wir haben uns von Anfang an sehr wohl gefühlt. Das Personal ist unglaublich sympathisch und nett, Zimmer und Betten sind perfekt, die Lage genau richtig um alles in der Stadt in kurzer Zeit und auch zu Fuß zu erreichen, das Frühstück total lecker und individuell bestellbar. Wenn Lissabon dann nur dieses Hotel. Wir hatten Zimmer Nr. 11.
Comentário negativo: Da fällt mir so gar nichts ein 😊

Comentário positivo: MagnÃ­fica atenciÃ³.

Título do comentário: Weekend in portogallo
Comentário positivo:
Ambiente elegante e pulito.
Il letto super comodo ( il piÃ¹ comodo mai provato) 
Colazione buona e varia
Camera altezza strada ma per niente rumorosa
Comentário negativo: Tutto perfetto

Título do comentário: We really liked this stay  position to transport great and walkable to shopping area etc  lots of restaurants close by
Comentário positivo: Loved the position   The staff were very friendly and helpful  the room was spacious
Comentário negativo: The toilet up the stairs could have done with a hand rail

Comentário positivo:
Meravellós establiment: habitacions fantàstiques, esmorzar boníssim.
El millor de tot: el personal, per la seva atenció, familiaritat, disposició a ajudar, per la seva simpatia i, sobretot, per la seva humanitat.

Estabelecimento maravilhoso: quartos fantásticos, pequeno-almoço delicioso. O melhor de tudo: os funcionários, pela atenção, familiaridade, disponibilidade para ajudar, pela simpatia e, acima de tudo, pela humanidade.

Título do comentário: A haven in a beautiful busy city!
Comentário positivo: Location was close to everything, clean, comfortable with attention to detail in decor. Staff wonderful, helpful in any situation. Breakfast great.

Título do comentário: Fantastisch
Comentário positivo:
De  locatie ligt erg centraal zodat je in principe alles te voet kunt doen en voor de verdere locaties is er Uber. 
Het hotel is met veel zorg en liefde ingericht en bevat historische elementen.
Het ontbijt is fantastisch en dat geldt ook voor het vriendelijke personeel
Comentário negativo: Alles beviel

Título do comentário: Great location Comfy rooms - soooo many good restaurants near by,

Comentário positivo: Excellent service de tout le personnel, sans exception. Grande chambre et très bon petit déjeuner.
Comentário negativo: Tout était parfait.

Título do comentário: You will not regret staying in this "old house", so different to the north american chain hotels
Comentário positivo: Absolutely outstanding, friendly and always helpful staff. They really care about your wellbeing. Excellent breakfast too. Also, worth mentioning is the in-house masseur.
Comentário negativo: Less stairs, but it being an old restored building, this could not be avoided. Just be aware of it.

Título do comentário: WOW!!!! Best accommodations we had throughout our 3 week Portugal adventure.
Comentário positivo: Everything was perfect. The staff were fantastic, particularly Claudia and Gonzalo who went above and beyond to make sure our stay was superb. When we arrived, in the rain, Claudia came out and helped us with our luggage and then got a towel and wiped our suitcases dry. We arrived early and lounged in the common area while they focused on getting our room ready. We really felt like we were their friends rather than guest in a hotel. The included breakfast was fantastic, everything you could imagine, buffet style PLUS made to order eggs. Our TV wasn't working when we arrived and within hours they had a repairman there to replace the cable box. Location is perfect...central to everything. Our room was huge and well equipped.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Alles perfekt
Comentário positivo: Das Frühstück und die Räumlichkeiten im Kellergewölbe sind extrem beeindruckend und lecker. Das  aufwändig restaurierte Hotel hat eine Toplage. Schallschutzglas und dicke alte Wände spenden Ruhe.

Título do comentário: Excellent place location and staff
Comentário positivo: The staff everyone was extremely friendly attentive helpful and the interiors were in keeping with the age of the building and breakfast was excellent
Comentário negativo: My room was on ground floor which meant big double doors faced the street so wasn’t very good to open double doors

Comentário positivo: Die Lage des Hotels ist super und es ist ansprechend gestaltet und die alten historischen Mauern sind schön integriert. Das Frühstück bot eine reichliche Auswahl an Speisen.
Comentário negativo:
Unser Zimmer war etwas feucht und moderig und im Badezimmer Waschbecken ist das Wasser nicht richtig abgelaufen. Es war nicht ganz so hochwertig, wie ich bei dem Preis erwartet hätte. Mir wurde bei der Anreise per WhatApp ein Flughafen Transfer, allerdings zum falschen Datum angeboten. Ich habe dann per WhatsApp das Datum und Anreise Zeit richtig gestellt und wie angeboten um Organisation gebeten - darauf wurde dann einfach nicht mehr geantwortet. Schade, dass die Kommunikation hier so unzuverlässig war. 

Das Hotel ist keinesfalls schlecht, ich würde es aber nicht weiterempfehlen und auch nicht noch mal buchen.

Título do comentário: Pessoal muito gentil bom café da manhã e bom apto
Comentário positivo: Muito bom
Comentário negativo: Apto amplo

Título do comentário: Gezellig kleinschalig hotel
Comentário positivo:
De ruime kamer, het vriendelijke personeel en de centrale ligging. 
Het ontbijt was perfect.
Comentário negativo: Het bed is echt heel hard.

Comentário positivo: Ubicación, trato del personal, nos guardaron equipaje y nos dieron habitación antes porque estábamos cansados del viaje. Amabilidad de todas las personas que trabajan allí es impresionante. Desayuno riquísimo, incluso te hacen tortilla o huevos en el momento. Habitación limpia y baño bonito. Estancia genial, repetiré seguro.
Comentário negativo: Un poco de moho dentro de la ducha, entiendo por la humedad. Al entrar a habitación se sentía un poco olor a humedad pero no nos molestó.

Título do comentário: Charming hotel with amazing staff
Comentário positivo: The staff was wonderful and always willing to provide information and assistance. Love the location and the room. My husband had a massage which he said was beyond his expectations
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: An exceptional gem of a hotel with staff who really care about your comfort and well being.
Comentário positivo: We enjoyed a wonderful stay here for a few days in December.  The staff are exceptionally helpful, speak great English and have an excellent knowledge of the local area.  The hotel is tasteful and cleaned every day to a high standard with extras in our suite room such as a coffee machine, water and bathrobes.  Bed was large and comfortable. Breakfast had a good selection of cereals, breads, meat, cheese, fruit and pastries.  Eggs are also offered, cooked to your taste each day.  The interior of the whole building is so interesting and I loved the Christmas decorations and artefacts on display.
Comentário negativo: I would recommend this hotel as a great place to stay in Lisbon unless you had mobility issues in which case the stairs inside and position on a hill may prove challenging.

Título do comentário: Zentral und besonders
Comentário positivo:
Moderne Einrichtung 
Sehr sauber 
Großzügiges Zimmer 
Kein Teppichboden 
Ebene Dusche 

Frühstückstisch sehr ansprechend gedeckt 
Frischer O-Saft 
Eierspeisen werden frisch zubereitet 
Sonst alles was man sich wünscht 
Hervorragende Qualität 

Die Lage sehr zentral und wenn man möchte auch alles fußläufig 
Wir haben ein Tagesticket für die Öffentliche geholt 

Alles war perfekt und  waren mit allem sehr zufrieden
Comentário negativo: Es gibt nichts zu beklagen

Título do comentário: Wonderful small authentic hotel
Comentário positivo: Absolutely loved our stay at this small authentic hotel.  The location, breakfast and size of our suite were amazing!  We were on the back street and there was no noise.  The staff were wonderful and obliging.  We cannot wait to go back.
Comentário negativo: The bed was too hard for us, any longer than 2nts and we would have struggled. The shower cubicle was small and difficult to enter/exit.

Comentário positivo: Localização, atendimento, tamanho do quarto, pequeno almoço, cana muito gostoso
Comentário negativo: Única problema nos tinhamos foi para ter o tv funciona, mas nao estava importante

Comentário positivo: The staff was amazing! They asked what we wanted to be added to our breakfast, such as yogurt, orange juice, etc and brought it out to out table every morning along with a bowl of fresh fruit.

Título do comentário: Perfect stay in a great city.
Comentário positivo: Lovely hotel in a perfect location close to everything you need. Lovely big modern clean rooms and facilities. Continental Breakfast which was plentiful and very nice. Hotel staff all very helpful and polite.
Comentário negativo: The bed was a little firm for my liking but thats just my preference.

Título do comentário: A beautiful place with warm and helpful people - perfect!
Comentário positivo: The location, breakfast and staff/ hosts were just perfect

Título do comentário: Viaggio a Lisbona
Comentário positivo: struttura accogliente ed estremamente pulita dalla quale si raggiungono comodamente a piedi punti d'interesse e fermata metro. Molto comodo spostarsi anche con huber. Personale molto cortese e disponibile. Abbiamo alloggiato al primo piano, la camera era confortevole e dotata di bollitore, macchina per il caffè,  bottiglia di acqua, accappatoi e ciabattine e prodotti per il bagno. Colazione abbondante e ottima, con prodotti freschi, buoni e per tutti i gusti dal dolce al salato.
Comentário negativo: nulla

Título do comentário: Superbe
Comentário positivo:
Super endroit
Accueil très chaleureux

Título do comentário: Fantastic stay at Alecrim ao Chiado
Comentário positivo: I highly recommend the Alecrim ao Chiado hotel.  The room was very nice, the breakfast was excellent and the location was perfect.  It was easy to walk from the hotel to many sites of interest.  The staff at the hotel was very welcoming and helpful.

Título do comentário: Perfect spot in Lisbon.
Comentário positivo: Everything about this hotel was wonderful. The staff were attentive, the room so comfortable, breakfast lush. The neighbourhood was perfect. The reviews were all very good so our expectations were high, and all were met.
Comentário negativo: We were happy with everything.

Comentário positivo: Tolle Lage, gutes Frühstück, sehr freundliches Personal, großes Zimmer

Título do comentário: Perfekte Lage fÃ¼r einen Kurzaufenthalt in Lissabon
Comentário positivo:
- Tolle Lage am Rande des Bairro Alto und fusslÃ¤ufig zur SchifflÃ¤nde
- Sehr nettes und hilfreiches Personal
- Klein, aber fein - mit frischen Eierspeisen
Comentário negativo: fÃ¼r uns hat alles gepasst

Título do comentário: Muito agradável e confortável, com a comodidade de estar perto de tudo.
Comentário positivo: Da localização, do atendimento do staff, do tamanho do quarto e do café da manhã que oferece diversas opção deliciosas.

The location of the hotel was amazing. It's right at the centre and near all attraction points. The rooms were very good and 'Claudia' at the reception was amazing. She offered us breakfast despite us arriving late
Comentário negativo: Nothing. Met my expectations

Comentário positivo: Dejlig beliggenhed, skøn morgenmad og flotte rum
Comentário negativo: Lige lovlig lydt

Título do comentário: Loved it here. Would definitely stay again.
Comentário positivo: Loved this hotel. Perfect location, very quiet and lovely staff.
Comentário negativo: Nothing.

Comentário positivo: Excelente localização, quarto amplo, café da manhã maravilhoso!!! Todos os funcionários muito atenciosos e gentis!!! Ótima opção de hospedagem!!!

Título do comentário: Vieux palais, beaucoup de confort et de charme avec un très bon accueil.
Comentário positivo: Petit déjeuner excellent dans un très beau cadre. Emplacement idéal très proche du centre.

Título do comentário: Erg geslaagd
Comentário positivo: Het personeel was ontzettend enthousiast en vriendelijk en bovenal erg behulpzaam. Onze complimenten!
Comentário negativo: Niets

Título do comentário: Highly recommended hotel
Comentário positivo: Our room was spacious and comfortable. I had asked for a room on the first floor and this was accommodated. Very nicely decorated with a lovely shower. The location is ideal, close to all the main parts of the city. The staff couldn’t be more pleasant. The breakfast staff in particular are lovely.

Comentário negativo: The hotel refused to give a partial refund when we had to shorten our stay by one night due to an injury during travel.

Comentário positivo: Ein tolles Altstadthotel nicht weit vom Fluss , Metro, Altstadt , alles fussläufig zu erreichen, in der Nähe ( nur die Straße hoch )tolle Restaurants und Cafés , die Straßenbahn Nr 28 fährt auch in der Nähe los, das Personal im Hotel supernett ob Empfang oder beim mit Liebe angerichteten Frühstück, es gab frisches Obst , sehr guten Kaffee und leckeren Kuchen, Eiergerichte nach Wahl , wir waren sehr zufrieden, obwohl das Hotel an der Straße liegt hat der Autokrach vor der Straße durch die Fenster alles geschluckt, Silvester stand eine Aufmerksamkeit im Zimmer , wir hatten eine schöne Zeit und können das Hotel wirklich weiterempfehlen

Título do comentário: Excepcional
Comentário positivo: Estadia perfeita! As acomodações do hotel são perfeitas, prédio histórico, lindo e aconchegante! Tudo limpo, novo é bem cuidado. A localização é perfeita, próxima aos principais pontos turísticos de Lisboa, o que te permite explorar grande parte a pé. Os funcionários são excelentes, extremamente atenciosos e simpáticos, um agradecimento especial à Candida, que fica no café da manhã, um amor de pessoa!!
Comentário negativo: Não há nada que eu não tenha gostado.

Título do comentário: Highly recommended!
Comentário positivo: The location is great within walking distance to central Lisbon. Rooms are large and clean. The staff are helpful and kind. Street parking is available using “Telpark” app for €4 every 2 hours.
Comentário negativo: Shower does not have a door which makes it cold and you can potentially splash water to the room. Also, there are a lot of stairs which makes it difficult if you have a large luggage.

Título do comentário: Quirky hotel in a wonderful area of the city.
Comentário positivo: It was diverse.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Comentário positivo: Hôtel plein de charme, jolie salle de petit déjeuner
Comentário negativo:
Très mauvaise odeur dans notre chambre, mais nous avons pu changer de chambre.
Bonne réaction du personnel.

Título do comentário: Lissabon at its best.
Comentário positivo: Super herzlicher Empfang, schöne große Zimmer, neue Fenster, dadurch auch mit Verkehr ruhig und dunkel im Zimmer. Groißes Bett mit fester Matratze. Phantastische Lage im Ausgehviertel, mit bestem Anschluß an wichtige Stationen (Chiado, Cais da Sodré, Rossio), Laufdistanz zu vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten (Elevador). Super Restaurant-Tipps (O Portugues, Senal Vermelho), danke Goncalo. Aber auch viele weitere Restaurants und Bars in der Nähe, ebenso wie Shopping. Frühstück sehr gut, mit frischem Obst, Müsli, Eiern etc., aber leider in einem Kellergewölbe.
Comentário negativo: Eigentlich war alles perfekt.

Título do comentário: Lovely boutique hotel in excellent location
Comentário positivo:
Excellent location to explore Lisbon , either on foot or tram and lovely staff
several lovely bars and restaurants nearby 
Excellent continental breakfast
Comentário negativo: The room , no 10 was lovely and spacious however the bathroom was small,especially the shower unit which was tiny .someone tall would struggle .It is an old property and friends in the next room had a large bathroom area so it was due to the layout and unavoidable but worth noting for anyone above average size

Comentário positivo: Höchst flexibel; unsere Ankunft und Abreise änderte sich sehr kurzfristig und massiv; das Personal zeigte sich äußerst flexibel und hilfsbereit
Comentário negativo: Nichts

Comentário positivo: We appreciated the warmth and hospitality of the proprietors, the clean, comfortable, and attractive rooms, and the generous and tasty breakfast. The location was excellent as well! We would definitely stay at Alecrim ao Chiado again.

Claudia and her team were amazing from start to finish and made us feel so welcome. Breakfast was a brilliant part of the stay and the rooms and location of the hotel were perfect. This will definitely be our go to place when we come back to Lisbon.
Comentário negativo: The bed was a little bit hard for our liking but it didn't take away from how amazing our stay was.

Comentário positivo: PERSONALE PROFESSIONALE E CORDIALE ,COLAZIONE FANTASTICA GRANDE SCELTA(LA CROSTATA CON CREMA ALL' ANANAS OTTIMA) LA STRUTTURA SI TROVA IN UN PUNTO PERFETTO X POTER RAGGIUNGERE QUALSIASI PUNTO DELLA CITTA' A PIEDI
El hotel es muy bonito y el personal nos hizo sentir como en casa, era el 50 cumpleaÃ±os de mi marido y tuvieron muchos detalles con nosotros. La ubicaciÃ³n es excelente. 100% recomendable

Título do comentário: Top-Lage, sensationelles und reichhaltiges FrÃ¼hstÃ¼cksbuffet, wir kommen wieder
Comentário positivo: Sehr nette, freundliche und zuvorkommende Gastgeber
Comentário negativo: Kein KÃ¼hlschrank im Zimmer

Comentário positivo: Hotel molto bello, pulito e in ottima posizione, buona la colazione, letto comodissimo e stanza silenziosa, ottimi i prodotti da toilette messi a disposizione
Comentário negativo: Stanza a livello strada, la nostra finestra sì apriva su un marciapiede quindi impossibile aprirla, camera un po' umida per la posizione

Título do comentário: Exceptional accommodation in Lisbon
Comentário positivo: The staff were absolutely delightful. The suite was magnificent. Location was superb. Best place we have stayed at in Europe. Couldn't recommend highly enough!
Comentário negativo: A bar fridge would have been helpful, but that is all - everything else was wonderful!

Título do comentário: Excellent location, comfortable and friendly staff.
Comentário positivo: The hotel was wonderful.  It's perfectly located, comfortable and the staff is truly amazing.  A great stay!
Nettes kleines Hotel mit gutem FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck
Comentário negativo: Leider nachts laut , durch die direkte Citylage, wenn die PartygÃ¤nger auf dem Heimweg waren

Título do comentário: Conforto impecável, café da manhã delicioso.
Comentário positivo: A experiência no hotel Alecrim ao Chiado foi excepcional! Os atendentes Carla e Gonçalo merecem um destaque especial pela atenção impecável. Eles nos ajudaram com roteiros personalizados, forneceram mapas detalhados e até orientaram sobre as estações de transporte, tornando nossa estadia ainda mais prática e agradável. O quarto era extremamente confortável, muito bem limpo e preparado com cuidado. O café da manhã foi outro ponto alto, com uma variedade deliciosa e frutas incrivelmente saborosas. Sem dúvida, um lugar que recomendo e ao qual espero voltar!
Comentário negativo: Sem pontos negativos.

Título do comentário: Loved our stay in Lisbon - loved our hotel
Comentário positivo: Claudia and staff were all exceptional!  Wonderful location and nice breakfast!
Comentário negativo: It was all good

Título do comentário: The perfect location for any stay in Lisbon, but especially your 20th Wedding Anniversary!!
Comentário positivo:
Alecrim ao Chiado (Once upon a House) is just fabulous. We stayed for our 20th Wedding anniversary and they couldn't have done more. The hotel is boutique, but the service was perfect, from the reception, breakfast service and room service, we really can't fault a thing. 
The location was great, off the main squares so a little quieter, but perfect to find all the attractions whether you want to walk, tram or taxi. (Really close to Pink Street and the Tigris River)
Comentário negativo: Absolutely nothing. REALLY, we couldn't find one thing we didn't like about this hotel, its services or location. Nothing was too much trouble, the staff were so friendly and as we were there for a week we were always greeted with a smile. Even on the last day when we needed breakfast a little earlier it wasn't a problem.

Título do comentário: Ótima localização, quarto aconchegante.
Comentário positivo: Quarto espaçoso, limpo e hotel muito bem localizado.
Comentário negativo: O espaço do box do banheiro do quarto n.10 era minúsculo, o menor que já vimos, e isso realmente impactou nossa experiência no hotel.

Título do comentário: Lisbona nel cuore
Comentário positivo: Se cerchi una struttura comoda ai servizi, con rispetto della pulizia, gestita con maestria e ultima ma non ultima cosa una ottima colazione, sei nel posto giusto.

Título do comentário: Viaje en pareja a Lisboa
Comentário positivo: La ubicaciÃ³n y la amabilidad del personal.

Título do comentário: Foi como estar na casa da avó
Comentário positivo: Gostamos de tudo, localização, equipe, limpeza. É um "Hotel Boutique" muito agradável com excelente localização no Chiado. Mas o principal foi o atendimento. Nos permitiram entrar no quarto muito antes do horário do check in. Nosso voo chegou muito cedo a Lisboa e fomos ao Hotel às 9hs. Nos ofereceram o Café da Manhã e nos permitiram entrar no quarto às 10 hs. Melhor Hotel que fiquei em Portugal durante os 31 dias de viagem. Valeu cada centavo.
Comentário negativo: Tudo foi ótimo. Meu filho fez aniversário durante a estadia. No café da manhã fizeram um bolo e cantaram parabéns. Um carinho e cuidado com os hóspedes... sem igual. Nota 11

Título do comentário: Prima volgende keer weer !!
Comentário positivo: Aardig personeel en locatie is top!!
Comentário negativo: Dunne wanden je hoort vaak buren praten in de hoop dat ze minder hard praten!

Título do comentário: Excellent, exceeded my expectations!
Comentário positivo: Excellent hotel situated in the perfect location, lovely staff and great rooms.  Very spacious, high quality products in the bathrooms as well as nice coffee & tea facilities.  Whenever I return to Lisbon I will come back to this hotel, highly recommended!
Comentário negativo: The wifi didn't work as well at nighttime, no conditioner in the bathroom.

Comentário positivo: Palazzo storico dove c’è la struttura
Comentário negativo: Un aspetto un po’ decadente….testata in tessuto rotta,Wi-Fi mal funzionante,tv non funzionante,la non presenza del frigorifero in camera,colazione scadente

Título do comentário: Great location for getting to places.,some great restaurants and shops.
Comentário positivo:
The hotel was fabulous ,all the staff were friendly and very helpful.
Delicious breakfast with lovely staff.
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Título do comentário: Épatant
Comentário positivo: Personnel souriant, accueillant et professionnel.  Petit déjeuner délicieux. Établissement très bien situé.
Claudia die Chefin ist sehr herzlich und lieb...hilft bei allem sehr gerne...es hat uns alles gefallen...das Hotel hat einen besonderen Charme, der uns sehr glÃ¼cklich und zufrieden machte

Comentário positivo: Tolles HOTEL mit sehr geschmackvoller Einrichtung ...sehr liebevoll gestaltet
Comentário negativo: Zu kurz

Comentário positivo: Ambiente
Comentário negativo: No es recordable para personas mayores  tiene muchas escaleras

Comentário positivo: Spacious room and very friendly staff. Breakfast also very good.
Comentário negativo: Bed too small and rooms not sound-proof.

Título do comentário: Loved this hotel, the only unfortunate thing we really struggled with was the bed was so hard and we’d wake each morning
Comentário positivo:
Great breakfast 
Beautiful rooms
Fantastic staff 
Great location
Comentário negativo:
