Título do comentário: Great location and stay - definitely recommend
Comentário positivo: Great fresh breakfast selection, central location and really big room
Comentário negativo: Nothing!

Título do comentário: Hervorragend
Comentário positivo: Wir und unser kleiner Sohn haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Sehr sehr freundliches, zuvorkommendes und sympathisches Personal, leckeres Frühstück und wunderschönes Zimmer. Lage kann für Familie mit Kleinkind nicht besser sein!
Comentário negativo: Nichts :)!

Título do comentário: Excelente hotel.
Comentário positivo:
Equipe super atenciosa, prestativa e simpática. Café da manhã excelente. Quartos  aconchegantes e ótima localização. 
É a terceira vez que me hospedo nesse hotel. Se futuramente voltar a Lisboa, com certeza ficarei novamente hospedada no Alecrim.

Título do comentário: Perfect !
Comentário positivo:
Super friendly, kind and helpful staff.  

Comfortable, super clean and stylish.  Great value for money.

Título do comentário: Great location, very friendly staff and comfortable rooms
Comentário positivo: Charming and characterful. The rooms aren’t the most modern, but have a great character about them. Breakfast was a small selection but the eggs were cooked fresh to order and you always left feeling full.
Viešbutis centre, įėjimas į patį viešbutį ir į kambarį su kodais. Labai paslaugus personalas, gali patarti, ką pamatyti, kur pavalgyti. Labai skanūs ir gausūs pusryčiai.

Alecrim al Chiado is a beautiful place to come back to and relax after a busy day exploring Lisbon.  The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful.  The location is wonderful.  I especially enjoyed the breakfast, really a nice variety of fresh fruits and pastries, eggs made to order, etc.  it was a nice way to begin the day.
Excellent location, room comfortable, staff very friendly and helpful
Comentário negativo: No issues with anything

Título do comentário: Great linens
Comentário positivo:
I live the property location and it’s so full of history and oozes charm. The linens are divine, great staff!  Very safe. 
There is no elevator just so you know ahead. There are several late night clubs so in a Friday or Saturday you will get early morning noise, Lisbon is know for its late nights. Some great restaurants walking distance. Front staff were great helping with restaurants. Breakfast was ok, I’m not a big breakfast person but love a good coffee which they offere
Comentário negativo: Just what I mentioned above, I would stay there again

Comentário positivo: It is an excellent boutique hotel in a great location. The staff are excellent. They are genuinely warm and welcoming, and no question was too much of an ask. I would unequivocally recommend the hotel.
Comentário negativo: Breakfast was the only less-than-stellar option at this hotel.

Título do comentário: Friendly, super comfortable and staff were like our guides and support people .
Comentário positivo: For first timers in Lisbon we stayed for 1 week at this hotel. Plenty of space in rooms and  the staff exceptional and breakfasts a feast in themselves. . We relied on staff helping us navigate a new city and they excelled. Highly recommend
Comentário negativo: I can’t think of anything more they could have done to make our stay so comfortable and the city so accessible

Título do comentário: Nice place in a convenient location
Comentário positivo: Convenient location, big and clean rooms, comfortable beds
Comentário negativo: Lots of stairs with no elevator

Título do comentário: Fabulous stay would highly recommend!
Comentário positivo: Brilliant location, staff could not have been more helpful and accommodating. Breakfast was incredible wonderful choice. Fabulous stay from start to finish would highly recommended.
Comentário negativo: Nothing it was perfect

Título do comentário: חווויה ממש, ממליצה לך ☺️
Comentário positivo:
חדרים מרווחים, נקי, צוות נעים מאוד. מיקום מוצלח וגם שקט שזה משהו שקשה למצוא באיזור זה.
היו לנו כמה תקלות מינוריות עם החשמל והכספת כולם טופלו בצורה נעימה ויעילה.
Comentário negativo: המיטה הייתה מעט קשה בעינינו וארוחת הבוקר חוזרת על עצמה כל יום, היינו שמחים לגיוון ויותר ירקות, אבל זה דיי שולי.

Comentário positivo: Freundliches Personal. Gut gesichert.  Zentrale Lage.
Comentário negativo: Toilette über Treppen erreichbar.  Für Personen mit Handicap problematisch. Für uns aber nicht. Frühstück ist ausbaufähig

Título do comentário: Perfect hotel in Lisbon!
Comentário positivo: We absolutely loved our stay! Every single staff member was so friendly and lovely, the breakfast was great (especially the omelette station), the room was spacious and comfortable, and the location was perfect and central, without being near the super touristy street. We would 100% stay again!

Título do comentário: Beautiful
Comentário positivo: Amazing boutique hotel in an excellent location.  Our room was beautiful, spacious and perfectly clean.  Breakfast was top quality, and all of the staff very friendly and helpful.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear James,

Thank you for taking the time to rate our hotel with the highest mark! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we met your expectations. We endeavour to provide exceptional service  to all our guests and we are delighted that we were able to do so for you. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for another exceptional stay!

Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: The staff were wonderful with us and very helpful. I really enjoyed the stay and have booked them for the return trip. It had everything we needed.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Lori,

Thank you very much for your exceptional rating and your very flattering comments. It was a pleasure to meet you and Katherine, and we are delighted to hear that we'll be seeing you again in the not too distant future.

I send you some Lisbon sunshine to soften the Canadian chill :-)

Warm Regards
Gonçalo

Título do comentário: Lovely
Comentário positivo: The hotel was charming and welcoming and the hosts could not be more accommodating. The breakfast was beyond my expectations and had something for everyone. My only wish would be written instructions for the TV and coffee maker although I was given verbal instructions by one of the staff.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Katherine,

Thank you very much for your exceptional rating and your very flattering comments. It was a pleasure to meet you and Lori, and we hope you will visit us again in the near future. 

We've also taken note of your comment about the TV and coffee machine instructions. Thank you very much. Our aim is to keep improving, so comments like yours are very much appreciated.

Kindest Regards,
Gonçalo
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Top Hotel
Comentário positivo:
Super nettes Personal. Das Frühstück wird sehr liebevoll präsentiert, war abwechslungsreich und schmackhaft.
Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral, daher häufiger Lärm von größeren Gruppen. Trotzdem ist das Hotel sehr empfehlenswert.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Simone,

It was a pleasure to welcome you and Jens to Alecrim ao Chiado.

Thank you very much for your recent stay and for giving us such a good rating.

We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for another outstanding stay!

Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Alojamiento muy recomendable
Comentário positivo: Buena ubicación, muy limpio, calidad en el desayuno y habitación muy cómoda.
Comentário negativo: Por poner una pega, el check in es muy tarde. Hasta las 15h no puedes pasar, ni media hora antes.
Resposta do alojamento:
Thank you for your feedback, Belén. We allow early check-in when possible, but unfortunately, for logistical reasons, it is not always possible for our guests to check in before the standard time (3pm).

However, we are very happy with your review and hope to host you again in the near future when you return to Lisbon.

Warm Regards,
Gonçalo
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Einfach super! Immer wieder gerne
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Marina,

Your 10/10 rating fills us with joy! We're thrilled that you had a wonderful stay with us. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal, and your feedback motivates us to continue delivering exceptional service. We can't wait to host you again and provide another outstanding experience.

Kindest Regards,
Gonçalo
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Das Frühstück war sehr gut! Alles vorhanden, was wir brauchten.
Comentário negativo: Das Zimmer war leider im basement, auf strassenniveau gelegen, mit Tür/Fenster zur Straße. Dunkel, ohne Möglichkeit, nach draußen zu schauen. Da stand man sofort auf der Straße. Das war der einzige Nachteil!😫
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Ilse,
Thank you for your comment. We're glad you enjoyed your stay, but sad that your room didn't live up to your expectations. Of the same type as the one you booked, only one of the rooms is on an upper floor, so although the room you booked is a great room, it doesn't really have a view. 
We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a more pleasant stay!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Confort
Comentário positivo: El trato , el desayuno, la ubicación, el hotel.
Comentário negativo: Me gustó todo
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimada Maria,
Muchas gracias por su reciente estancia y por otorgarnos una puntuación perfecta. Sus elogiosos comentarios nos han alegrado el día. Esperamos ansiosos su próxima visita.
Saludos cordiales,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo:
Un excellent week-end.
Très bon emplacement. Le personnel adorable. Le petit dej parfait. 

Le seul petit  inconvénient que nous avons trouvé c'est la literie, le lit trop dur.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Céline,
Your 10/10 rating fills us with joy! We're thrilled that you had a wonderful stay with us. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal, and your feedback motivates us to continue delivering exceptional service. We can't wait to host you again and provide another outstanding experience. We'd also like to thank you for your comment about the bed, and we're sorry it wasn't to your liking.
Warm Regards,
Gonçalo

Bon emplacement

Personnel adorable
Comentário negativo: Un peu bruyant côté rue mais ça va dans l’ensemble

Comentário positivo: Alles
Comentário negativo: Niks

Título do comentário: Charme perfeito no Chiado
Comentário positivo: Localização e decoração

Título do comentário: Prima hotel voor halve marathon!
Comentário positivo: Centrale ligging, dicht bij metro
Comentário negativo: Lawaaierige omgeving, bedden te hard
Resposta do alojamento:

Warm Regards,

Comentário positivo: O café da manhã foi bom porém, repetitivo.
Comentário negativo: A variedade
Resposta do alojamento:

Muito obrigado pela excelente avaliação que nos fez! Ficamos muito contentes por ter correspondido às sua expectativas, apesar da crítica em relação à variedade do café da manhã, a qual agradecemos para que possamos melhorar o nosso serviço.
Cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Wonderful little boutique hotel.
Comentário positivo: We loved staying at Alecrim ao Chiado. We found the location to be perfect as we could walk everywhere. The staff were very friendly. Claudia and Gonçalo went out of their way to make us feel welcome. They offered good advice on sights to see and how to get to them. They also made dinner reservations for us. The room was spacious, the bed very comfortable and the breakfasts were top notch. We definitely recommend Alecrim ao Chiado.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Claude,
Thank you for your recent stay and for awarding us a perfect rating. Your glowing feedback made our day! We're dedicated to providing memorable experiences, and your satisfaction lets us know we're on the right track. It was a pleasure to welcome you and we hope you'll come back in the near future.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Excellent hosts.  Very kind and inviting.  Terrific restaurant recommendations.  Great breakfast.
Comentário negativo: The carpet in room 7 needs cleaning.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Rodney,
Your 10/10 rating fills us with joy! We're thrilled that you had a wonderful stay with us. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal, and your feedback motivates us to continue delivering exceptional service. We can't wait to host you again and provide another outstanding experience. We have taken note of your comments regarding the cleanliness of the carpet. We apologize for what happened and housekeeping has been alerted so that it doesn't happen again.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Heerlijk vakantie
Comentário positivo: Fantastische service en ontbijt. Mooie en schone kamer.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Alexander, High quality breakfast and attentive hospitality are two of our core values, so we’re thrilled to hear that you experienced both during your stay. We can’t wait to see you again 
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Well located, excellent breakfast, large rooms and very helpful staff.
Comentário positivo: This hotel is very well located and the staff are wonderful to deal with. It is a beautiful boutique hotel, the rooms are large and the breakfast was excellent.
Comentário negativo: With the great central location comes street noise and outside lighting, and although the rooms are large and well equipped, as an older building the walls are not as well insulated for noise. I would also add that the bed was not as comfortable as others we have had (it was quite firm) and they could use new pillows. Overall though, still a lovely hotel.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Michelle,

We are delighted with your compliments about the hotel's location, the staff, the breakfast and the size of the rooms.

We're sorry that your stay wasn't perfect because of the noise from outside, but being in the city center, it's sometimes almost impossible to avoid it.

We have taken note of your comment regarding the bed and pillows so that we can improve the quality of our service.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Fantastic, would definitely recommend.
Comentário positivo: Lovely room, great breakfast, very friendly and helpful staff, the location is perfect for exploring the city.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Steve,
Thank you for taking the time to rate our hotel with 10/10. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we met your expectations. We strive to provide an exceptional service to all of our guests, and we're delighted that we could do so for you. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for another outstanding stay!
Kindest Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Great stay, would return.
Comentário positivo: Well situated and wonderful staff.
Comentário negativo: Noisy bar right outside the window means late nights especially on the weekend.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Elisa,
It was a pleasure to have you as a guest. 
We are very grateful for your excellent review. We are very happy that we met your expectations, despite the noise outside, which, being in the city center, is sometimes impossible to avoid.
We hope to have you with us again on another occasion.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Een heerlijk verblijf met goed ontbijt en dichtbij bezienswaardigheden.

Ontbijt was erg lekker.

Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Loved it and will definitely stay here again.
Comentário positivo: I loved how big and spacious the room was and the location couldn’t be beat. My daughter and I got a deluxe suite.
Comentário negativo: Not much I can say as I liked everything about it.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Claire,
Your 10/10 rating fills us with joy! We're thrilled that you and your daughter  had a wonderful stay with us. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal, and your feedback motivates us to continue delivering exceptional service. We can't wait to host you again.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Our room was very comfortable. We appreciated having a kettle and coffee machine. This hotel is in a great location.
Comentário positivo: All of the reception staff were so friendly and kind. We appreciated their restaurant recommendations.
Comentário negativo: No complaints
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Veronica,
Thank you so much for your exceptional rating. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we were delighted with your comments about our staff. 
We can't wait to host you again and provide another outstanding experience.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: The staff is wonderful!
Comentário positivo: Warm, helpful staff. Delicious breakfast!
Comentário negativo: The room facing the wine bar got pretty noisy at midnight when the bar closed.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Cheryl,
We are delighted that you described our team as wonderful. The fact that our guests appreciate our breakfast is very important to us, as it's with a little pleasure like this that you get the day off to a good start. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Great location, cute decor, nice staff.
Comentário positivo: Location.
Comentário negativo: Suite located on the same floor as reception, we were able to hear noises in the morning from the lobby & hallway and from upstairs. I would consider the room more as a large room than a suite.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Helina,
Thank you for providing this feedback. 
We are re glad you enjoyed our staff, the decor and the location of the hotel. We're sorry that the noise didn't allow you to enjoy your stay to the full. We have taken note of your comment regarding the room.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Satisfatória
Comentário positivo: Ótima localização. Como nosso voo era muito cedo, saí antes do início do café da manhã, que já estava pago. A equipe de atendimento se comprometeu a deixar algo preparado na porta do quarto, para o desdejum, mas isso não aconteceu, frustrando, nesse ponto, nossa expectativa.
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimado Nicolau,
Muito obrigado pela avaliação que nos fez.
Pedimos-lhe as mais sinceras desculpas por lamentavelmente não lhe ter sido deixado, como prometido, o snack à porta do seu quarto, na noite anterior à sua saída, o que se deveu a um lapso da nossa parte.
Esperamos voltar a tê-lo como hóspede num futuro próximo.
Com os melhores cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excellent
Comentário positivo: Location and people were excellent.  Breakfast was very good.
Comentário negativo: The noise from the “By the Wine” bar got rather loud.  Our room 10 was right across the street and the revelers were loud.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Jeff,

Thank you for choosing us for your stay in Lisbon and giving us a 10/10 rating. 
We're delighted that you have enjoyed our breakfast and our staff. Regarding the noise coming from the restaurant, given that we are located in the historic city centre, there is sometimes a little more buzz coming from outside.
We hope to host you again in the near future.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Perfetto per un soggiorno a Lisbona, in pieno centro, hotel tranquillo e nessun rumore né interno né dalla strada
Comentário positivo:

La colazione è ottima
Il personale gentilissimo è sempre disponibile
Comentário negativo: Niente
Resposta do alojamento:

Thank you for the kind feedback, Alex. We work hard to provide outstanding service, and it makes us happy to hear that guests feel taken care of. It was a pleasure to have you as a guest.
Warm Regards,
Gonçalo

Comentário positivo: Wir können nur das Beste berichten und entsprechend bewerten. Ein super Boutique-Hotel, genial im Chiado-Stadtteil gelegen ...das Hotel und das gesamte Team vor Ort war aussergewöhnlich. Wir würden sofort wieder kommen.
Resposta do alojamento:

Man merkt das die Gäste ganz oben stehen und die Chefin des Hauses sehr hinterher ist das alles läuft…
Würde jederzeit wiederkommen♥️

Título do comentário: Amazing and unforgettable.
Comentário positivo: Alecrim ao Chiado is a real rarity of a find! We were so impressed with every aspect of the hotel from the decor of the rooms and the fantastic breakfasts to the branding of the toiletries! The staff were amazing and took their time to make us feel super welcome and always greeted us with a smile. I’m just sad we had to leave!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Charley

Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Great location, amazing staffs and cozy room with a perfect location
Comentário positivo:
This is a perfect location for first time Lisbon explorer. The hotel is self is located right in the heart of all the good tourist spots in Lisbon, with everything being walking distance away. It’s clean, cozy, and yet feeling so private. It feels more like a holiday house than your traditional/ impersonal hotel. The staffs at the hotel are exceedingly lovely and helpful. 

I must comment on the hotel breakfast. Whilst some reviews note the breakfast to be limited, we have the opposite experience. We found the breakfast to be excellent! It has reasonable variety. Most importantly, each item was of high quality. For example, they provided home made yogurt, homemade pastry and freshly cut fruit salad each morning, in addition to other buffet options. We have found the quality of breakfast to be better than other 5 stars hotels we’ve stayed in. I highly recommend this hotel and cannot wait to come back again!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Yu,
First of all we would like to thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review of your stay. It was a great pleasure to have you as a guest and we are very grateful to have given you such a pleasant experience. Our aim is to make our guests feel at home. Your description and subsequent evaluation of our breakfast makes us very happy, as there's nothing like starting the day with a great meal. Hope to host you again in the near future.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Tolles Boutiquehotel im Ciado
Comentário positivo: Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt, das Personal war außerordentlich zuvorkommend. Top-Lage und sehr gutes Frühstück. Einziger, kleiner Kritikpunkt: die kleinen Kapazitäten des Frühstücksraums zur 'rush-hour' am Morgen.
Resposta do alojamento:

Thank you very much for your review and feedback. We are delighted that we were able to contribute to providing you with a great stay in our city. Regarding your comment about the rush hour at breakfast, fortunately it rarely happens, but sometimes if the guests all have breakfast at the same time, as happened during your stay, the service becomes less fast. Sorry for the inconvenience.
We hope you will visit us again in the near future.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Óptima localização, bons quartos e funcionários impecáveis.
Comentário positivo: Decoração. Simpatia dos funcionários. O quarto selecionado era o “duplo pequeno” mas de pequeno nada tinha, era muito espaçoso. A localização era óptima.  Máquina de café no quarto.
Comentário negativo: O quarto não estava devidamente limpo. Os fios das lâmpadas penduradas sobre as mesas de cabeceira estavam cobertos de cotão. Junto à cama e por baixo também havia cotāo e pelos. A cama não era cama de casal como diziam, eram dois colchões que estavam juntos e tinham um protetor por cima da união. O pequeno almoço era medíocre em termos de oferta e os funcionários só falavam em inglês e mal percebiam o português. Antes de irmos para o quarto deixar as coisas foram meter spray para cheirar melhor mas preferia que não o tivessem feito porque o cheiro era muito intenso.

Título do comentário: Foi uma estadia ótima

Comentário negativo: “Blindex” do banheiro pela metade, ocasionando piso molhado no banheiro

Título do comentário: Fabulous, Characterful Boutique Hotel
Comentário positivo:
Great location for exploring Lisbon. Walking distance to lots of sights nearby. Room size was very big with plenty of space to relax. The breakfast area downstairs was fabulous, oozing with character. All the food was of  a high quality and eggs were cooked to order. The area itself is quite compact, however, so when the hotel is busy there are occasions when a table is not available.

Reception staff were extremely helpful and friendly. We had an issue with lost luggage on arrival in Lisbon and the staff were so obliging in helping us liaise with the airport and getting our luggage delivered to the hotel.

We thoroughly enjoyed our 4 nights a Alecrim au Chiado.
Comentário negativo: Nothing - faultless!!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Morag,
It was a pleasure meeting you and having you as our guest.
We were very flattered not only by your review, but also by the time you took to describe the hotel, our staff and the breakfast. We are delighted to have contributed to making your stay in Lisbon a memorable one.

Comentário positivo: Nous avons beaucoup apprécié la localisation de l'hôtel, qui permet de se déplacer très facilement soit à pied, soit en transports en commun. Comentário negativo: L'insonorisation de la pièce (on entend très bien les autres clients) et les bruits de la rue, très fréquentée, qui ont été gênants la nuit.

Also as this is an old building with wooden floors and wooden doors I could hear our neughbors coming and going, closing the doors.

Título do comentário: Charming hotel in Lisbon near metro
Comentário positivo: Claudia was friendly and helpful.  We arrived early and she worked hard to get our room ready by 2pm before our tour.   The room was large and the beds comfortable.  The breakfast staff and food choices were exceptional and delicious.  The pastries and fresh squeezed orange juice were a plus.
Comentário negativo: We booked out reservation 6 months in advance and were staying 4 nights.  We emailed in our reservation and requested a room on the quiet side of the building but they were not able to accommodate so that was disappointed but I would still go back to this charming hotel.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Kathryn,
Thank you very much for your warm comments about our staff, breakfast and the hotel's location.Regarding the fact that we couldn't assign you the room on the side of the hotel that you preferred, whenever possible we try to respect the guest's preference, but this time, for logistical reasons, this wasn't possible, as the rooms had already been assigned for a long time. 
Kindest Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: An Exceptional Boutique Hotel
Comentário positivo:
A truly beautiful boutique hotel
Large comfortable room, beds, pillows, decor, cleanliness, ambiance. Perfect location to walk downhill to the train station or a short walk to the little tram stop
Delicious breakfast with eggs cooked to order & friendly ladies in the kitchen
The standout for us was the genuine care & helpfulness extended to us by Victor, Goncalo & Claudia. Ask them anything & they are so willing to help with recommendations for places to visit, how to get there, places to eat & all proved to be excellent suggestions 
We saw so much in such a short amount of time & all thanks to their wonderful help

Turning on the shower, for us was tricky
Just ask for a demo of how it all works
Ingenious really

Título do comentário: Beautiful location, well appointed room and excellent staff
Comentário positivo: Reception was fast and the personnel friendly and helpful. Breakfast was very nice. The hotel is centrally located and near excellent restaurants. The room was well appointed and the bed very comfortable.
Comentário negativo: We had an odd restroom, which was atop 3 steep stairs and the shower did not drain well.

Kind regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Staff very friendly & helpful, location is great being just a few minutes walk from busy Chiado area. Breakfast is good.
Comentário negativo: Our rooms are on street levels hence a bit noisy, also can hear heavy footfalls from upstairs.

Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: A sua estadia em Lisboa será perfeita neste hotel se não ficar nos quartos 12 e 14
Comentário positivo: O hotel é muito charmoso, super bem localizado! A Iara foi muito atenciosa. Na manhã seguinte (havíamos dito que iríamos sair muito cedo e perder o café da manhã) deixaram em uma mesinha do lado de fora do quarto: frutas, biscoitos e suco. Sensacional!
Comentário negativo: Ficamos no quarto 14 que seria perfeito se não fosse o barulho durante toda a madrugada. Ele fica no nível da rua e a janela não possui uma vedação adequada para barrar o som que vem de fora. Como o hotel está localizado  na área mais turística da cidade  e o quarto faz face com uma rua de bares e restaurantes, o barulho só diminuiu depois das 4. As 5 o despertador tocou para irmos embora…não conseguimos dormir
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimada Andrea,
Muito obrigado pela sua excelente avaliação e pela nota máxima que nos atribuiu!
Ficamos muito satisfeitos por saber que gostou do charme e da localização do nosso hotel, bem como da atenção dedicada pela Iara.
Lamentamos o incómodo causado pelo ruído durante a madrugada, especialmente devido à nossa localização numa zona turística e animada da cidade.
Agradecemos as suas amáveis palavras e esperamos ter a oportunidade de a receber novamente para uma estadia mais tranquila.

Com os melhores cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excellent stay, would go there again!
Comentário positivo: We stayed at Alecrim ao Chiado for our family mini-vacation. The hotel is a cute boutique hotel with an excellent location, close to several places where you can simply walk. The staff was very friendly and courteous, and even though the official check in time was 3 pm, they provided the facilities so that we were not inconvenienced. The staff was always willing to provide extra amenities such as extra water or milk for our child. The rooms were sufficient in size. The breakfast was amazing. Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Comentário negativo: The rooms could benefit from a small refridgerator.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Aniruddha,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review and for awarding us the highest rating!
We’re delighted to know that you and your family enjoyed your mini-holiday with us at Alecrim ao Chiado. It’s great to hear you appreciated our central location, the charm of our boutique hotel, and the kindness and attentiveness of our team. We’re especially happy that you felt well taken care of and that your child’s needs were met with extra touches.
Thank you also for your suggestion regarding a small fridge in the room — we truly value your feedback. 
It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to welcoming you back again!

Claudia nos atendió como los dioses desde que llegamos temprano y muy cansados, nos permitió ingresar a la habitación muy rápido para q pudiéramos descansar,  y despues nos dio consejos para paseos muy bien acertados. Título do comentário: Great hotel, great location.
Comentário positivo: This is a lovely hotel in the Chiado district. We were greeted, on arrival, by two friendly members of staff. Our room was available even though we had arrived ahead of check-in. The hotel was once a house and has a quirky feel to it, with stone staircases and walls. The check-in staff gave us a map of the area and offered advice about what to visit.  Breakfast was delicious, with fresh fruit, charcuterie, pastries and eggs cooked to order by lovely staff. The hotel is in an ideal location, close to the river and to Baixa-Chiado metro station. I’d definitely recommend this hotel.
Comentário negativo: The bed was too hard for me (a minor problem) and the street outside was very noisy at night.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Catherine,
Thank you so much for your thoughtful and detailed review! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciated the charm of our hotel in the heart of Chiado.
It’s wonderful to know that you felt warmly welcomed by our team and that your room was ready upon arrival. We're glad you liked the unique character of the building, our helpful recommendations, and especially the breakfast prepared with care by our lovely staff.
We appreciate your feedback regarding the bed and the street noise. We understand how important comfort is and will take your comments into account as we continue to improve the guest experience.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we truly hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Lisbon!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Alles
Location, staff.
Comentário negativo: The room number 12 is opposite to the bar, therefore it is very noisy during the night. The towels were old and one of the towels had a big hole in it. There is a big humidity in the room and and has a bad smell. Also, there is a mold in the bathroom.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Alicija,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.
We’re pleased to know you appreciated our location and staff, but we’re truly sorry to hear that your experience did not meet expectations.We sincerely apologize for the noise from the bar, the condition of the towels, and the issues with humidity and odor in the room. Additionally, the presence of mold in the bathroom is completely unacceptable, and we take this matter very seriously.We value your feedback, as it helps us improve, and we hope to have the opportunity to offer you a much better experience in the future.

Kind regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excellent hotel. The staff, location and the room are all faultless! 100% recommend.
Comentário positivo: The building itself being historic was very authentic to the city. The staff upon arrival and throughout the stay were absolutely fantastic. The breakfast was superb and one thing to note - I asked for some chillies/chilli sauce for the omelette. They didn’t have anything to hand at that moment. The next morning - the breakfast staff had remembered my request and put chillies in the omelette. Cannot fault the service at all. The room was very spacious and the bed itself was so comfortable. The location is so central and ideal. Would 100% recommend to stay at this wonderful property and we will be returning on our next stay in Lisbon.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Duncan,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review and for recommending us so highly!
We’re absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay — from the authenticity of our historic building to the comfort of your room, our central location, and especially the service provided by our team.
Your kind words about our staff truly mean a lot to us. We’re so glad they made a lasting impression, and it’s lovely to hear about the small detail with the peppers.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit to Lisbon!

Warmest regards,
Alecrim Team

Our room was clean and comfortable and the room facilities were good.
The hotel is well placed to explore the immediate locality.
Comentário negativo: The hill! Tbh we didn't do our research and hadn't realised the hotel is on a steep hill. This would be a huge problem for anyone struggling with mobility.

Título do comentário: Good location - nicely decorated room but sadly no privacy in the room
Comentário positivo: Lovely large room which I was told had recently been renovated  and had a lovely decor - great location - friendly staff - breakfast was ok too
Comentário negativo: The room was on the lower ground level which meant walking up and down some stairs to get to it but more importantly the thing that disappointed me the most was the fact that it has a window towards the street behind and  the room was ground floor level from that side, due to the city’s hilly nature, so people on that street could see straight into my room and I had to have my curtains closed almost all the time - I took a long time going through the photos on the site to choose a room which is not on the lower / ground level so am disappointed that this room was given to me and the hotel did not offer an alternative when I went to discuss this issue with them after I saw the room - the room given to me was not in the photos provided to the booking site and those rooms seemed to be on higher levels and had more privacy - the breakfast room was nicely presented but it was in a windowless area just opposite my room so in a way in the basement area and could near cars driving on top sometimes - the shower was in the middle of the room and the blind that was provided to give a bit of privacy did not work which was an issue since people in the street could see in the room - had to have the curtains drawn when showering anyway cause when I came out of the shower people could see me also - anyways just saying based on reviews I was expecting more from this hotel and was slightly disappointed although the decoration was lovely and to my taste but I don’t believe I would stay there again because of these issues unless they can guarantee a room on the higher floors maybe
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Narmin,
Thank you very much for sharing your detailed feedback with us.
We’re glad to hear that you appreciated the beautiful decoration, spaciousness, and location of your room, as well as our friendly staff and breakfast service.
However, we are truly sorry to learn about the privacy concerns you experienced due to the room’s location on the ground floor and the issues with the shower placement. We understand how important privacy is, and we apologize for any inconvenience this caused during your stay.Thank you for bringing these matters to our attention.

Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: A Unique Boutique Hotel on a hill.
Comentário positivo:
This is a unique boutique hotel. The staff are so attentive and helpful.
They go above and beyond to make your stay wonderful.
The breakfast is outstanding. You are served Fresh fruit, yogurt and choice of eggs at your table along with a lovely buffet.
 We felt a bit like we were living in a castle. And we were the King & Queen. It was a wonderful stay. Special Thanks to Iera & Claudia.
Comentário negativo:
There is no fridge in the room but you can get ice. They also gave us an ice pack to keep our bottle of wine cold.
The idea is you are not sitting in your room but out enjoying Lisbon!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Leslie,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review and for sharing such kind words about your stay with us!

We're truly honored that you felt like royalty during your time here — what a beautiful compliment! It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed the charm of our boutique hotel, the attentive service from our team, and the breakfast experience. Iara and Claudia will be especially touched by your mention — we’ll be sure to pass along your thanks.

We appreciate your understanding regarding the mini fridge, and we’re glad the ice and cooler bag helped keep your wine chilled!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excellent stay in this super great centered hotel
Comentário positivo: Perfect Location ! Very friendly and helpful staff. Excellent room size! Perfect breakfasts, lots of options, including various cooked eggs.
Comentário negativo: It's a hard mattress. I had no issue with it but for awareness.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Valbise,

Thank you so much for your review.
We’re thrilled to know you enjoyed our central location, the spacious room, and our varied breakfast options. It's also wonderful to hear that our team made a positive impression with their friendliness and support.
Thank you as well for mentioning the mattress. We understand that preferences can vary, and your feedback is valuable as we aim to ensure comfort for all our guests.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we hope to welcome you back to Alecrim ao Chiado on your next visit to Lisbon!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Wonderful 1 night stay in a lovely Hotel with an exceptionally friendly team
Comentário positivo: Brilliant hotel in a great location close to many local attractions in Lisbon. The whole place is super clean the rooms are wonderful and large. The breakfast choice was superb. The best thing of all are the exceptional team that work at the Hotel Claudia, Goncalo and Iara are so friendly and welcoming and do everything they can to make your stay memorable and they definitely succeeded in that for our trip, they truly are wonderful people. We would always try to stay here when back in Lisbon
Comentário negativo: Everything was FANTASTIC
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Paul,

Thank you so much for your amazing review — we’re truly touched by your kind words!
We’re delighted that you had such a wonderful one-night stay with us and that you enjoyed our central location, clean and spacious rooms, and the breakfast selection. Most of all, we’re incredibly grateful for your lovely comments about our team.
Cláudia, Gonçalo, and Iara will be so happy to hear that they helped make your stay truly memorable. 
It means a lot to us that you would choose to stay with us again when returning to Lisbon. We’ll be looking forward to welcoming you back with open arms!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário negativo: Our room had a toilet that had a few steps and I found that uncomfortable

Your comments help us improve, and we will certainly take this into consideration for future room assignments and improvements.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to Alecrim ao Chiado on your next visit to Lisbon!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Very lovely and beautiful hotel staff
Comentário positivo: Staff were absolutely beautiful people. Claudia was soooo gorgeous and went out of way to help us where she could.  Room was spacious and clean
Comentário negativo: Sadly our aircon did not work at all for the 2 night stay so we had 2 fans and a room cooler provided to help with the heat. Unfortunately this made the night sleeping a little hard due to the noise.

Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience with us.
We’re truly happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you found our team (especially Cláudia) so helpful and welcoming. She will be thrilled to know she made such a positive impression! We're also glad to hear you appreciated the spaciousness and cleanliness of your room.
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the air conditioning during your stay. We understand how important a comfortable night’s rest is, and we’re very sorry that the temporary solution affected your sleep. Please know that we are actively working on resolving this issue to prevent it from happening in the future.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we hope to welcome you back again under more comfortable conditions next time.

Comentário negativo: Só não gostei da disposição do banheiro. O box fica logo na entrada, sem paredes, e o vaso sanitário fica em um nível mais elevado, com três degraus. Não que isso tenha atrapalhado a hospedagem mas não gostei dessa disposição.

Esperamos recebê-la novamente no Alecrim ao Chiado numa próxima visita a Lisboa!

Título do comentário: Excellent staff, location, and quality of room.
Comentário positivo: The staff were all friendly and helpful. The room was huge and comfortable. The breakfast was great with a lot of variety. I loved having a coffee machine in the room.
Comentário negativo: The bed was a bit uncomfortable. The people in the room above us could be heard walking around and made it hard for me to sleep.
Resposta do alojamento:

We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our staff, your room, and the variety of our breakfast.

We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Alecrim ao Chiado in the near future.

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Very cute and nice hotel, especially the staff at the reception. The rooms are spacious and even if the hotel is very central, it's very quiet inside.
Comentário negativo: The breakfast is only from 08-10 and it's a very small room, so it can get rather crowded, the breakfast is simple but pretty good.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Daniela,
Thank you so much for your kind review! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay, especially our location, spacious rooms, and the warm welcome from our team.
We appreciate your feedback about breakfast as well. 
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Lovely Staff, Property and Great Location
Comentário positivo: The room was spotless, very comfortable bed, great shower pressure plenty of hot water and lovely toiletries. As the temps outside were 97-104 degrees, A/C was critical and it kept the room very comfortable. Included breakfast was wonderful, with an attentive staff who also make omelets to order. Claudia pays close attention to detail, which no doubt accounts for how impeccable the property is.  Loved “By the Wine” on backstreet Ruas das Flores with great atmosphere, food, wine variety and just steps from our room. On a busy street, but didn’t find it noisy.  Ideal location with short walk to the river, train station, Pink Street and Rossio Square.  Secured building and in an area that felt very safe to us. We were with a larger group that stayed at a more expensive hotel and after seeing their property we were so happy we chose Alecrim.
Comentário negativo: The staff never made it seem bothersome, but instead of having them take time out of their busy schedule to fill water bottles, it would be nice to have a filtered water station where we could have poured our own water.  It was 95+ degrees outside during our stay and one morning we left before the staff arrived so were not able to fill our bottles.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Valerie,
Thank you so much for your wonderful and detailed review! We’re thrilled to hear that you had such a comfortable stay and appreciated the cleanliness of the room, the powerful shower, the efficient A/C, and our breakfast service — including the omelets made to order. Your kind words about Claudia and the attention to detail truly mean a lot to us.
We're also very happy to know you enjoyed the location, felt safe, and had the chance to explore the neighborhood, including “By the Wine” just steps away.
Thank you as well for your thoughtful suggestion about a filtered water station.
It was a pleasure having you with us. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Lovely hotel!
Resposta do alojamento:

Título do comentário: An incredible find where luxury meets beauty
Comentário positivo: This is a boutique hotel in a beautifully renovated old house. The staff is incredibly helpful, polite and smiling. The rooms beautifully decorated and soundproof. The hotel itself is a gem inside and out and is very conveniently in proximity to major parts of the city to visit. Breakfast was served in a beautiful authentic old room, with exquisite plates. The mixture of art, and authentic foundations from old times to very tasteful renovations in this hotel is amazing.  What a find!
Comentário negativo: everything was perfect.
Resposta do alojamento:

Thank you so much for your amazing review and the perfect rating!

We’re so glad everything was perfect during your stay, and it was a pleasure to have you with us. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Situé proche Lisbonne bas proche métro gare restos etc. Attention toutefois ça monte 😁
Comentário negativo:
La douche est sans intimité car dans la chambre. Pour accéder aux toilettes des marches hautes qui pour moi n étaient pas dérangeantes mais il faudrait informer pour les personnes avec difficultés motrices. 
Le matelas pour moi trop dur.

We also sincerely appreciate your feedback regarding the shower design, the access to the bathroom, and the firmness of the mattress. Your comments are very valuable, and we will certainly consider them, especially regarding accessibility information for guests with mobility concerns.
Thank you again for staying with us. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future!

Your comments are important to us, and we will take them into consideration as we continue working to improve guest comfort. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again in the future (perhaps in a room on a higher floor) for a more peaceful stay.

Comentário positivo: Absolutely faultless stay from start to finish, couldn't recommend highly enough, I would rate this hotel 100 stars if I could, location is phenomenal and the staff and their attentiveness exceeded all expectations, Claudia and the other staff were unbelievable with our young daughter and it was extremely sad at time of departure as they built a real bond in our short duration.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Daniel,
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for such a touching and generous review!
It brings us immense joy to know that your stay with us was so special, and we're especially moved by your kind words about our team. Claudia and the others will be thrilled to know they made such a meaningful impact on your family. Creating genuine connections with our guests is what we value most, and it’s truly heartwarming to hear that this was felt during your stay.
We already look forward to welcoming you and your family back. Your daughter has friends waiting for her here at Alecrim ao Chiado!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: This was an amazing find with such lovely hospitality throughout the duration of our stay. We had a baby with us and nothing was too much trouble. There were some small details that made the stay so much easier and we felt so well taken care of. Great location, walking distance to anything you need. We hope to be back and would recommend for anyone visiting Lisbon to stay here.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Bianca,
Thank you so much for your kind and thoughtful review!
We’re truly happy to hear that you felt well taken care of during your stay with us, especially while traveling with your baby. It's those small details that we hope make all the difference, and we're so glad they helped make your stay more comfortable. Our team loved having your family here, and it’s wonderful to know you appreciated the location and hospitality.
We would be delighted to welcome you back anytime, and thank you sincerely for recommending us to future visitors to Lisbon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Erholsame Atmosphäre mitten in Lissabons Zentrum
Comentário positivo: Mitten im Zentrum von Lissabon - ideal als Ausgangspunkt für alle Sight-seeing-Aktivitäten gelegen und wunderschön in ein altes Haus integriert. Freundliches, persönlich engagiertes Personal, kühle, schicke Zimmer und ein tolles Frühstück. Eine absolute Empfehlung!
Comentário negativo: Das Zimmer war im Erdgeschoss mit Türen auf die Straße, daher musste man sie in der Nacht geschlossen halten.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Piapanther,
Thank you so much for your lovely review!
We're delighted that you enjoyed the relaxing atmosphere, our location, and the charm of our historic building. It's wonderful to hear that you appreciated our friendly and dedicated team, as well as the  room and breakfast.
We truly appreciate your recommendation and hope to welcome you back soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Struttura molto bella e accogliente, colazione ottima e posizione fantastica per esplorare la città
Comentário negativo: Il bagno "diffuso" non è il massimo e il lavandino era molto scomodo
Resposta do alojamento:

Thank you very much for your kind feedback!
We're glad to hear you enjoyed our welcoming atmosphere, breakfast and the location .It’s great to know these aspects helped make your stay enjoyable.
We also appreciate your comments regarding the bathroom layout and the sink. Your feedback is important to us, and we will certainly take it into consideration as we work to improve the comfort and functionality of our rooms.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back on a future visit to Lisbon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Couldn’t have chosen a better hotel for our stay

Comentário negativo: Need to be aware there are no lifts but staff helped us with cases if required.

Dear Lynne,
Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff helped make your visit extra special. It’s great to know you loved the boutique atmosphere and our breakfast. Your kind words mean a lot to the whole team. We appreciate you mentioning the lack of a lift and are always happy to assist with luggage whenever needed. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excellent hotel in central Lisbon
Comentário positivo:
Goncalho (hope that I got the spelling right!) and Shameer were so helpful  - advising me on good restaurants, providing maps of the immediate area, activities. The location is ideal to explore central Lisbon and close to the railway and river to explore further afield. 
Breakfast is brilliant with fresh fruit, eggs (in whatever way you want). Lots of choice.
My room was large, comfortable bed, cleaned every day (I was there for 4 nights).
I will certainly stay here again when I am next in Lisbon.
Comentário negativo: The only downside for me was that there was no fridge in the room. However, I am sure that I could have used the kitchen fridge had I asked. People should also note that although of no consequence to me, there is no lift to the upper floors.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear David,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and that Gonçalo and Sameer were able to assist you so well—they'll be thrilled to receive your kind words. It's great to know our central location, breakfast, and room comfort all contributed to a positive stay.
We appreciate your feedback about the fridge and lift. We're always happy to help with any requests, and our team is available to assist whenever needed. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Lisbon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Lækkert hotel, med god beliggenhed.
Comentário positivo: Vores ophold var desværre så kort at vi ikke nåede morgenmaden. Det må blive næste gang.
Comentário negativo: Alt hvad vi oplevede var godt!

Título do comentário: Wonderful and warm...lol
Comentário positivo: Breakfast was great....staff was wonderful and location is great
Comentário negativo: Unfortunately the air conditioner in my room went out right before I arrived and it was very warm weather. The staff had put 4 or 5 fans in my room before I arrived to try as best as they could to cool room down. As I was only there in evenings for the most part, and the evenings cooled down, it was OK but not great for sleeping until early morning.  They tried to find another room for me but they were booked.  I think I should have been offered a discount of some kind, maybe for a future stay as this is a great place to stay!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Jeffrey,
Thank you so much for your kind words about our breakfast, team, and location. We’re truly happy to hear you enjoyed those aspects of your stay.
We’re very sorry about the issue with the air conditioning in your room, especially given the hot weather during your visit. Our team did their best to provide a comfortable alternative with multiple fans, but we understand this was not an ideal situation for sleeping, and we truly appreciate your patience and understanding.
Unfortunately, we were fully booked and unable to offer you a different room at the time, but we recognize the inconvenience this caused. 
We truly appreciate your feedback. It helps us continue improving. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Charmant hôtel parfaitement localisé

La chambre est grande, élégante et confortable. Le petit déjeuner est vraiment délicieux! Merci pour tout, nous reviendrons!

Comentário negativo: Je kan eigenlijk niet met het raam open slapen, gezien er verkeer langsrijdt op een weg van keien. Ik ben een lichte slaper, en oordoppen doen bij mij wonderen.

Comentário positivo: Pessoal da recepção muito simpático, com destaque para a Iara. Limpeza correta e café da manhã honesto! O prédio onde está instalado o hotel é lindo. Não há elevador para o andar de cima, são dois lances de escada, mas isso para nós não foi um problema. Meu quarto dava para a rua de trás, e a janela acústica funcionou bem!
Comentário negativo: O quarto é grande o suficiente para comportar uma cama king size!!!
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimada Christina,
Muito obrigado pela sua avaliação tão gentil! Ficamos especialmente felizes com os elogios à nossa equipa da recepção. a Iara vai adorar saber que foi mencionada com destaque.
É ótimo saber que apreciou a limpeza, o café da manhã e o charme do prédio onde estamos localizados. Também ficamos contentes que a janela acústica tenha funcionado bem para garantir uma estadia tranquila, e que os lances de escada não tenham sido um problema para vocês.
Agradecemos ainda pelo comentário sobre o tamanho do quarto. Ficamos contentes por saber que o espaço foi confortável e bem aproveitado.
Esperamos ter o prazer de recebê-la novamente em breve!
Com os melhores cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Kellemes, barátságos , hangulatos.
Comentário positivo: A személyzet segítőkészsége és kedvessége
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Anna Maria,
Thank you so much for your kind words and perfect 10/10 rating! We're delighted to hear that you found our place pleasant, friendly, and cozy, and that our team made you feel welcome.
We truly appreciate your support and hope to see you again soon!

Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Ci tornerei subito
Comentário positivo: L'hotel è in una posizione super centrale e comodissima per visitare Lisbona. La camera era molto spaziosa e dotata di ogni comfort. Anche la colazione ci è piaciuta molto, con frutta fresca, yogurt e spremuta portati al tavolo e uova su ordinazione. Il personale molto gentile e disponibile.
Comentário negativo: Forse la camera era poco luminosa, la luce naturale scarseggiava ma è comprensibile data la conformazione della città e la posizione dell'hotel.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Francesca,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review, We’re thrilled to hear you’d return in a heartbeat!
It’s great to know you enjoyed our central location, the comfort and spaciousness of your room, and the breakfast. We’re also very happy that our team made you feel welcome and well looked after.
We appreciate your understanding regarding the natural light in the room. The unique charm and layout of Lisbon sometimes come with architectural quirks, and we’re glad it didn’t take away from your overall experience.
We hope to welcome you back again very soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Staff went above and beyond and added romantic aspects like flowers and wine at rewuest. The room was beautiful and it felt safe and private. Probably the best hotel I have ever stayed in and the breakfast was mega too. Really recommend.
Comentário negativo: Our room was right next to a bar that ran late. I kept waking up to people outside our window but that ain't the hotels fault and I slept through it mostly anyway.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Emma,
Thank you so much for your amazing review! We’re truly touched by your kind words.It means a lot to hear that you found your stay with us so special and even one of the best you’ve ever had.
We’re glad you enjoyed the romantic touches, the privacy and comfort of your room, and of course, the breakfast!
We appreciate your understanding about the nearby bar — being in a vibrant central area has its charm (and sometimes a bit of nightlife), but we’re happy it didn’t impact your overall experience too much.
Thanks again for the recommendation — we’d love to welcome you back anytime!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

We can’t wait to welcome you again soon!

Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Hotel mit Herz … super geeignet für einen Städtetrip
Comentário positivo:
Schon der Empfang war sehr freundlich. Selbst unser Gepäck wurde ins Zimmer getragen! Das Zimmer war liebevoll eingerichtet und hatte alles, was man für einen Städtetrip braucht. Das Frühstück war super. Es gab Obst, frisch gepressten Orangensaft, Süßes oder Käse/Wurst und auf Wunsch auch gebratene Eier. 
Die Lage des Hotels ist toll, da man sowohl Richtung Tejo als auch Richtung Altstadt nur wenige Minuten laufen muss. 
Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben sehr wohl gefühlt. Danke!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Kathrin,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review and perfect score! We’re truly happy to know you felt so welcome and comfortable during your stay. Our team always strives to make each guest feel at home, and we’re glad that came through. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon. Thank you once again!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: wszystko ok. Czysto, dobre śniadania, super lokalizacja, przemiły personel.

Comentário positivo:
Zentrale Lage
Freundliches Personal 
Gutes Frühstück
Comentário negativo: Der Frühstücksraum ist etwas eng
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Gisela,
Thank you for your kind review!
We’re happy to hear you enjoyed our location, staff, and the quality of our breakfast.
We appreciate your feedback regarding the breakfast room. While space can be limited at times, we’re always looking for ways to improve the guest experience.

Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Enttäuschend.
Comentário positivo: Freundliche Mitarbeiter. Gutes Frühstück. Kaffeemaschine auf dem Zimmer.
Comentário negativo: Wir hatten ein Zimmer im Erdgeschoss. Das raumhohe Fenster führt direkt auf den belebten Gehweg und permanent laufen Personen am Zimmer vorbei. Darum lässt man das Fenster immer zu und schließt die schweren Vorhänge. Entsprechend muffig ist der Geruch im Zimmer. Lässt man das Fenster zum Lüften offen, so bleiben Touristen stehen und blicken neugierig rein, direkt auf das Bett. Der fensterlose Frühstücksraum ist im historischen Kellergewölbe gleich neben dem Zimmer. Entsprechend hatten wir das Gefühl im Keller zu wohnen. Die Fotos hier auf Booking und unser Erleben haben wenig miteinander zu tun.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Herbert,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.
We’re glad to hear you appreciated the kindness of our staff, the in-room coffee machine, and our breakfast. However, we’re truly sorry to know that your overall experience did not meet your expectations.
We understand your concerns regarding the ground-floor room and the lack of privacy due to the window layout. While some guests enjoy the charm of being in the heart of the city, we recognize that this setup may not be ideal for everyone. Your comments about the ventilation and the feeling of limited space are noted, and we’ll review them carefully with our team to explore possible improvements.
Thank you again for your honest review. We sincerely hope to have the opportunity to better serve you in the future.
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Tutto, accoglienza incredibile, qualità assurda. Posizione perfetta
Resposta do alojamento:
Gentile Fabio,
Grazie di cuore per il tuo fantastico punteggio 10/10!
Siamo felicissimi che tu abbia apprezzato ogni aspetto del tuo soggiorno: Dall’accoglienza del nostro staff alla qualità del servizio, fino alla posizione perfetta.
Il tuo entusiasmo ci riempie di gioia e ci motiva a continuare a offrire esperienze indimenticabili.
Ti aspettiamo con piacere per un futuro soggiorno!
Un caro saluto,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Super central to catch all the sights of Lisbon
Comentário positivo:
Location was so central - breakfast was delicious - staff were so friendly, accommodating and helpful.
You must try By the Wine for a delicious dinner if you get the time!
Comentário negativo: Nothing - we would stay again!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Ella,
Thank you so much for your kind words!
We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our location, breakfast, and the warm service provided by our team. It's always a pleasure to know our guests feel well taken care of during their stay.
Thank you also for recommending By the Wine — it’s a fantastic spot, and we’re glad you had a great experience there!
We truly appreciate your feedback and would be thrilled to welcome you back on your next visit to Lisbon.
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Wir haben den Aufenthalt genossen.
Comentário positivo: Grosses, sauberes Zimmer an guter Lage. Freundliches Personal. Gutes Frühstück.
Comentário negativo: Dusche.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Franziska,
Thank you for your kind feedback!
We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciated the room, location, and the friendliness of our staff. It's also great to know you liked the breakfast.
We’ve noted your comment about the shower and will look into it to ensure we can provide an even better experience in the future.
We hope to welcome you back soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Wouldn’t think if staying eanyehere else if we ever get back to Lisbon!
Comentário positivo: Everything! The staff was particularly helpful with suggestions for restaurants, carrying our luggage to and from our room,  and suggesting the best way to take a tram ride. They also went above and beyond in assisting with  a problem with our Bolt ride to the airport!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Teresa,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review and perfect 10/10 rating!
We’re truly delighted to know that you had such a positive experience with us and that our team could make your stay even more special. It’s great to hear that the staff's recommendations and assistance made a difference in your trip.
It would be a pleasure to welcome you back anytime .We’d love to see you again if your travels bring you back to Lisbon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo:
La struttura si trova in un’ottima posizione.
Camera e colazione sono fantastiche. Ottima la pulizia e l’ordine. 
Colazione abbondante, con diverse opzioni.
Accoglienza fantastica con tanti consigli utili su Lisbona e ristoranti da provare.
Resposta do alojamento:
Caro Riccardo,
Grazie mille per il suo gentile commento!
Siamo felici di sapere che ha apprezzato la posizione della nostra struttura, la pulizia, la camera e la colazione abbondante con varie opzioni. È un piacere sapere che la nostra accoglienza e i consigli su Lisbona e i ristoranti siano stati utili durante il suo soggiorno.
Speriamo di rivederla presto per un’altra piacevole esperienza!
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Charming boetiekhotel met heerlijk ontbijt op top locatie
Comentário positivo:
Ontbijt was heerlijk
Ontvangst en tips door Gonzalo aan de receltie was top
Deluxe suite is absolutely een aanrader 
Locatie is zeer goed
Comentário negativo: Minpunt op gelijkvloers in deluxe suite numero 1 is het nachtlawaai
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Helene,
Thank you very much for your kind review!
We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our charming boutique hotel, the breakfast, and especially the warm welcome and helpful suggestions from Gonçalo at reception.
We do apologize for the noise experienced at night in the ground floor Deluxe Suite No. 1. We’ll take your feedback into consideration as we continuously work to improve the comfort of our guests.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you again soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Posizione,estetica,colazione,accoglienza, disponibilità, TUTTO. Bravi veramente
Comentário negativo: Niente
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Giammarco,
Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed everything. From our location and aesthetics to the breakfast, reception, and overall availability.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We hope to welcome you back very soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Beautiful property with a great location
Comentário positivo: Beautiful property that has some of the original stonework still in tact. It's a great central location and the staff was awesome! Everyone we interacted with was so kind and helpful. Our room was very spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was really lovely as well. All around a great spot to stay!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Jacqueline,
Thank you so much for your wonderful 10/10 review!
We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our historic charm, central location, and that our team made such a positive impression on your stay. It’s great to know you found the room spacious and comfortable, and that breakfast added to the experience.
Your kind words truly mean a lot to us. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Bel hôtel situé près du Chiado et de la Baixa, restauré avec beaucoup de charme.
Comentário positivo:
Petit hôtel restauré avec goût, en respectant les vieux matériaux (escalier, azulejos, poutre, pierres).
Nous avons réservé la suite au 1er étage. Suite bien décorée et spacieuse.
Accueil efficace et aimable à la réception.
Service impeccable au petit-déjeuner dans une salle voûtée.
Comentário negativo: Le confort de la salle de bains pourrait être amélioré.
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimada Isabel,
Muito obrigado por partilhar a sua experiência connosco!
Ficamos muito felizes em saber que apreciou a localização, o charme da nossa restauração, e o cuidado que tivemos em preservar os elementos históricos do edifício. É um prazer saber que a suíte, o atendimento da recepção e o serviço de pequeno-almoço contribuíram para uma estadia agradável.
Agradecemos também a sua sugestão quanto ao conforto da casa de banho. Levamos todos os comentários a sério e iremos analisá-lo com atenção para podermos continuar a melhorar.
Esperamos ter o prazer de a receber novamente em breve no Alecrim ao Chiado!
Com os melhores cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excellent location for access to all major sights
Comentário positivo: Location, breakfast and staff were all excellent.
Comentário negativo: Moving luggage up the stairs could be an issue for some. Parking is an issue if traveling by car. The apartment  is very central so there may be street noise on Saturday night.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Arthur,
Thank you so much for your kind words! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our central location, breakfast, and the service provided by our team.
We understand that the stairs and parking situation can be challenging for some guests, and we truly appreciate your feedback. As we are located in a historic and vibrant part of the city, occasional street noise can occur.  
It was a pleasure to have you with us, and we hope to welcome you back in the future!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Piękny budynek w sercu Chiado. Możliwość dotarcia w wiele miejsc na nogach. Sam hotel posiada piękne wnętrza, jest zadbany i pachnący. Doskonale śniadania i obsługa. Na miejscu możliwość skorzystania z masaży.
Comentário negativo: Położenie w sercu Lizbony ma niestety też minusy - hałas. Nasze okna wychodziły na ulice i w nocy budził nas hałas rozbawionych grup włóczących się po mieście.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Joanna,
Thank you so much for your wonderful 10/10 review!
We’re thrilled to know you enjoyed our building in the heart of Chiado, and that you appreciated the care we put into our interiors, the atmosphere, and our breakfast. It's always rewarding to hear such positive feedback about our team's service as well.
Being in such a lively and central part of Lisbon does mean that some street noise can be part of the experience, especially at night. We’re truly sorry if this affected your rest, and we’ll be happy to offer quieter room options for your next stay.
We hope to welcome you back soon.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Accueil très agréable du personnel. Établissement propre et calme. Très bonne localisation.
Comentário negativo: Matelas très dur.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Julie,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.
We’re very happy to hear that you enjoyed our warm welcome, the cleanliness and peaceful atmosphere of our hotel, as well as our convenient location. Your kind words about our team truly mean a lot to us.
We’re sorry to hear that the mattress was too firm for your preference. We understand that comfort can be very personal, and we appreciate your comment. It helps us continue to improve.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you again in the future!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Beautiful accommodation, great location with friendly staff and very good breakfast
Comentário positivo: The property was clean and staff members were all very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was amazing with lots of choice including pastries, cereal, eggs, juices and fruit.
Comentário negativo: Nothing
Resposta do alojamento:

Thank you so much for your amazing 10/10 review!

Your kind words truly mean a lot to us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Would recommend it to others

Comentário negativo: Room was noisy but not too bad

We appreciate your feedback about the noise in the room. While we're glad it wasn't too disruptive, we’ll certainly look into ways to improve this for an even better stay next time.
We’d be happy to welcome you back anytime!

Comentário positivo:
E' stato un soggiorno perfetto,la struttura e' posizionata in pieno centro,comoda per tutto,in un bel palazzo storico in cui si mescola tradizione e modernita.
La nostra camera ci e' piaciuta molto coerente allo stile dell'Hotel,colazione superlativa in una location caratteristica,ma il tutto e' coronato dalla gentilezza e simpatia dello staff che ci ha accolto calorosamente
Comentário negativo: Nulla
Resposta do alojamento:

Most of all, your lovely comment about our team means a lot to us. We’re thrilled that their warmth and friendliness made your stay even more special.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we sincerely hope to welcome you back again soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário negativo: Our room had a door that led directly onto the foot path outside the property. We didn’t keep the blinds open at all as we didn’t want to public looking straight in. Therefore we had no natural light in the room. Was also a bit noisy at times as a result.
Resposta do alojamento:

Providing warm and accommodating service is very important to us, and it's great to know we made a positive impression.

We hope to welcome you back soon!

Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Wonderful hotel with fantastic staff. The staff spoke English and accompanied us to our room. Great choice for breakfast ð everything fresh and local. There is no bar but does have a very comfortable lounge with an honesty bar where you serve yourself. If what you want isn't there, ask the staff. Love this hotel. Close to Pink Street, a must for those who like us, love live music. Pink Street also has sports bars & restaurants.
Comentário negativo: Not suitable for those with walking difficulties due to the quirky layout. Lots of stairs. It's also up a steep hill, but then Lisbon is very hilly.
