Título do comentário: Easy access to Lisbon highlights.  Would stay again.
Comentário positivo: Everything!  Really nice boutique hotel.  Staff, particularly Conzalo, were terrific. Room was comfortable, bathroom was great with a separate shower that worked well.  Breakfast was superb. Convenient location, though no parking.
Comentário negativo: Parking was a considerable challenge. Hotel is located on a very busy street, so parking to load/unload luggage is difficult. Parking garage is a few blocks away - uphill!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Tricia,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your detailed review!
We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciated our boutique style, the room, breakfast, and especially our dedicated staff .
Gonçalo will be delighted to receive your kind mention!
We’re also glad that our central location gave you easy access to the highlights of Lisbon. That said, we understand that parking can be challenging due to our location on a busy street. We sincerely appreciate your patience and understanding, and we always aim to assist guests with unloading whenever possible.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Top Boutique Hoteln in guter Lage.
Comentário positivo:
Der Charme des Gebäudes ist topp. Ein paar Zimmer sind im UG, die in der 1. Etage sind traumhaft. Gross und komfortabel. Das Personal ist fast wie eine Familie. 
Gleich an der hinteren Strasse gibt es eine schöne Weinbar.
Comentário negativo: Da das Hotel zwischen 2 Strassen liegt ist es nicht ruhig, wenn man mit offenem Fester schlafen mag. Dafür liegt es sehr zentral. Bahnhof 10 min zu Fuss, die Pinke Strasse um.due Ecke und alles andere schnell erreichbar, wenn man gut zu Fuss ist. Parkhaus in der Nähe aber teuer. 26€/Tag
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Julia,
Thank you so much for your thoughtful and detailed review!
We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed the charm of our building, the spacious and comfortable room and the welcoming atmosphere created by our team. We’re also happy you appreciated our central location and the lovely wine bar just across the street.
As you pointed out, being located between two streets in the heart of the city does mean that some noise can be expected, especially when windows are open. We understand how important a restful night’s sleep is, and we always encourage guests to reach out to us so we can help find the most suitable room for their preferences.
Thank you again for your valuable feedback. We truly hope to welcome you back for another memorable stay!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Would definitely stay here again
Comentário positivo: The breakfast was excellent.  Lots to choose from.  The staff were very attentive.  Our room was nice and spacious and was quite soundproof.  The location was just a couple blocks from the very busy part of the city.  Conchalo and Claudia were very helpful, suggesting restaurants, and music venues.
Comentário negativo: All was well
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Larry,
Thank you so much for your kind review!
We're thrilled to hear you had such a positive experience. It's wonderful to know that Gonçalo and Claudia made your stay even more special with their helpful recommendations. We’ll be sure to pass along your kind words to them!
We're especially happy to hear you'd definitely stay with us again. That’s the best compliment we could ask for.
Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: This hotel is located in an excellent area and is a step back in time. Beautiful.
Comentário positivo: This hotel is beautiful. From the moment you walk in the front doors you are aware of the special details that elevate this hotel. The wallpaper, furnishings, stone steps all remind you of this house's heritage. This continues to the bedrooms where everything is thoughtfully laid out right down to the glass water bottle on the table and the folded bath robes in the drawer. We loved the double set of French doors too. The hotel staff are friendly, welcoming and helpful (especially Claudia) and it is located in an excellent area where you can walk to most things.
Comentário negativo: Our room was beautiful but it did not have a fridge. We were, however, able to use the fridge in the hotel kitchen to store our drinks. The bed was also harder than we would have preferred. Minor complaints compared to what was on offer.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Gregory,
Thank you so much for your beautiful and detailed review!
We’re truly delighted that you appreciated the unique charm and historical character of our hotel. It’s wonderful to know that these details made your stay feel special. We're also so pleased that our location and the hospitality of our team, especially Claudia, contributed positively to your experience.
We appreciate your feedback regarding the fridge and mattress. While we’re happy to have been able to assist with drink storage, your comments help us continue to improve and better meet our guests’ preferences in the future.
Thank you again for your thoughtful words. We’d be honored to welcome you back on your next visit to Lisbon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Lissabon - nur im Alecrim ao Chiado!
Comentário positivo:
Die Lage der Unterkunft ist einzigartig, man ist auf kurzem Weg mitten im Geschehen.
Personal sehr hilfsbereit und herzlich.
Das Zimmer war groß genug, Bett bequem, Badezimmer auch gut eingerichtet.
Lärmbelästigung bei geschlossenen Läden kaum vorhanden.
Mittels eines vergebenen Codes konnte man das Eingangstor und das Zimmer öffnen (besser als ein Schlüssel).
Frühstück im Untergeschoss mehr als ausreichend, hübsch gedeckte Tische und zuvorkommendes Personal.
Comentário negativo: Stauraum im Zimmer etwas wenig (2 Laden und Aufhängevorrichtung an der Wand), aber bei einem Kurzaufenthalt nicht störend.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Monika,
Thank you for your wonderful review!
We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our unique location, just a short walk from the heart of the city, and that our team provided attentive and friendly service. It’s great to know that your room was comfortable and well-equipped, and that you appreciated the convenience of our keyless entry system.
We’re also pleased that you enjoyed the breakfast experience. Thank you for your understanding regarding the limited storage space.
We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back to Lisboa soon 
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Perfectly located for exploring Lisbon
Comentário positivo: Very nice boutique hotel close to everything. Comfortable and large rooms. Good selection for breakfast.

Comentário negativo: Douche water ´s avonds was een klein straaltje en bediening tv was onduidelijk. Ook s nachts lawaai op straat, maar ik heb standaard oordoppen bij me dus goed geslapen.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay!

Comentário negativo: No/broken down air conditioning in the middle of a European summer is not good enough.

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the air conditioning issue, especially during the summer heat. We understand how important this is for comfort, and we're actively working to ensure this doesn’t happen again in the future.
We truly appreciate your comments, as they help us improve, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back under better conditions.
Kindest Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Great central location, easy walk to most places (although Lisbon is VERY hilly), staff were very nice and helpful, good breakfast.
Comentário negativo: Only issue was that our room overlooked the back street and there was a bar which was noisy until late every night despite our double glazed windows with shutters.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Tony,
Thank you so much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience. We're glad you enjoyed our central location, the breakfast, and especially the service provided by our team.it's always rewarding to hear that our staff made a positive impact on your stay.
We’re sorry to hear about the noise from the nearby bar. While our windows and shutters are designed to reduce sound, we understand that city noise can still be a challenge in certain rooms. 
We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back again soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Wonderful stay in Chiado area close to restaurants and shops and Fado show.
Comentário positivo: Great location, great breakfast, very cool interior especially down below where breakfast room was. The room was spacious and quiet.
Comentário negativo:
Everything great, just would have liked ice for the water. We got very thirsty hiking around and were constantly going down for another carafe of water. If there was a mini fridge we could have bought extra water to have in the room.
Wonderful place and very convenient to lots of.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Lauren,
Thank you so much for your lovely review! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay in the Chiado area and that you appreciated our location, breakfast, and the interior design. It’s also great to know that your room was spacious and quiet, offering a comfortable place to relax after exploring Lisbon.
We appreciate your feedback regarding the ice and the availability of water in the room. We understand how refreshing that can be after a day of walking in the city, and we’ll certainly take your suggestion into consideration to improve the experience for future guests.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we hope to welcome you back again soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Nichts

 super.

It was a pleasure having you with us, and we hope to welcome you back again soon!

Título do comentário: Well located property with lovely proprietors.
Comentário positivo: Proprietors are very nice and helpful.  Location great.  room clean and large. Breakfast very good. several places to stay in hotel outside of your room.  Coffee in room. a/c worked great.  There was a table with comfortable chairs in room and safe.  It met all of our requirements, except a small fridge.  It was very nice.
Comentário negativo: The bed was too hard for us.  The toilet in the room was a bit dangerous to get to.  There were 4 steep steps about 11 inches or so tall, much  more than the standard size steps in the US.  It was very easy to stumble especially getting up in the night.  I would suggest you ask for a room without steep  steps to get to the bathroom.  Then all should be good!

Comentário negativo: The showerhead in our room didn't work, only the hand-sprayer worked. We coordinated delivery of a breakfast box to the room for our 4:30AM check-out, but the box never arrived so we left hungry :(.

Your feedback is very helpful, and we’ll make sure to address these points with our team to prevent them from happening in the future. We truly appreciate your understanding and hope to welcome you back for an even smoother and more enjoyable stay next time.
Warm Regards,

Comentário negativo: The mattress was uncomfortably firm, and we generally prefer firmer mattresses. Very difficult to get used to.

Comentário positivo: Victor the receptionist helped us get our WIFI going, get our boarding passes and opened our door when the knob got stuck. Also, the other receptionist held our bags when we got there early, and had the moved to our room when we had not gotten back there. They also gave us good recommendations for vegetarian restaurants in the neighborhood.  This was great service, the best on our trip.
Comentário negativo: Our room was on the street front and was somewhat noisy.

It’s great to know that you appreciated the restaurant recommendations and the care our staff took with your luggage. We’re sorry to hear that the street noise affected your comfort, and we’ll certainly take note of your comment. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back for another great stay!

Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: A lovely building in a great location, but missing some of the atmosphere that make a great hotel
Comentário positivo: The location was fantastic, close to everything we wanted to see and do. The building itself was beautiful, and our room was spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was good, with a nice selection to start the day.
Comentário negativo: What I didn’t like was the lack of communal spaces on the ground floor or any bar or food options. While there are some amenities, they’re located in the basement, which made the hotel feel a little less welcoming to spend time in outside the room.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Karen,
Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our location, the comfort of your room, and the breakfast selection. It’s wonderful to know these aspects contributed positively to your stay.
We truly appreciate your comments regarding the communal spaces and atmosphere. Your observations are valuable, and we will certainly take them into consideration as we continue working to enhance the guest experience and make our shared areas more welcoming and comfortable.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future and providing a more enjoyable stay.
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excellent location and friendly staff. Thank you!
Comentário positivo: The nicest staff I have ever met at a hospitality service. Thank you so much for your service. I’ll be recommending this hotel to everyone.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Tutku,
What a wonderful review! Thank you so much for your kind words and for awarding us the highest rating! We’re truly delighted to hear that our team made such a positive impression and that you enjoyed your stay with us.
Your recommendation means a lot to us, and it’s the greatest compliment we could receive. We’ll be sure to share your lovely feedback with our staff. It will certainly make their day!
We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another exceptional stay.
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Very friendly and helpful staff, central location, clean, and charming and renovated building. Comfortable bed, functional bathroom.
Comentário negativo: The suite with a city view we had booked was a room with bed and table, and a window to the backstreet. Breakfast in the basement felt a bit uninspired on the third day.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Volker,
Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us. We’re delighted to know you appreciated our staff, the location, and the comfort and cleanliness of our building. It’s great to hear that these aspects made your stay enjoyable.
We’re sorry to learn that your room did not fully meet your expectations and that breakfast felt less inspiring after a few days. Your comments are very valuable to us, and we’ll make sure to review them with our team to improve both the room allocation process and the breakfast experience.
We truly appreciate your honest feedback and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you again.
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Gorgeous stay in Lisbon.
Comentário positivo: Loved the interior and the staff. Breakfast was fantastic as well.  They helped us set up a private tour to sintra.
Comentário negativo: The bed was extremely hard. And the floor was warping a great deal to the point that they had to put down a rug. It was a bit loud at night.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Mercedes,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay in Lisbon, appreciated our interiors, and found our team helpful and attentive. 
We’re sorry, however, to learn that your sleep comfort and room conditions did not fully meet your expectations. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused by the firmness of the bed, the floor issue, and the noise at night. Your comments have been shared with our maintenance and management teams to ensure these matters are addressed promptly.
We truly appreciate your valuable feedback and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon for a more comfortable and seamless stay.
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: En general todo como una boutique muy coqueto y elegante y la gente de recepción como desayuno encantadores repetiré
Comentário negativo: Nada

Sus palabras son un verdadero reconocimiento para todo nuestro personal, que trabaja cada día para ofrecer la mejor experiencia posible. Será un placer darle la bienvenida de nuevo en su próxima visita. ¡nos encantará recibirle otra vez!

Título do comentário: Für einen Kurztrip ok
Comentário positivo: Sehr stilvoll eingerichtet. Mitten drin. Tolles Bett, alles sauber. Unglaublich freundliches Personen. Richtig gutes Frühstück.
Comentário negativo: Wahnsinnig laut in der Nacht. Kein Kühlschrank im Zimmer.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Silke,
Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback. We’re delighted to know that you appreciated your stay.
We’re sorry, however, that the noise at night and the absence of a fridge in the room affected your comfort. Your comments are very valuable to us, and we’ll take them into consideration as we continue to improve our guests’ experience.
We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon for a  more enjoyable stay.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Прекрасный отель и очень отзывчивый персонал! Вкусный завтрак со свежими фруктами. У меня был абсолютно уникальный номер со своим выходом на другую улицу. Отель в историческом здании в самом центре! Все очень аутентично!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Georgii,

Thank you so much for your wonderful review and for giving us the highest rating! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast, the unique charm of your room, and the authenticity of our historic building. It’s also great to know that our team made your stay even more enjoyable.

We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon!

Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: A delightful gem as a base to explore Lisbon.
Comentário positivo: This boutique hotel is perfectly situated to explore Lisbon.  The rooms are clean, spacious and comfortable.  The staff were very welcoming and helpful.  The breakfast is excellent with a good variety to select from including eggs of your choice.
Comentário negativo: Nothing
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Martin,
Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciated our location, the room, and breakfast selection. It’s also great to know that our team made you feel welcome and well taken care of.
Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back on your next visit to Lisbon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Buen alojamiento
Comentário positivo:
Personal muy amable, habitaciones amplia y con buena ubicación. 
Muy equipada con todo lo necesario.

La ducha es pequeña y no hay ascensor, para tenerlo en consideración.

El último día nuestro check out fue de madrugada y preguntamos si tenían un desayuno para estos casos, y sí había, pero puede mejorar.
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimada Veronica,
Muchas gracias por compartir su experiencia con nosotros. Nos alegra saber que disfrutó de la amabilidad de nuestro personal, de la amplitud de las habitaciones y de nuestra ubicación. Agradecemos también sus comentarios sobre la ducha, la ausencia de ascensor y el desayuno; sus observaciones son muy valiosas y nos ayudan a seguir mejorando.
Esperamos tener el placer de recibirle nuevamente en su próxima visita a la ciudad.
Saludos cordiales,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Fantastic hotel
Comentário positivo:
Our room was clean and comfortable. Quality bedding, towels, and toiletries. 
All the staff were so hospitable. We got great tips for local restaurants.
Comentário negativo: A few international channels on the television would be good, such a BBC News channel. All channels were from Portuguese television.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Nicholas,
Thank you very much for your kind words and for sharing your experience with us. We’re delighted to know that you enjoyed the comfort of your room, our amenities, and the hospitality of our team.
Regarding the TV channels, we actually do have a selection of international channels available.We’re sorry you weren’t aware of this during your stay. Our reception team is always happy to assist with such requests at any time.
We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back very soon!
Warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Lissabon und das Alecrim: wow!!!
Comentário positivo: Sehr zuvorkommendes Personal (vor allem Gonzalo und Sofia!), freundlich, humorvoll und kompetent!! Man fühlt sich im Alecrim herzlich willkommen und es wird jederzeit nach dem Befinden gefragt, ohne lästig zu wirken. Zudem tolle Tipps bezüglich Sightseeing, Kultur, Essen, authentische Fado-Bars und vieles mehr. Plus: Wirksame Massagen von Igor und feines Frühstück!
Comentário negativo: Passt alles. Liegt sehr zentral. Ums Eck von der weltberühmten 28er Straßenbahn, von allen öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln, von der Einkaufsstraße und von den tollen Bars und Restaurants!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Thomas,
What a wonderful review! Thank you so much for your kind words! It was an absolute pleasure meeting you and having you with us. We truly enjoyed our conversations and the unexpected (but very enjoyable!) German lessons!
We’re delighted to know that you felt so warmly welcomed and appreciated our team, the location, and all the small details that made your stay special.
We hope to see you again soon. Our doors are always open for you at Alecrim!
With warm regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Buonissima colazione e posizione
Comentário negativo: Ci hanno messo in una camera a piano terra senza finestre apribili sull’esterno con moltissima umidità

Hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Título do comentário: Great location, great staff, nice free breakfast…would recommend staying here
Comentário positivo:
Beautiful central location to the old city and major landmark’s of Lisbon   Very historic and lovely decorated. Staff were truly the highlight from the front desk to the kitchen staff 
We arrived post cruise, the kitchen staff let us in. Once the front desk arrived, they gave us a free breakfast…even though we hadn’t checked in yet.  Delivered our bags to our home before we returned later in the afternoon.  Attention to detail was noticed.
Comentário negativo: We were in room #6 (2nd floor) facing the street quite noisy with traffic. We stayed on the weekend, so many late night party goers hooping it up while passingby
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Vincent,
Thank you so much for sharing your detailed and thoughtful review!
We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our location, staff, and complimentary breakfast, and that you would recommend staying with us. It’s wonderful to know you appreciated being so close to the historic center and Lisbon’s major landmarks, as well as our hotel’s charming décor.
Your kind words about our front desk and kitchen team truly mean a lot. They will be thrilled to know their hospitality made such a positive impression, especially after your cruise arrival. We’re glad we could offer breakfast early and take care of your luggage before your room was ready.
We’re sorry to hear about the noise from the street during your stay in Room 6. Being in such a central location can sometimes bring extra weekend activity, but we understand how this can affect comfort. We truly appreciate the feedback.
Thank you again for your recommendation and for noticing the attention to detail. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back, perhaps in a quieter room, on your next visit to Lisbon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Excellent petit hôtel boutique rempli de charme et de cachet. Emplacement exceptionnel dans Lisbonne. Le quartier du Chiado est proche de toutes commodités transports restaurants attractions.  Très accessible à pied.  Claudia, son collègue et tout le personnel se mettent en quatre pour vous offrir une prestation de haut niveau et un séjour mémorable.  Cet hôtel est un joyau. Chambre numéro 9 très spacieuse et très agréable.  Nous ne pouvons que recommander cet endroit plein de charme.  C'est rare de trouver un accueil si exceptionnel.  Merci.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Gerard,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review!
Our entire team are thrilled by your kind words. We’re committed to offering high-level service and memorable stays, and it’s incredibly rewarding to hear that this was your experience.
We’re also glad you appreciated Room 9, its spaciousness, and the comfort it provided. Your high recommendation and warm compliments mean a great deal to us. Exceptional hospitality is our greatest pride, and we’re grateful you felt it.
Thank you once again. This hotel truly is a little gem thanks to guests like you. We hope to welcome you back very soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

We only wish you could have stayed longer too! Hopefully we’ll have the pleasure of welcoming you back for an extended visit next time.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Beyond our expectations. So so nice.
Comentário positivo: The staff very very nice. Gentleman on reception was so engaging helpful and exceptionally nice. The two lady chefs who looked after us at breakfast we’re again so so nice.
Comentário negativo: Nothing loved this place looked the people who worked there.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Kim,
Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We’re thrilled to hear that your stay went beyond expectations. It’s great to know that our reception team and the ladies at breakfast made such a positive impression.We’ll be sure to pass along your kind words to them.
We’re delighted that you loved the hotel and the people who work here. It was truly a pleasure having you with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Fabulous!
Comentário positivo: Fabulous staff who could not have been more helpful. The hotel is beautiful, very well furnished and super clean, everything was of the highest quality. We also loved the location.
Comentário negativo: There wasn’t anything to dislike!
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Sarah,
Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback! We’re thrilled to hear that you found our staff helpful and that you enjoyed the hotel’s décor, cleanliness, and overall quality. It’s great to know that the location suited you as well.
We’re especially delighted that there was nothing you disliked. Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: The hotel is very quaint either lovely decor.  Exceptionally clean
Comentário positivo:
Breakfast was delicious.  Enough choice and the cooked omelette were tasty.  Staff were lovely and friendly and as we had an early start went out of their way to prepare breakfast for us 
Staff at reception were very helpful explaining where we could go for our evening meal and drinks
Comentário negativo:
I hadn’t realised there was no
Lift and the property has stairs up to the room and down to breakfast. Would not suit anyone that has a problem with stairs
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Irene,
Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us! We’re pleased that our staff were able to assist you with early breakfast arrangements and helpful recommendations for your evening out.
We’re sorry for any inconvenience caused by the lack of a lift.  We appreciate you highlighting this, as it helps future guests make informed decisions.
Thank you again for your thoughtful review. We hope to welcome you back in the future!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Authentic and charming in a great location
Comentário positivo:
Beautifully presented authentic building and decor. Excellent central location. Rooms so well presented and very spacious with everything you’d need. 
Breakfasts were exceptional. Staff friendly, knowledgeable and helpful.
Comentário negativo: We had a balcony room opening onto the main road. Noise wasn’t an issue on week nights but was noisy enough to disturb our sleep on Friday and Saturday night with street noise.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Julie,
Thank you very much for your wonderful review. It’s also great to know that our location and our staff made your stay even better.
We’re sorry to learn that the street noise affected your sleep over the weekend. As we are located in a lively area, some noise can occur on busier nights, but we appreciate your understanding and will keep working to improve our guests’ comfort.
Thank you again for staying with us, and we hope to welcome you back soon.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Vontade de repetir
Comentário positivo: Tudo em si os funcionários tudo excelente, localização
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimado Marques,
Muito obrigado pela sua avaliação e pela nota máxima! 
Ficamos muito felizes em saber que gostou da nossa localização e que a nossa equipa contribuiu para uma excelente estadia.
Será um prazer recebê-lo novamente. A vontade de repetir é sempre o melhor elogio!
Cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Lovely place big room staff amazing
Comentário negativo: Unfortunately from day one no internet at the room it was not possible to establish any connection the staff were amazing but did not solve the problem ( we stayed there 5 days) it made things difficult
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Yoel,
Thank you very much for your review.
We’re truly sorry about the inconvenience caused by the lack of internet connection in your room during your stay. Although our team did their best to assist, we regret that the issue could not be resolved in time. Please rest assured that we are working to improve this so future stays are more comfortable.
Thank you again for sharing your feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a smoother experience.
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: Sehr freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal
Comentário negativo: Schlafen geht leider nur mit Fenster zu, sonst zu laut, auch noch gegen 5 Uhr morgens.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Silke,
Thank you very much for your review. We’re delighted to hear that you found our staff to be very friendly and helpful.
We’re sorry to learn that the street noise affected your comfort and made it difficult to sleep with the window open. As we are located in a lively area, some noise can unfortunately occur, even early in the morning. We appreciate your understanding and will continue working on ways to improve our guests’ experience.
Thank you again for your feedback, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Excelente

Hotel diferente, espaço bem interessante. Vale conhecer.
Tudo perfeito.

Muito obrigado pela sua avaliação tão positiva!
Ficamos muito felizes em saber que achou o nosso hotel interessante e diferente, e que tudo esteve perfeito durante a sua estadia.

Cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Fantastic staff and hotel
Comentário positivo: Breakfasts were superb with really helpful staff, the hotel is very central but quiet. First class
Comentário negativo: Nothing

Dear Mark,
Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We’re delighted to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast and found our staff so helpful. 
We’re especially happy to hear that everything was first-class for you.
Thank you again, and we hope to welcome you back very soon!
Kind Regards,
Alecrim Team

Comentário positivo: La ubicación y la amplitud de las habitaciones junto con la limpieza.
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimado Miguel,
¡Muchísimas gracias por su valoración y por la nota máxima!
Nos alegra saber que la ubicación, la amplitud de las habitaciones y la limpieza estuvieron a la altura de sus expectativas.
Será un placer darle la bienvenida nuevamente en su próxima visita.

Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Beautiful unique hotel
Comentário positivo:
Beautiful unique boutique hotel in an excellent location, everything within walking distance.
Wonderful friendly helpful staff.
Great breakfast, loved the whole ambience and decor of the whole place and rooms..
I can highly recommend this wonderful this hotel.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Pauline,
Thank you so much for your beautiful review. It’s wonderful to know that our staff, as well as our breakfast, made your stay even more enjoyable.
We truly appreciate your high recommendation and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon.
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Mi última estancia en Lisboa
Comentário positivo: Preciosa casa con bonita decoración y excelente ubicación.
Comentário negativo:
Muchísimo ruido de coches y personas pasando por la calle, no se puede dormir. El aislamiento es muy deficiente.
Busqué un hotel con parking, pero los filtros no funcionaron y era muy complicado encontrar aparcamiento en la zona.
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimada Isabel,
Muchas gracias por compartir su opinión sobre su última estancia en Lisboa.

Lamentamos sinceramente que el ruido exterior haya afectado a su descanso. Debido a nuestra ubicación céntrica, en una zona muy transitada, puede haber momentos de mayor movimiento en la calle. Aun así, tomamos muy en serio sus comentarios sobre el aislamiento y seguiremos trabajando para mejorar la experiencia de nuestros huéspedes.
Agradecemos de nuevo sus comentarios y esperamos tener la oportunidad de recibirle nuevamente, ofreciéndole una estancia más cómoda y tranquila.
Saludos cordiales,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: A small and friendly boutique hotel in a great Lisbon old town central location
Comentário positivo: A charming boutique hotel in a great location within easy walking distance of all the old town sites, restaurants, markets, churches and public transport. Our room was large and comfortable, overlooking the rear street with an oblique view from the balconies to the river. The reception staff (Goncalo, Claudia and Sofia) were all pleasant and very helpful, along with Candida and her staff in the breakfast room. Breakfast was plentiful with fresh juices, meats, cheeses and pastries - with eggs cooked to order. Overall, a very comfortable and pleasant stay.
Comentário negativo: No lift but the staff willingly assisted with luggage.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear John,
Thank you very much for sharing your kind review. It is wonderful to hear that our team helped make your visit even more enjoyable.
It was a pleasure having you with us, and we hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Lisbon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Très bien
Comentário positivo: L’emplacement de l’hôtel et la très grande gentillesse du personnel
Resposta do alojamento:
Chère Véronique,
Un grand merci pour votre excellente note et votre commentaire ! Nous sommes ravis que l’emplacement de l’hôtel et la gentillesse de notre équipe aient contribué à rendre votre séjour agréable.
Ce fut un plaisir de vous accueillir et nous espérons avoir le bonheur de vous recevoir à nouveau très bientôt.
Cordialement,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Meraviglioso soggiorno a Lisbona
Comentário positivo:
Posizione eccezionale, camera comodissima e arredata con gusto, buona colazione, staff gentilissimo.
Grazie a Gonçalo per i consigli e la sua simpatia.
Siamo stati benissimo.

Título do comentário: great location and super friendly people, a few steps to negotiate but staff always offered to help
Decent, but room for improvement.
Comentário positivo: The location, the boutique feel, and the breakfast was nice. Sameer stayed and waited for us for our late check in ( 9:30PM) because our flight was delayed. He is an amazing polite, respectful young man. By far he was the reason our stay was enjoyable.
Comentário negativo:
We got a deluxe suite, and there was no minibar, or chested drawers.The shower was licking as well.
Also my husband wanted to work on his laptop in the waiting hidden area of the lobby, and the cleaning lady, said he was not allowed to be there because she wanted to clean the carpets. When husband went to the front desk and ask the lady up front about the situation ( don’t know her name, but she had short curly hair), she didn’t seem of much of help.
She was not friendly at all. Seems like they rather clean the carpet, than let the guesses work in the laptop for 30 minutes while there were people resting in the suite.
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Diana,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While we are pleased to hear that you appreciated our location, boutique atmosphere, breakfast, and especially Sameer’s exceptional professionalism and dedication during your late check-in, we would also like to address the concerns you raised.

Regarding the minibar, we would like to clarify that we do not offer a minibar, and this information is clearly stated on Booking.com. As for the leaking shower, we sincerely apologize. We always strive to pay close attention to details, and in this case, we fell short.

We also apologize for the inconvenience experienced in the lobby. Our guests are always our priority. We are confident that our colleagues did not intend to cause any inconvenience, as our staff is well known for being kind and accommodating. We believe this was a misunderstanding; however, we sincerely apologize for the situation.
The matter has been addressed internally, and action has been taken to ensure guests are always prioritized and treated with respect.

We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and regret that these issues impacted your stay.

Wishing you Happy Holidays!

Warm regards,

Claudia Carmo
Operations manager

Título do comentário: Отличный мини-отель в центре города с очень чистыми номерами, приветливым персоналом и отличными завтраками
Comentário positivo: Отличное расположение, недалеко от центра, пешая доступность к ресторанам, шоппингу, достопримечательностям
Resposta do alojamento:
Dear Dmytro,
Thank you very much for your excellent review and maximum rating! 
We are delighted to know that you enjoyed our hotel, especially the cleanliness of the rooms, the friendliness of our staff, and our breakfast. It is also wonderful to hear that our central location made it easy for you to explore restaurants, shops, and local attractions on foot.
We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to welcome you back again very soon!
Warm Regards,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: repetiria tranquilamente a experiencia.
Comentário positivo: localização bem perto a pé do metrô e do bairro alto e do chiado, que é cheio de restaurantes deliciosos e bem seguro !! o quarto do hotel é BEM espaçoso, o banheiro com água quentinha e a equipe extremamente simpática e atenciosa.
Resposta do alojamento:
Estimada Jennifer,
Muito obrigado pela sua avaliação 10/10! 
Ficamos extremamente felizes em saber que repetiria tranquilamente a experiência conosco. 
Agradecemos de coração pelas suas palavras e será um enorme prazer recebê-la novamente em breve!
Cumprimentos,
Alecrim Team

Título do comentário: Perfect accommodation in Lisbon. Close to trams, shopping, metro, food, but the streeet was tucked a bit away. Lived eve
Comentário positivo: Very friendly, helpful staff. Room was lovely…location can’t be beat! Breakfast delicious!!!

Título do comentário: The location, staff responsiveness, regular cleaning, and breakfast. Everything was excellent!
Comentário positivo: The location, staff responsiveness, regular cleaning, and breakfast. Everything was excellent! I would definitely return here!
